Tôi Tôi mơ thấy quái vật đuổi theo mình

051 With a black man I am on a boat or the tip of an island, at war at sea. People are trying to kill us. I have several grenades strung together like a six pack of beer. I unhook one frag then activate one by pushing the safety off and pulling the pin, hurling the remaining grenades into the ocean. My aim is short but effective. There is a very big underwater explosion and subsequent whoosh and blast spout of water. We laugh and grin, knowing we have killed the enemy.

053 I am with a group of excited soldiers in a foreign country, Palestine or Israel. We are in large, open but fortified area with many steps and rooms. Everyone is armed, waiting to assault or be attacked. I speak with the leader, a very important man, but can only obtain a .38 pistol and some ammunition. I am not afraid to go out like this.

070 Dream 2: I am in domestic setting. A large and powerful tiger eyes and tracks a furry pet cat. The cat attempts to dodge and escape the playful swipes of the tiger. It eventually runs up a tree but the tiger easily follows. The cat has no escape. On the ground it shows no fear as it continues to rebuff the powerful play of the tiger.

This was one short. I remember 3 of us were in separate elevators. Well they were kinda like elevators. It was more like we were in a small elevator shaft cuz you could see all the wires and cables. We had the ability to make the elevator drop extremely fast, and then stop, kinda like a ride at an amusement part. We did this several times and I could actually feel the sensation of dropping, it was fun.

I remember very little of this dream, remembered it later during the day. But my brother appeared in my dream (he is dead in real life, died 16 years ago) and in the dream I hadn't seen him in a very long time. It was the "present" so he was older. I felt extremely happy to be talking to him and was telling him that we had to start hanging out more and he agreed. I also remember asking him about his best friend Cory. That's all I remember.

I had a dream that I was at my high school, but it was just like Hogwarts and was magical. Professor Dumbledore was the headmaster. I had been going there before Kylie came too. So we dueled, and Dumbledore was on my side telling me what to do because my wand was messed up. Finally it snapped in half and we all had to go to Diagon Alley to buy a new wand. On the train Kylie made fun of me for being blonde, even though I'm not. So I got mad and then she cursed me to death. Then I woke up.

I dreamed that I was playing soccer down on the fields. There was going to be a pep rally later, so I hurried to the athletic center to shower and change. In the locker room I bumped into Lou. He was wearing red boxers and he had a white towel in front of him. He was laughing, so then I began laughing and woke up.

I dreamed that my brother and I were buying my father a present. We were on this whitewater rafting trip and my brother and I kept laughing at him because he was playing the piano really badly. Then I woke up.
15. Johnny Depp was my mom’s best friend and he came over and I was freaking out, I was like, “Oh my god, oh my god ahhh.” He was like, “Get away from me, freak,” it was funny.
21. Coach Temple made us dance in front of the whole class and I got ribbed and everyone laughed at me and I was so mad at her. And there was a commercial at my school.
41. Three of my friends and I climbed up this big pole but we got too scared to come down. This black, bold guy kept harassing me and other people so I searched him and everyone was happy about that.
I dreamed that I was sneaking around the boys' dorms because I was on this top-secret mission. All I remember was that it was all very funny!

I had a dream that everyone from my Spain program was having a party on a bus. We were all eating popsicles and having lots of fun. Then we got to the refuge that was apparently at the end of the party. I really wanted to go to sleep, but I had to leave for some reason. It was so sad saying good-bye to everyone again, even though it was just in my dream.
96. I gave Nash a love letter and she thought it was funny and started flirting with me and my friend Cindy.

111. (1) A day dream. I was holding an infant and it liked me the best because I knew what it wanted. I kept bugging Nash. Katy showed me this video that she and Evan made in like the 7th grade at a party and it was funny.
116. Was at a store and kept on calling Kevin, then Evan got to spend the night and we stayed up the whole night having a lot of fun prank calling people and stuff like that.

120. Evan came over and then was leaving, but then he came back and was like, “I forgot my hug and kiss.” Evan and I and other people I don't know kept on going into a pregnancy store, but all of it was couches and I was wearing an orange dress and I was like, “Hey I will do my pregnant belly.” And everyone thought it was so funny. We would go every day and kept getting these orange drinks and getting drunk from them.
137. I was about to turn 10 in like 6 months and I was so excited.

18. dream one - In one part we hop in the car with someone and he drives us half way to Phoenix. Nobody has luggage - or even their coat. We all think it's so funny. We stop at a gas station with a big sunroom, then head back. (Like once in college we drove half way to San Francisco, then drove back because of snow on the roads.)

30. dream rewrite - Tried to go back to sleep and work this out. The little bird is me going into the world after completing real estate school. Like - I get slaughtered, sued, whatever. I tried to talk to the bird before just opening the door to let it out. Slow things down a little - let it out when its not stressed out in a panic. It may have something to do with my inner Kyle, my sensitive inner self.
49. I meet a counselor to talk about my new career. He starts off by saying - "You didn't decide on a life of toil and low pay as a paralegal, did you?" He is happy I chose real estate.

I am sitting at a café, looking out a window, legs crossed, reminiscing on some thing when my step-brother Jacob comes up to me and say’s “I want to ask you a question about your posture/the way you’re looking”. He looked like Tom Cruise with a sweet smile on his face and I was so happy to see him. I took his face in my hands and gave him a small peck. We smiled at each other and I woke up. I was shocked literally out the dream.

I was on a bus with other women; sitting facing a seat of two other women. The woman sitting directly across from me put her hand down my pants and smiled at me. I was confused, it was weird but erotic.

I found myself in a very elegant and new, shiny truck. I felt quite happy with myself. As I’m touring around, I am conscious of being followed. Coming to a sharp corner in a colorful wooded area, I make a quick turn only to find a car in front of me jetting me off. I became both startled and scared when I realized two men were coming after me. At this time, I managed to wake myself up.
I am given the chance to enter into another person/being in order to become stronger, more knowledgeable. This is a great, wonderful gift or opportunity. I become two in one.

Most of night I dreamt about grade school friends: one being B. He was skateboarding an obstacle course where there was one huge (18’ or so) tall wall. I was at the top of the wall and watched as he skated up the steep wall to the top. He winked at me and I said mouthing only, “good skating”. We both smiled. It was daytime, lots of people, outside, sunny, Phoenix-like area. We were aware of all the people and not wanting them to hear us.

In this setting, a number of educators have assembled and are sharing various views on the state of the system in the U.S. It seems to me I was enjoying the discussion without remembering the specifics. However, I did have the impression that I was making a valuable contribution and I w2as quite happy with myself. I wake up.

I’m dreaming of colors, colors of flowers in my backyard-reds, yellows, blues, oranges and violet. Then I go into a room. All four walls are different colors; vibrant yellow, orange, red and purple. I feel very excited and can’t wait until the next sequence starts. Then I wake up.

74. Lots of dreams, but in one part I go take a test. The teacher is Kent Adams from Adams [real estate] School. Other students are there, taking the test. I sit down and he sets the time, but I don't have a questions sheet. Everyone laughs at me. I get mad. The teacher can't find a question sheet. Finally he does and I sit down, then I have to go pee - I get mad. He says he can't reset the timer, but go ahead. He says he can't reset the timer.

I am in a house; feeling very depressed, when I hear a knock on the door. I realize Dan has bought me flowers and balloons because I had not been feeling well; to cheer me up. I was very happy and relieved.

I was at my old place of work and I came back for the day to surprise everyone. S. was there and my dad (who doesn’t work there). Saw M. and T. and warehouse guys. Woven images of a Greek figure of a horse with woman’s head; like a centaur and a Kore figure (Greek funerary or dedication statue) with specific features.
Family/Children- I am having a get-together with my children. All I remember is that we are having tons of fun.

I am in a facility that reminds me of the airport at August, Georgia. I am with a group of people who are attending a retreat. We will be walking to the retreat residence. For some reason, I miss the group as they leave. Somehow I find my way to the residence. I am joking around (making fun of myself) and Joanne gives me the thumbs-up. I don’t get a chance to talk with Joanne. I wake up.

I am heading home alone. I have two choices: I can go through the woods or I can take a winding road. Because I have a wheel barrel, I decide going through the woods would be difficult to manage. So, I end up taking the winding road. This is a good choice and I get home in record time, where I am very happy to be.

I remember waking in my bed. I had a thought or a thought experiment related to zero-point energy. Looking out my window, the early light of dawn crept in. It all makes sense. I thought of a glass of water with the energy of a thousand suns. I thought of an end to poverty, suffering, maybe even death. I sat there by myself, happy in my bed, and then I awake with no solution.

I am attending a seminar for teachers. During the seminar, I wrote a very brief essay. Somehow, the essay got circulated among the participants. People started coming up to tell me how much they enjoyed my essay. I was delighted.

I’m at a dinner with my immediate family. My mother, father and both brothers are there. We’re eating roast beef. It’s so nice to be all together. My brother Chris is laughing at my Dad’s joke. I feel happy. Ethan, my brother, is next to me. I’m eating my mom’s apple pie. I fade out.

This dream has something to do with playing baseball with my sons (two of them). This is not so much a game as it is hitting the ball to whoever is in the field. I seem to be the one who is out in the field. We are having fun. I wake up.

This scene is a school. I am attending a sporting activity, a hockey game. For some reason, I left the game early. As I was walking out , I passed a long table. Sitting on one side of the table were people manning telephones- fundraising, I believe. One of those persons was a priest friend of mine (Fr. Butch) who winked at me as I passed by. I wake up.

I am really happy with myself. I have just finished polishing my kitchen floor and hallway. This is something I have been wanting to do for weeks. Meanwhile, someone has brought me a cookie baking sheet full of baked cherries. For some reason I keep shaking the cookie sheet and the syrup from the cherries drips off the counter onto my clean floor. When I realize this, I get very aggravated. I wake up.

I’m in a room with cats. Everywhere I turn there are cats. They are friendly and well behaved. When I turn around, they all turn into kittens and are full of the dickens. I smile and laugh at their antics. I am very relaxed and feel comfortable.

I am waiting for an elevator. Eventually it arrives and I take it to the top floor. On exiting I notice that I am in a very old section of the building which is mansion-like; the rooms, very large with majestic wood paneling. I enjoy wandering from to room. I wake up.
Tom (my son) and I are looking for a job. I’m not sure why since Tom has a job and I am retired. However, we seem to be having fun in pursuing this endeavor.

It’s Christmas Eve and I’m at my Aunt Anne’s house. Everyone is in such a good mood; it feels good as the place is so alive. Kathy, Mary, and Matt are talking in a corner. Annie’s girls have beautifully decorated this place. My brother Ethan is sitting at the piano playing Christmas cards with my mom. I’m just sitting on the couch and smiling. I’m really full, happy, and tired now. I fall away. That’s it.
190. House hunting - all the people I'm working with - I help them get their houses. One neighborhood everything but a few homes burned down. I try to smooth things out so everyone is happy.

Bob and I are at the Ice Capades. We go to get a beer. He kisses me and I pull back and look at him. I feel fluttery and laugh. After the Ice Capades, he drops me off and says, “ I know you felt something too.” I tell him I don’t want to jeopardize our friendship. He tells me he wants more than a friendship. He says he will pick me up Saturday night for a party. Dress is semi-formal and to be ready at 8pm. He smiles and goes out the door. As the door shuts, I wake up.

212. I'm at some big public place and a riot starts where people with big yellow Ayatollah heads try to storm into the buildings. Everyone is afraid of Iran, but I'm not. I run outside and take a walk. In another part, I try to program an exercise machine for a five and a half minute walk, but it programs for a table soccer game instead. I want to get a refund.

This dream takes place at the parish mission (a weeklong parish retreat activity). As I look around at the participants, I find myself very happy to see a lady making the mission, for some reason I didn’t expect her to be there.

219. A contest. They ask what the prez will be eating and Jolie guessed it. She gets $350 cash and I'm a little jealous. But then I think - 'I'm very fortunate. I'm about to make a lot of money." They take a photo of the winners with their checks. It's up in a tall Building on Hollywood Boulevard. Someone in the class runs back to look out the window. It's a lot of stuff about our evil leaders - making fun of them.

I am visiting and having dinner with a husband and wife that I have known for a long time. We are having a good time. The husband has terminal cancer but I’m not aware of his appearance. Some friends come to visit him from a fraternal organization (the Elks) but he doesn’t seem happy to see them. It’s at this time that I realize how haggard and devastated he appears as a result of the cancer. I wake up.

Last night I dreamed that I was in the gym and was really anxious to check mail because I was waiting to hear from a study abroad program and Teach for America, for some reason. I found out I had been accepted to Teach for America and was really excited to tell Aaron. When he looked at my letter though, we realized that it was only a solicitation for an application, not an acceptance. I was really embarrassed. Then I woke up.

I had the weirdest dream last night! I was just hanging out with Chandler, and then we had sex! And I didn't want to tell him it was my first time, but of course he found out when I started bleeding. It was awful and afterward I hadn't wanted him to be my first, so I was really upset. Then I was trying to throw a party, but too many people came, and it was just so weird and I was really happy to wake up!

A co-worker I was attracted to, Sue, was chiding me about not following up to a porn story. I'd been researching it for a long time. I'd gotten in on the industry. The industry where we were was built on a shady dungeon... filled with water. She was working for the newspaper where I interned one summer while in college. She was writing a story in a cubicle across from me. I looked over and IM’d her. She laughed because I was right there. I looked into her eyes. I laughed. God, I wanted her.

I had such a great dream last night. Barack Obama came to my church and gave a speech. I don't remember what he said, just that he was very eloquent. Afterwards he and his wife were standing near the doors, shaking hands. I went up to shake his hand and I was so nervous! He was like 8 feet tall in my dream, but when I reached out to take his hand he gave me the sweetest smile.
Obama came to visit Howard, and he was really funny, but in a rude way -- he wouldn't put out his cigarette. I was the only person who thought it was funny and was laughing.
Hillary Clinton and I were cleaning my parents' attic. She was actually a lot of fun, and we got a lot of work done.

I dreamed Barack passed me on the street and I got excited about shouting something out to him, something memorable, but all I could think of at in that moment was You're great! I know you're going to win!"

Barack Obama hadn't been seen in a few days, and all the commentators were wondering where he was and why he wasn't out campaigning. Then suddenly he shows up at a Clinton rally, and he's campaigning for her all of a sudden. He gives this great speech about how excited he is to be on Hillary's side. I turn to the people I'm with and ask, Did she brainwash him?

I had a dream about Hillary the other night where I was campaigning for her, doing cold calls, and she walks by me and starts laughing at my afro – just really digging into me. It felt very upsetting.
I met Barack at a little rally, and everyone was happy to meet him. He was authentic and shook my hand and I felt a part of his movement.
Last night I had a dream that Barack showed up at wedding reception and did a funky-ass dance to the tune of the Jimmy Castor Bunch's funk masterpiece Troglodyte and I was sold!!!

Hillary showed up at a cook-out I was at. She was wearing a yellow pantsuit and sitting across from me at the picnic table, just eating her burger. I wanted to speak to her, but I couldn't think of anything to say. I would begin to ask her a question, but then I would just stop smile. She would smile back. The silence was super awkward, but kind of nice because we both needed the quiet time.

I became best friends with Barack Obama. We had a sleepover at his house and played board games all night, like it was middle school again. In the morning, he went to the kitchen to cook up some pancakes. While he was out of the room, I took the opportunity to call my friend on the phone, all excited, saying, You have to come over! I'm at Barack's house and we have pancakes! She replied, Yeah, whatever, me and Barack are BFF. We’re going to hang out later this afternoon.

I was walking against the current through a crowd of people and Barack was walking toward me. He was so magnetic and seemed to be emitting a golden light -- very shiny. I couldn’t look away. He smiled at me, and just as he was next to me I thought, I have to vote for Obama. Once he was gone, however, I snapped back into the "real world" and wondered what had just happened. I felt as though some spell had been cast over me, and I was pretty angry at him.

I was reading a magazine article about Hillary. Then I got to the part that read: Also, she can be cruel. She enjoys wearing $1 billion dresses, one of which is made from the fleece of an endangered penguin. There was a picture of Hillary in the penguin dress; it looked like a zip-up penguin costume made of polar fleece, and would probably keep you warm.

I was standing on an enormous stage with Obama, his family, and many other people. The sun was shining radiantly in our eyes; a huge glowing green field stretched out before us. My husband of six months and I stood behind Barack, holding hands, sturdy and joyful. I was overwhelmed with a feeling of certainty that my husband and I will have a good, happy life together.
I dreamed that I was in a room with Hillary and a bunch of other people. She was so funny that when I woke up, I was laughing.

I was working in a giant field that had been freshly tilled and Barack was showing me how to pick out the rocks from the soil and toss them to the outskirts. As I pitched my first few rocks he was very encouraging, and placed his hand on my shoulder at one point to offer me kudos for my efforts. There was a crowd of dusty onlookers that were watching him instruct me. I remember feeling excited about what we might plant there.

Hillary rang my doorbell at 5:30 in the morning and presented me with a box of blue placemats and some condiments. She seemed tired, like she'd been campaigning all night, but also professional and serious. I took the placemats and condiments because I was helping with a fundraiser. I looked outside to see my neighbors setting up tables outside and making sandwiches to sell to raise money for Hillary.
Hillary and I were taking a standardized test. Instead of filling in the bubbles, Hillary was drawing earrings on the answer sheet. I thought, That looks like fun.

Barack and I had plans to drive to the outlet mall that afternoon. As we left my house and walked toward my husband’s Ford Explorer, we laughed like two old friends. He gave me a playful nudge and said, I just love you! This made me ridiculously happy. When we reached the car, he had trouble fitting into the passenger seat because his legs were so long. The back seat was down and needed lifting. I was afraid he would make me lift it by myself, but he helped me. Then we drove to the mall.

Well, without going into ALL of the details, basically the brain uses dreams to move short term memories into long term memory. As the brain "shuffles through" recent events in short term memory, other parts of the brain try to make connections between these random elements. and the higher functions of the brain perceive it as the ongoing narrative of a dream.

Something about getting on the right on-ramp to get home from San Francisco….I am watching whoever is driving our car make the right decision, get on the right street….I am relieved….my wife will be happy, too….Another young woman is watching this, observing what is happening?....Next up is a choice for cats to make about which way to go….

I am in a house with other people around….At one point I am in a room, near another woman….She can see me, through an adjacent window….So I make a point of walking around, fiddling with my cell phone….I wonder, will she look at me?....At another point, I see an African-American woman with a big smile….Like it is Angie from the tv show “All My Children”….I am glad she is so happy….

I am with people out at some rural property….There is snow everywhere, and I go down a trail covered in white snow….It seems the rest of my family is coming down the trail next after me….I slide down the snow, it is fun and enjoyable, but I worry the others might get hurt….At one point I see Strauss our cat, he is sick?....
I am swimming out in the ocean water toward someone….I will stand with them out there….The water is not very deep, it feels pleasant, I am enjoying myself….

I see a brief image of a woman, rather short and plump, getting ready for something….She is getting dressed….I think, she is kind of like football players getting ready to put on their pads….I am nice to her, she smiles….
Something about Jerry Seinfeld buying lots of property and fixing things up….He is doing well, it makes him happy….

I am at the sea shore, up in some sand dunes….I am looking out at big waves coming in….Those would be fun to ride, I think to myself….At some point I am going up some stairs, and I stumble a little bit….I am trying to get around some people?....

I am shooting a BB gun at some far objects, like at the ranch….The objects are very far away, so I cannot tell if I am hitting them….I keep waiting to hear a pinging sound, but none comes….But it is fun trying anyway….At some other point I am in a house, someone’s room, and a woman is going to sleep….She gets undressed, and I can see her mostly naked body….She is attractive, but I do not want to embarrass her, so I look away….

I am down in the valley clearing things, it is looking good….Now I can see some things from elsewhere that have fallen here….Like a part of an airplane?....I am intrigued, and excited about the new mysteries to explore on the land….
I am telling someone about our cats at the ranch….They are happy, roaming about….As it should be, I think….
I am out at some place, maybe the ranch, and suddenly a bunch of college friends are there….Bill, Katja, Melissa….I am happy and want to talk with them, but we have some things to do first….

I am going down some hill, and out from some trees to the right side comes a big wolf….wow, we stop to admire it….It is big, with thick gray fur, very alert and healthy looking….I am impressed by its health and vitality….It makes me happy to see such a rare creature….

It seems that the ranch is taken over by a little impish guy, very short and strange looking, but he has an attractive, charismatic smile….he comes with others to an area with lots of brush, trees….He is going to take charge, control things….cut things down….At another point, a joke about 4 or 5 other people equaling one of the new ones….who is a Catholic priest, so it is a joke about how fat such priests get to be?....

Some kind of baseball game is happening….just a few people playing, in a building?....My team is ahead in the score, 1-0….Then a person on my team makes a bad play….the ball bounces away, and one of their runners rounds second, rounds third, and heads for home plate….Before he can get there, I playfully stop him, and push him off the base path….they will count the run anyway, but it is kind of a joke by me to do that….
A prince is making us merge our property with someone else’s property….I am unhappy, but we have to do it….

Some kids are holding onto ropes, going up high in the sky….I set one of them off on his journey….It is rather dangerous?....Then I see one of them coming down again….I go to him as he lands in a beautiful green garden….I am so happy he is back on the ground….

Lots of images of two sides of a debate….switching from one side to the other a lot….it is confusing….earlier, weird sex scenes with my wife, Bud, Morgan….more confusion, I cannot figure out why this is happening, even though others seem happy….

It is like the whole database has been taken apart, and now I have to put it back together….Some sexual vibe, flirting between me and a woman….she is attractive and straight in her appearance?....Earlier, I am driving a car up and over a hill….Two bikes are going to race us down….One of them is Ruth....I am surprised, and so is she….In these circumstances it is hard to talk or hug in greeting, so we smile and say hi to each other, and then I keep going….

“Visit from Tate” Woke up as a result of this dream. Tater had visited me. He came to me running with a face of joy, tongue hanging out, his face lit up. He ran to my feet and looked up at me and was smiling. I have a real understanding of pure love and joy.

Something about people out at the ranch, young women….We are doing things that diminish their fun?....We can avoid that….Later, going into a shop, the owner is not there….Other people are crowded into a small space to wait…I am second in line, and I make sure as we all move into the store, that that is clear….
Tater is licking my face very vigorously, as he did when he was very excited. He is licking the whole right side of my face and all around my eye trying to get my attention. It woke me up.

Andy and April from the television show Parks and Recreation post something about me on social media….on facebook and other internet sites….They do not get the information right, so I need to correct it somehow….But it is getting lots of attention, so that is good, I am happy about that….

“Opossums” It was a thick, pretty, older rug with patterns of brown. I am walking across it with Tater and as we do there is a small area that starts to wiggle. I say,”Tater, look!” He runs over just as opossums start to come out. Then the opossum shrieks, Tater shrieked, and then I shrieked. I feel happy and silly about this!

A woman news reporter is waiting for the results of something, or an interview with someone….She is excited and expectant….But no one comes….I am concerned for her, and I start to wonder, is she being tricked?....
We and some other people are excited about the delivery of new tractors….shiny black metal ones….it is fun equipment and machinery to have, learn how to use….

I am playing baseball with other people….I am running the bases on a hit, and I come around to home and score….another guy is behind me, running from second to third base….The little white ball bounces away from the shortstop, and the runner rounds third and sprints home so fast he’s safe….We high-five in celebration….I say dude, you were going so fast!....that was amazing….I say it again when we get into the dugout with the other players….

Something about old train tracks coming to an end point….I see the tracks set in the dark ground….At another point, I see Zach de la Rocha at a store….I say to him my wife said his band just played for fun, but I know they wanted to change the world….Zach seems to agree with me….As we talk, I fill a glass with ice….I keep filling it, much higher than the top of the glass, too much ice, it finally overflows at the end and falls to the floor….
Like it’s Easter, and lots of little kids are running around, bursting out with energy….very happy….I see an image of empty plastic Tupperware containers….ready to be filled?....

Something about Andy and April….They leave some white papers out in a shed or barn, which is partly open to the outside….Later it seems the papers will get wet from the rain, but when they go to check, the papers are all put away….that is a good thing, it makes us happy….

I hear about a city that burns 27,000 people….it is horrible, I am upset by it….At another point, I am sitting in the dining room of our house here, talking on a cell phone….Out the window I see a couple of women and children coming from the driveway, like a little parade….Then they realize it is a house, not a through street, and they slow down….They turn around, worried….but I smile in a friendly way and tell them it is ok….
“Rob” I am at Robbie’s, he’s on a health kick. We have a funny ordinary conversation, joking, that I am a hit man for him. I get people that have more than him.

my wife and I start fooling around….I am happy about it….At some point, Leonard and Sheldon from the tv show “Big Bang Theory” stop competing, and they join forces in a house I seem to know….They are happy….it seems like a good solution….

Four companies have been chosen for a new round of funding and support….they are in the business of making films?....One of the companies helps me, and another one helps Alex….They are amateurs, but helpful….Something about one of them uses kitchen towels to help….it seems like it is time to put the towels into the washing machine….
I had a dream about flying high in a desert and suddenly amidst people from my school days. They all looked happy to see me and we went about our separate ways

Something about a village of Spanish people….I am doing a study of them….they are a fascinating group, I am excited to learn more about them….Lots of Muslims are involved, too, living with them….they have longer, smooth faces?....Something about a scholar can only study them if using one’s own photos, which is a challenge….But I can handle it….At another point, I see a huge old tree, with a massively thick, dark brown trunk, and I wonder if the tree is being cared for properly….

I find out something about Donald Trump….I go running through a hall, like a dorm or apartment building, to tell other people about it….at some point a spotted snow white leopard runs out from a door to my right and starts running along with me on my left….The leopard is playfully nipping at my hand with its teeth….I can tell the animal is friendly, but I realize I have to be careful, it is a powerful beast….

Someone in a position of authority makes a decision about adding drums to the music for some kind of signaling purpose….the reason is to make it a stronger message?....At another point, someone is holding a large radish, part of something they are doing with other radishes….It is a big red radish, with a funny curved shape….It is an amusing sight….

I am caught up in some kind of family dispute….a rich family, trying to assimilate someone new?....They are trying to add a poor woman to a rich woman….I seem to see them as two white rectangles with soft edges, trying to find a way to make them fit or line up with each other….Everyone else in the family is angry, alarmed, and opposed to it….I help facilitate?....the plan does not turn out exactly as hoped, but it is ok in the end….I am happy with the outcome….
I go into the kitchen and there is a lot of food garbage on the floor….Is this caused by the mouse?....I am unhappy, mad, and distressed about all the clean up that will be required….

We get the sudden, shocking news that Lady Edith from the tv show Downton Abbey has another child….a blond child, maybe five or six years old….No one knew….but it is a big change, like a clean, smooth shift in the system….all sorts of new possibilities emerge….Everyone is happy, excited, looking forward to helping the child become part of the whole clan….Something clean, neat about it….

I am walking with some people, smart guys….We are talking about big things….but the tone of the conversation is amusing, rather absurd….we are in happy moods….At first, we are walking along one side of a road, and a bunch of girls are walking on the other side….Later, I walk along the path where they were earlier, on that side of the road….I find it interesting….I think to myself, so this is what it is like for them….
Lots of action going down a river….It is fun, fast, wild, I am happy about it….all of our things are on a raft….

Something about a tree, with a ball of knotty, tangled roots in its middle, just where the trunk splits into the branches….It’s a special tree somehow….I see rows of other trees, smoother and more uniform….there is something political about this?....it seems to be in Washington, D.C….At the end, I have an image of swimming in an ocean, in Hawaii….This is not what I am supposed to be doing in terms of work and activities, but it is a fun break, I am happy and enjoying it….

A couple of young women are in a independent situation….They have their own food and other necessities….but they are not going to vote for Bernie Sanders....They are going to vote for Hillary Clinton instead, that is their decision….The two women are making their own choices, which I am happy about….

15. First I take some friends for a tour and it's successful. I go back to a cabin where I live with a few friends. I go through it opening doors and turning things on, like a pillow that inflates, and other things. A friend who lives there will get her own cottage. A fun dream.

Something about an election, people at the top are not steady?....Then I am looking into a brown wooden cabinet, placed on a wall in a house….I wonder, is it a cabinet of curiosities?....excited, I open it up, but no, it is empty, I am disappointed….

I see someone out in a green grass field with some animals around….cats, maybe others….they look frolicsome to me….playful, active, happy, having fun with each other….Then, at another point I am driving in a car, and people are going fast, trying to get somewhere….somehow it is Trump related?....A couple of people pass me on the right side as lanes are merging….They are aggressive moves, but I stay calm….

I see two long parallel lines of people….They are all connected to something, like they have an electronic device on their necks, with little lights?....The people are happy, doing their own things….But they are also part of a bigger process….

Somehow we end up buying not the new timber land, but a gift shop and small visiting place….It is more than we anticipated….A store, building, how are we going to manage?....I wonder if it will work out….It is beautiful and cool, but lots of work, too much for now….Allie is happy though….She really likes the place….

Someone we know, like our queen or princess, is being held hostage somewhere, inside something….But when two people, Spaniards, a man and a woman, hear where she is, they do not think of helping her escape….no, they get excited about putting on wigs and going the explore the place….I am surprised….They put on different wigs….the guy puts on one with a long blond pony tail….
I am walking along outside with some Spanish guys….They have a good idea for naming the woman at the center of a story, taking care of her….The main Spanish guy is happy with this plan….

Some wealthy guy is helping us doing something….He funds a translation of something into a new language….That is fine, but I wonder if he wants to do more?....like translate new things, or take the texts in a new direction....That might complicate our plans….

49. Staying at a place like a boarding school. In one part Dave is there. We have all this fun work to do, and everyone piles up together and works. In another part I drop off my ward to be cared for at the place. They charge a lot, and if he needs extra attention, it costs more.
As part of a longer dream, I see someone drop something….socks?....I decide to help, get the socks and give them back….Another person assists me by telling me who to talk to….I am in a happy mood….

Eric Cantor is running around trying to make best the of the basketball score….It is like he wants to come out on the winning side, but he is unsure how to make that happen, and I sense it probably will not, he will end up losing….Earlier, I see basketball players trying to show what they do….It is a close game, unclear who won….The playing is of good quality, and I have a happy feeling about it all….
I see two rectangular pieces of pink chewing gum on a shiny metal paper towel dispenser….I wonder, who put them there?....At some point, people are walking….There is a good, happy mood….

Lots about Lucrecia’s family….What were they like….I see images of them dealing with clothes….food….I see a boy do something with a red can of Coke soda?....They seem like a nice family, happy where they are….
A woman gets a fancy chrome plated rifle or machine gun….I am surprised, and wonder why she needs a weapon like that?....Then, something about Kevin Love doing well in basketball, he is happy….

67. I go someplace with a couple friends. A woman there wants to film me, so we go all around with her camera. Then it's time to leave. I see them take off in a funny car, pulling a trailer like a studio sightseeing train. I run after them. They see me and stop, but I have to crowd in. Then one of my friends says what about Washington? There's a party there that night.

73. I own a big company and my partner wants to divide everything up. I think that's okay, but I want to be methodical - get the attorneys to go over all the paperwork. It's an uplifting feeling that finally what's mine will become mine and I can enjoy it.

I have a friend or companion….I see our neighbor’s house has an empty basement area….I think of how I could have the person stay there, no one would know….The person could do sneaky things for me….I like that idea, it makes me happy….Earlier: My father-in-law realizes he can do something he could not do before….somehow it involves small brown wall panels in a house, smaller in size than expected?....a good fortune for him….Now he is going to be with us more often, and more actively….

Some kid with a suitcase full of things comes into a house….We let him inside, expecting one thing, but he turns out to do surprising things, not what we expected….Weird stuff he pulls out of the suitcase….little boxes?....Other people are somewhat perturbed, unsure about this, but not me, I am happy about it, intrigued….

Lots of people and family members join the campaign against Donald Trump….Everyone has lots of enthusiasm, positive energy to defeat him, I am happy we are together on this….People are looking beyond the first level of arguments to deeper, stronger points of view….Like we are all looking at a big book, and when we turn the page we see the new, better arguments….

Something about preparing a speech at school to give about Donald Trump….There is so much material to work with in arguing against him….The research is fun, we enjoy it….We are looking stuff up, gathering material….At one point a person is walking down a dark path with lots of things happening on either side, thinking about how to approach the speech….a positive energy to the process….

Mom and dad get ready to do some kind of critical project, in which they analyze and criticize something in order to help it improve....They are excited, looking forward to it....At another point, I have a bowl of salad before me and a plate....Bud or some other guy takes a piece of salad from my plate and puts it back in the bowl....To get ready to clear the dishes?....I am irked, annoyed....I am not ready to finish yet....

I look out a window and see a big crane moving….A woman is on it….and the boy Louis, from the tv show The Returned….He looks happy, playful….I lean my head out the window to ask how they are doing….Fine, they say….I am sitting with a group of people in a small space, a room or outdoor patio….I am about to hear someone give a talk….I wonder if I have time to get a joint….It is ok to smoke it here, no problems with legality….But I do not have enough time….

Lots of agitated dreaming….I am trying to arrange for two people to have big welcome ceremonies at the conference, but I messed up the scheduling….Lots of running around, trying to think of a solution that does not disappoint everyone….I am failing, and unhappy about it….

I am in a room by myself….A man put me there, or he knows I am there….I am doing something with dreams….A big wooden log, like a fallen tree, crosses the room diagonally at about chest height….it might seem like a distraction or obstacle, but I am fine with it there, happy to keep it as a feature of the room….I do not want it cut….

I dreamed I was in a wheelchair that Donald Trump had invented. It had big wheels that could go up and down stairs very quickly and easily. I was able to stand and walk, but enjoyed riding around in this chair.
Some kind of announcement is made about a big new development at the ranch….Someone tells us (me and my wife?) about it, two parts that both worked out….We are surprised, happy….

A scene in which Hillary Clinton is getting the Presidential nomination, and everyone is very happy….To show that she has won, people gather to share these long thin clear tubes filled with fine black granules, like sand, or caviar….It is surprising, but it is meant to show support….Then I am thinking about a team of her supporters who will be going out with her and these tubes, doing other events to help other people get to know her….I want to join them and help out….

A bunch of children are accused of something bad….like they were cheating in the Olympics, in their sports events?....they seem to be athletes....I am on the side of defending them….it is a long process, lots of challenges….The kids are not well organized….But I am sure they are in the right….At some point my wife has a little pouch on a belt, she is happy with it….A little change purse?....round, and blue in color….

Something about me protecting kids, keeping them safe….I talk with one of them, trying to be reassuring….At some point a big glass bowl or bottle falls on the floor and breaks….Later, I see a big white ceramic bowl like a funnel, and a couple of other smaller things like it….This is from the camping my brother and his family did recently at the ranch, their toilet gear?....I wonder how they cleaned it….Could you ever scrub it well enough in a sink to feel sure it was really clean?....

Somehow I and my wife and maybe the rest of the family are running a summer camp….outside in the woods….I am unsure how to do so….But everyone is having fun doing things together….Lots of people around, they seem to know what to do….There are little books and white pages of information to guide them….I am surprised about the information that takes care of all the people’s questions, I have no idea where it came from….

Something about me and someone else training people on behalf of the king….We enjoy it, it is fun, and we are doing a good job….At some point I have to deal with a snake on the path….I pick it up with my left hand, it bites me hard….But it does not hurt me, and I do not let go, until I can safely place it on the side of the path….It is a little green snake….

Something about starting a new play….In this production, there will be at least two direct connections with current life….Not totally separate, like it usually is?....so this is a surprising and positive development….the main actress in the show is happy about that, which I feel is a good sign, it makes me happy, too….
Lots about fishing along the creeks….three special places?....I have a happy feeling about them….Someone is in my study, points to an antique teacup on a bookshelf….

It was only there for a few seconds, but it was a very good dream that I much enjoyed. I was shaking God Emperor Trump's hand, and we exchanged some kind words, however I can no longer remember what those words were. All in all, I enjoyed the dream :D

There are three different conditions for sleep….I am in a study, a research project about how people do in each one of the conditions….I am confused….At some point an issue arises around a theft or misbehavior, doing things against the rules?....Later, I am on a stairway, and Levi our cat is playing with a ball….He is very frisky, unusually so….I am surprised and pleased….it is fun to play with him like this….

Had a Dream Donald Trump came to visit me, he was real nice. He ask me how I was and I said I was struggling financially and didn't want to loose my house.I mentioned to him how I had struggled being a single parent in past. I said I'm not saying this for you to give me money. He was dressed in suit and top coat. We had fun and danced. (could be because I mentioned at work I wanted to be at the inauguration on my birthday January 20th).

I was in a swamped crowed of people sitting in anticipation at a stadium for the results to be drawn, the curtains drew. Donald Trump won. For some reason everyone in the crowd was overly excited and jumping in fits of joy over his victory.

Lots of people are around….We are having another wedding?....my wife is in a beautiful white dress….I see her standing in the doorway of a church?....I am very excited….But it has to wait for other people who do not like us to do what they are doing….it is annoying to me, but there is nothing we can do about it….Then I see the bouquet of flowers appear, more whites and greens….I wonder if I should go get the bouquet, but my wife does so first….

It was a very long dream, and Donald Trump was only a part of it. I remember he was courting me, he was very sweet to me, and wanted to have an affair with me. I knew we had so much age gap, and that I am not suited to be his wife, so I just laughed but I was flattered that he was being that way to me. I dont want to have an affair with him though. lol

Lots of shifting, moving around….something goes….I am romantic with some women?....I bring Helmut and Bert to Portland to meet people….my old friends connecting with my new ones?....I am happy to have old friends to bring….An old professor is mimicking various actions, like walking a dog….he does this on his knees….I am in a small crowd of people watching him, it is funny, we are amused….

A woman wants to have a celebration….it is the first day without an accident, or a wartime death?....That is a good idea, I think….Later, I see someone carrying a saddle for a horse, as if they are bringing it for carry-on luggage for an airplane….The person, a woman I think, I holding it out on her left arm, with a blanket….I wonder what it is for, why she is bringing it on a plane….it must be heavy to hold the saddle out in her arm like that….

I'm riding a turquoise bicycle with a flat tire through steep streets in New York City and my friend saw me from her balcony and said "come on up I'm meeting Donald"...so I could tell we were all friends. I ditched my bike and Donald pulled up and I said "hey Donald how's it going what are you here to talk to my friend about" and he said "we're meeting to talk about our new salsa company" and I laughed and said "that's awesome you can make any company successful."
Someone moves me and other people from one place to another….From a broken thing to one that works?....It has to do with writing….For some reason I am happy about it….

There is lots of ice on the driveway….A boy and a girl are upset….I say I will help, and I tell them we can spend one hundred thousand dollars on it….They are happy….But I realize we actually have to do this now….we have to make major repairs….I think of how a layer of candied carrots might help?....I see a metal tray with orange carrots going into an oven….That would be cool, I think to myself….but weird, too….

We are doing lots of work, clearing down in the valley at the ranch….it is lots of fun, and we are very productive in our work….But then we hear there are people down there, we have to make trails for them?....It turns out to be a much different process for people living there….A strange development on our property….At a later point I worry about some stacks of newspaper left by the fire place stove in the studio….I am worried they will catch fire….

Something about working with a math system of all words, no numbers….it is weird and confusing but also interesting and enjoyable….we do a couple of calculations, and they seem to go fine….But a guy, the third member of our group, finds the results disappointing, and he walks away….

I am going up a trail in a snowy white creek area….I see some boxes or rectangles of green vegetation….These are things to be planted….It is a good idea….I discuss with someone the process of planting things in these areas….It seems like a fun, cool idea, but we have some concerns, worries, questions about the locations….Will the plants do well and thrive there?....Is it too soon to be doing this?....Are the metal bands around the rectangles strong enough to hold them in place?....

Something is wrong with my Twitter account….there is a security problem, and I can no longer be sure others are prevented from getting into it….It makes me anxious, and I wonder how bad the problem will get….Eventually it is fixed, and I have control of the account again….I am relieved….At another point I see Thunder our cat, walking along, and I am surprised and happy to see her….I wonder where she is going….

I wake up from sleep earlier than everyone else, and I begin to go for a walk….It is beautiful in the pre-dawn light….Going away from the houses, out into the forest….I know I am giving up on some sleep, which I mildly regret, but it is such a special time to be up, I am happy to wander around….

I am walking down a street, and I see several people wearing superhero outfits….Pairs of parents and children….It seems odd to me, I wonder why they are dressed like that….At another point, I am involved in an office flirtation or romance with an attractive woman who also works in the office….We talk and laugh a lot….
1st dream- Donald Trump became my housemate. My room mates and I were all very unhappy about it, however we tried to be polite.

Some people are setting up a play for us….We are excited and curious….Me and a guy?....But first, the actors have to take care of some other theatre business….They are doing two scenes from earlier?....I know these scenes, they are familiar and I want to get past them to the new material….I tell myself to have patience….At another point I have a stick in my hand, and a little bird’s head pops out of it and looks around….I am surprised….The head is coming out of the wood of the stick….

I am part of team gathering lots of people, bringing them inside from outside, for some kind of training to change the way they function, behave….A black woman is among them?....Some people have a good aptitude for the new way of doing things….

my wife and I see a play in a theater, it is amazing, very enjoyable….But it seems the people producing and acting in the show are uncertain and do not know what to do about the aftermath….How to expand the effects of the play to society….It is like they want me to do things to help, to publicize the show in two different places….I know there is much more that could be done….Take it outside in the rain?....They are missing additional dimensions or extensions….
I am in an OSF play of some kind, with other performers….We are working out how to perform it….I am happy, engaged in the process….

I am helping with OSF scripts, reading and editing them….There is a flow of work with lots of other OSF people involved….I am engaged in the work, happy….Later, a dog sniffs at my feet?....I wonder what it is smelling…

I am with a woman in a very intimate setting….Under some blankets?....I pull gently up on the top of her thong underwear, accentuating the smooth skin of her ass which I caress….it is very sexually arousing for both of us….Something about the songs of Fleetwood Mac?....I am happy with this special, almost secret relationship….she likes me, we are going to have sex with each other….close and in sync….

I am working at a table, with lots of papers and files….I am shifting things from one system to another?....It is a big project….At some point one guy is with me, and another guy arrives….They hug and are happy to be together….I wonder, are they romantic with each other?....One of them invents a skateboard that has a partial roof or sun shade over the back part of it….It looks cool, but I wonder how practical it is….

I am excited about starting something….To show how much, I throw books around outside….hardback books….Other people are alarmed, they think I am being wasteful….But I reassure them it is ok….They are old books, and I will pick them up later….Later, in a room, some guy is mad at someone….He grabs them by the head and squeezes; suddenly he crushes the head, killing the person….I am shocked, sickened, and upset by this, and I turn my view away quickly….

Lots of positive, constructive dreaming….making good connections….I see white tubes coming down from above, and people are adding things to the bottom of the tubes that were not originally there, but improve and extend what the tubes are doing….it makes me happy….Later, someone is driving me in a car….The driver cuts quickly to the right lane, just missing a stopped line of cars in the left lane….I think disapprovingly, that was a very dangerous maneuver, we could easily have had an accident….

A woman and I are doing something together on the periphery of bigger activities….Our work is enjoyable….Other people are building things, wooden fences?....We are doing our thing outside of that, but near it….

I am getting ready to give a lecture, but there are problems….I see an image of Obama, young, his shirt off, shiny black skin….He looks happy, standing somewhere outside, maybe a beach….Earlier, someone gets into my desk, messes things up….My colored pens and pencils; I see them pointing up, like a fan of color….
I am doing things with Shakespeare, studying the plays….It has an unexpected relevance in dealing with bad guys in the political realm….It was fun before, now it is especially gratifying….

I am giving a lecture, and people are eager and excited….But they do not know I am going to talk about things they will not like….Later, after the lecture, a woman tries to make it right with the others, calm them down….At some point I see a golden field of meadow grass….

Lots of people are going to a house….it is creepy….Zombie people are there….But then once I am there, I become a zombie, too, and I start taking care of the house….Everyone brings an extra piece of land, like in a small rectangle, like a metal cookie sheet….The new land becomes a new part of the house….By the end, it is a big, smoothly functioning place….

Some person with great power has lots of shoes….One pair is black and white, with all of the elements from the periodic table on them….The two letter abbreviations, plus other atomic information, all in little squares all over the shoes….it is very cool and creative, I am impressed….Someone else thinks the shoes are too flashy, extravagant….But I say it is better to have this person happy rather than agitated….better for all of us….
I am driving around in a car with a woman….We are going to have sex at some time in the near future, we are both feeling it….It is a happy feeling….

A bunch of nature scenarios have been set up for us….Beautiful, cool….But Michelle does not like one of them….Sorry, it cannot be changed….They float down from the sky, like magical gifts….I think it’s cool….At another point I see purple dots coming down over a white house….I like it, the effect is fun and playful….

I am walking with some people down a street in a small city….Suddenly I realize two gangs of guys are having a fight, and we have walked right into the middle of it….Scared, I go hide in a doorway, curl up in a fetal position….They all have guns, but there is no shooting yet….Later, or maybe before, one of my people is very happy walking around….Like on a Main Street of a town….

A big black fly is buzzing around….Heather is doing lots of things here, very good work, it makes me happy….Later, I have a green beer bottle….The label suddenly comes off….I wonder, now what?....I realize it does not really matter, I still am not going to drink it….
I am sitting at a dining table with the family….Someone is serving us, and doing a good job….It makes me happy….

I send a tiny woman, no more than a foot tall, wearing workout clothes, on a little raft down a creek….She looks cute in that outfit….She seems happy about floating down the water….Later, I go to a house to do something, but lots of people are there….I see others returning from a walk outside….I do not want them to know something I know, so I leave….I have some knowledge that is important, but cannot be shared in this setting….

Something about a final little act of a play, with random people poking their heads through a hole in the floor, and doing a little play of their own….It is fun, brief, informal….I do it with great enthusiasm, fun….Although I am unsure how it will go, it is all improvised….

A young woman suddenly gets a new, bigger white bra….She is surprised and happy, as she admires her bigger bust under her shirt….I am happy for her, too….Later, I am on a stage with a guitar, as if I was in front of an audience….Pointing up to special people in the crowd, then playing a big chord just for them….At the very end, I am sitting at the dinner table with other family members….Levi the cat jumps up in the air so he can see what we are eating….I find it amusing….

A play is going on, in a space or theater we manage, and for some reason we cannot sell tickets, communicate about it in normal ways, or make any money on it….I am confused at first….But then it seems liberating….Everyone involved in the play is happy, and wants us to go to the performance….At some point an animal is around….

I am in someone’s bedroom where a television show is recorded….No one is there, but I see a big black square window in the wall where people can view what is happening in the room….I came into the room by accident, and I decide I should leave….I do not like that window, I am suspicious of it….Later, I see a funny sign, for a bus or some kind of transportation: all commuters have to bring a paddle….

Out in fields there are long tubes, flesh colored, with things growing out of them….This is an exhibit or project of the new president….He is proud of it, happy….But lots of women who work there are unhappy….This is not what they want….One of the women wonders if she can get married after this….Is it against the law for her to get married after the work she has done here?….

Al and I are doing lots of good editing together….new scenes, adding good new material, it is a positive feeling….Later, my wife and I are talking about tables, and I tell her I would like to use one from our recent filming, a square table, made of light tan wood, with two leaves at either end that fold up or down at the side….It is very cool and functional, I like it….Other tables are around, but I like this one best, and I think my wife does, too….

I am helping to move Jones and his wife’s stuff out of their house….A good, happy feeling, this is a good thing to do….Jones' daughter is there….At some point I see amid all the books there is a thin translucent wire like subtle earphones….I pull it out, and marvel at it….A special way to communicate, keep talking?….

I am helping a guy create a new space and program on sleep….Two big, long-necked dinosaurs are around….One of them puts its mouth right above my head, in a friendly way….They are part of the sleep-promoting process….At another point, two women are around, too….Setting up a space that was previously unused, to do this project….It is informative, fun, actively teaching good things….

I am with my wife somewhere inside….She wants to sit on my lap, and I am excited and try to move to make it easier for her to settle onto me in a sexually arousing way….We prefer to be private, we do not want other people to see, but it is a very pleasurable situation….

There are columns and tubes of white pillows....Part of Jordan Peterson's public teaching, set up to keep him protected....I am skeptical about it....Later, I am outside and a woman affectionately grabs me from behind and hugs me....I bend forward and down so she presses on me more tightly, and her long bright red curly hair falls over my head and face....We are laughing, it is a very sexually arousing moment for us both....

Cam is doing things, but he gets more responsibility than he wants….Other people are supposed to come and be in charge, but it is just him….He is unhappy about that….Now he has to take care of two or three other things, it makes him flustered….A little dog is somewhere around?....I see a large oval silver platter, with some food on it….At another point, I see lots of discarded signs, for directions….Pointing to Cleveland?....

There is some kind of written document I do not like, it gets my identity wrong….I am angry about it, and I do not like it when the document goes public….Something about a couple, a man and woman, they are romantic….I am happy for them, but somehow they are part of the bigger problem and mis-identification….

It is suddenly announced that I am the head of the new Artistic Director search at OSF….This is surprising news, but fun….OK, I will do it, I agree….Lots of people are already helping, so it will not be that hard….What an energizing project!....I am surprised but excited….Later, someone gives me a tray of plants in little containers….Hmmm, it looks like they need to be watered, they seem rather dry….But I realize I can do that, I can take care of them, planting and watering them….

Lots of people in the family are trying to tell my nephew Henry what to do….They put out many ideas and options….I tell everyone to let him do what he wants….Later, I get someplace, and I do something I like, it makes me happy….but then lots of people come, and the space turns into a cafeteria….noisy, crowded, serving and eating food….I am disappointed by the change….

A woman gives me a big black bag, like a backpack….I am surprised it has so many pockets and sections, more than I expected….Later, I think of making a bag with extra material from some clothing….So they match….I am happy with that, it seems like a good idea to me….Later, I am getting ready to drive somewhere, take a trip….

We help our friend Lou Reed to get somewhere….it is a hassle, difficulties along the way, but we eventually succeed….he is going to talk to the Queen, and he says he will make a joke about how much he enjoys being morbidly gay….He wants to start planning a party or celebration of some kind….he is happy….Earlier, I am helping to set up a gathering or meeting for a woman….

There is a brown paper bag out by the front gate at our house here in Portland, by the green hedge….I wonder what it is there for….I look inside, and it has lots of little things in it, dry goods, snacks, food items, napkins, little cups, etc….Later, someone tells me it is a give-away bag….Anyone who wants something can take it….I think that’s nice, what a kind gesture, like a gift bag….At some point, my wife is taking the lead with something….I am happy to follow her….
I am with Terefina, on a long journey or process of some kind….it seems interesting, I am glad we are doing this together….At some point I am romantic with a woman, we are very happy together….

Some big brown cardboard boxes arrive at our house….But somehow this is not what we wanted….I say to the family I will deal with it….At another point I am looking towards our pool, and a river otter suddenly pops its head out of the water….I am surprised and amazed, how cool….Later I see that Felicity has the New York Times newspaper, in paper form….I am glad, that is a happy surprise, I am grateful to her….

A disabled woman has a small triangular patch of land to cultivate….She is going to grow cannabis….it seems like a good plan, I support her….there is a happy vibe around it….Somehow this is related to three round layers of cake, like for a cake….There is some paper related to the planning for the layers, but the paper is wet and soggy, which makes it difficult to hold and use….At some point a guy comes over to help her….

Something about little swarms of bees outside….Also, I see owls and hawks, setting up their nests on a fence pole, one of the gray ones at the ranch?....Later, I find out Haley is planning a to start a computer academy, like an internet school, to teach kids online….She seems happy and well….I am so relieved for her….

Someone, a guy, is shifting the program here at our house, to an all non-Shakespeare program….This will be better for that guy, it makes him happy, but it is not what I would do….At some point, a little gray cat is in danger somehow….I wonder how I can help protect it….

We are trying to set up a show of Romeo and Juliet, but it is complicated and frustrating, nothing works as it should….This goes on and on, constant shifts and frustrations….We are trying to prepare things for an older woman, this is all intended to make her happy?....

I walk with a dark-haired woman somewhere….We are together and happy….We come to a new place where a black guy and two other people of color should be coming in….Everything is set for their entry into the space….But then the white men who run this, they do not like what is happening, it angers them, and they are thinking about changing it so he cannot come in….to me that seems blatantly unfair of them….

Someone is given a choice between going on with everything like normal, or realizing everything is fake….The person goes with the truth….Now what?....that’s what everyone wonders....Later, a girl has a binder or notebook with a cute, curvy picture of Darth Vader on the cover….the colors are white and pastel blue and pink….That’s kind of funny, I think as I look at it….I like it….

I am with a bunch of people, like the Oklahoma! cast….Someone wants a special flower that grows nearby….A small bud of a flower that looks small now but will grow much more….Instead of picking one of the flowers, I pick a bunch in a variety of colors, yellow, red….I put the buds on a white plate, as a present for them….They like it, are happy about it….

I am setting up a theater with some other people, it is fun….Later, I am in a line of people waiting to go up to a long counter to one of the many service people….They are all wearing gray jumpsuits….I am at the counter talking to a Chinese woman….I realize most people, when they reach the front of the line, go to the service person who is an attractive white blond woman….Next they go to a white guy….Most people seem to avoid the one I am with, a woman of color….

I am just starting to coach a girl’s lacrosse team….Out on the field, I tell them we will have a fun season….Before the coach was not as nice?....Some kind of group is gathered….There is a moment of reflection happening….I go sit by dad, he is lying down, and I start crying….Later, I am running down a road in a forest area….Towards a parked car?....I am with Condi, I say let’s go down this trail, it will be fun….

I go into these ancient architectural monuments, palaces, public structures….They are works of art themselves….They are somehow self-creating, a magical power of growing on their own….The entrances are the simplest and smallest, then the inside is vast, complex, beautiful….Marble, jewels, lights….it is amazing, beautiful, I am very happy and impressed by it all….

I am doing some things, sitting on the ground outside….Someone comes to help me with each of the things, in different places….it has to do with pretty little crystal or glass objects, like candle holders?....I am happy about it, happy for the help….

There was a small bridge that I had to cross. The [river] was very deep. I sat down [on] the bridge and slowly crossed. [The bridge] had no sidebars but I crossed it. After that, I saw some people celebrating and happy. Then I also started celebrating happily with them. Then I woke up.
I saw a very bright-clothes-wearing Jesus. He came to meet me and at that time in my heart some joy came.

One day in my dream I saw a big wall. That wall was holding lots of water. The water was blue, clear and pure. In the dream my friends and I were enjoying playing with the water. And also on the wall was a small pond where there was some water.
After walking a lot I arrived in a temple and was doing worship. At that time, I had a vision of the goddess. There was no limit of my joy.

I saw a dream… in the dream what I saw is that [my friends and I] are in college… we were in grade 12… that friend, our friend who was in the hospital [in reality at the time that the dream occurred], that friend was back… fully recovered… fully recovered and he was totally walking with us… he was back in college… he was healed… I saw he came… we were shaking hands, we were hugging, we were happy… everyone was happy…

In my dream I saw that I was just helping the old people, old people and the street childrens and we were distributing clothes and some kind of light just came and make me feels happy like I’m happy from inside. Just give me that blessings. I feel that I don’t see any figures, but just light which makes me feel that I am on the right way on the right path. I was in that orphanage house [where I volunteered in real life]. [The light] was so bright. More than bright than this the daylight.

I was travelling to a foreign land with my friends… I was roaming and enjoying… I have not been to this country [in real life]… it might be at that time [of the dream] I went to this foreign country to have a tour… the only thought I had was this is very nice

In this dream I only heard a voice… [I did not see anything]… I was sleeping… [I] was filled by a lot of joy… [my] body was filled by joy and after that one voice came… [it] said, “that girl [whom you know] is not for you” and suddenly I woke up…

I saw such a beautiful place where there were natural [things]… multicolored [things]… white and bright light was shining there. There also were sheep and all kinds of animals. Everything was shining. I have never imagined such a place on this earth. [I felt peace and joy.]
In my dream, my little sister was sick and she was healed because of our prayers. I was very happy.

I was with my pastor's wife. I saw a dream of running to her and hugging her. I felt exceeding joy, peace and happiness. Again, one time I saw myself on the mountain with believers. I saw the name of the Lord being called upon over there. Also, I saw myself somewhere in the high building and I was receiving a certificate from some people.

I was going out to graze the cattle. While returning back home, I lost some bulls and I would face difficulties while searching for them. I would face the difficulties and find the lost cattle. Until I found them I would be afraid but once I find them I would be happy. While searching, I used to get angry but while returning home I would be okay.

I went to a village and in the river some fishermen were fishing. They were not able to catch fish. They did not find any fish there. When I asked them for the net and cast the net into the river some fish were caught and we were very happy. And I cast the net three times and all three times I caught fish. And the last time, even a snake came up.
In the dream I went to my birthplace. At home were my parents. I was happy to be home even in my dream. They were also happy. That's all.

At the time my friend and I were working in the farm fields, angels wearing white clothes came and took me with them. But my friend was left behind. I reached heaven. I felt as if it were real. I was in the golden city. I was celebrating joyfully with God.

Around my old house there was a big, old factory. I was there with my friend. My college friend was there. She is my girlfriend. In the beginning [we were very happy] but afterwards there was a war in that place and we had to separate. I was dancing with my [girlfriend] and we separated from one another. I was at the last moment of my life.

I was on a journey and while I was touring I saw three separate colorful [orbs] that looked like flowers. That light was very beautiful. [Then I realized in the dream that the Lord was showing me that I would pass the exam.] I was happy in the dream.
In my dream I saw all my school friend. We all went for a visit in Sundanjal and have a lot of fun, but while returning to home we met a terrible accident. All of my friends died but only I survived.
I saw a dream of me flying. I cross many tall mountains and I feel joy in my heart.

While walking I reached a beautiful place… [it was like] a garden. Really this garden was more joyful than heaven. There I was: happy, jumping, and shouting. I was also plucking the fruits and eating [them]. I also saw my mom and sister there. As I was being so happy… I don't know when… I just woke up.

In high school, I dreamed that my best friend had less than 24 hours to live, and his family was all out of town, so he was over at my house and I was trying to come up with things that he would enjoy doing, but he wasn't expressing an opinion about anything. I got quite frustrated at my inability to make the situation any better.
Everyone, including my husband and my family was laughing at me, and the more I cried, the louder and meaner their laughter became.

Questionable whether or not it's a nightmare, but . . . My older sister, who I never heard sing, was standing in the center of the room singing and each line went in a lower voice until she got so low no male base could have matched it. I woke myself up laughing.
Don't usually have nightmares. Did have dreams that cause me to wake-up laughing because they seemed funny.

I used to tour with Holiday on Ice. I often dream that I'm back with the show, in a strange town, and I don't know how to find the arena. I also haven't learned the show yet, don't know anything about the numbers I'm supposed to skate in, and I keep thinking, "What am I doing here? How did I get into this again? I'm too OLD for this!" I am very much aware of my actual age (70 now) and the fact that I have not skated, even for fun, in nearly 25 years.
being stuck in the midwest with recurring funnel clouds touching down all over my city

I had a nightmare about riding a bus with my mom to a haunted house. I had a horrible feeling about it, but couldn't convince anyone not to go. By the time we reached there, body parts were everywhere, but all the patrons thought it was part of the show. It turned out to be a slaughterhouse for Freddy Kruger. I can't remember the details, or perhaps I've blocked them out, but my mother and I made it out alive, while noone else did.

My father passed away. The night of his funeral I dreamt I saw coffin wheel indentations leading out the door. When I looked back he was standing their, but with scary eyes like a cat and ill tempered.

i grew up in a small town where everyone knew everyone. i was going to a church function when the town was attacked. i got into a vehicle and we raced out of town to a farm house of a girl i went to school with and we staid there until the danger was over.

Something about being on the front porch at night at my grandmother's house, an organ with walnuts in the shell being stuffed into rubbery tube things instead of piano keys, and my brother doing something which was making me laugh.
watching people all over the world doing what ever they liked that was fun

I remember being excited that I was going to meet John Travolta because I was in love with him. He turned out to be a mean clown in a wheelchair. He tried to blow up may family in an abandoned apartment building.

First I was running down a street, playfully, not in fear. Running turned to flying. Then I was falling from somewhere very high, aware I was falling. Just as I should have hit the ground, I awoke with a jolt, heart pounding, and breathing heavily.
roller coaster shaped like a caterpillar, lots of fun

Repeatedly dreamt I was on top a high cliff and jumped off -- beautiful feeling and enjoyed the falling -- at the bottom was a Kroger grocery store. but I never land and the dream moves on to something else. pleasant
At a funeral for JFK. Stood next to my Grandmother. The cemetery had a stone house about 50 yards ahead and to the right.
being able to fly over the treetops and feeling happy.
Circus dream??? Both happy and scared parts. Also brithday dreams full of dear family members.
Being attached by clowns from a fun house at a local amusement park that had a giant clown on top.

I don't know if it is the first dream, but I do remember a dream. I was standing on a railing of a childhood girlfriend's stoop & I had the feeling that I could fly off of the railing. A very happy carefree feeling.
I remember flying and worrying about hitting power lines and at the same time enjoying the feeling of being light and soaring like a bird. I also remember being able to go very fast.

I was playing with the neighbor girl, and we had a bet who could piss off the roof first. I climbed on the roof and peed first. I won the bet, but lost in the end because as I began peeing off the roof I also began wetting the bed and the neighbor girl laughed like hell.
Flying, and thinking it was the best feeling ever. Waking up feeling very happy.
I vaguely recall soaring above the trees while family excitedly watched below.
