I remember being in a big ditch. When I looked up, I saw my mother, wearing prison clothes (the black stripes, only horozontally. Her hair was flying out in all directions and she was laughing manically. She began to climb down the ditch, and that is all i remember.

I did something I shouldn't have and was reprimanded by an adult from an apartment window. I yelled back at the person and laughed, and the person got mad and left the window to come out after me. Knowing the person was coming out after me, I tried to run away, but was paralyzed. I became more and more afraid but couldn't move.

getting hit by a mail truck on 106th and columbus in front of manufacturers hanover bank-in new york. You might think this is funny but my first sexual dream-and almonst all of them had a womans body but no head- and i never had any success in my dreams until my 20's
I was at an amusement park, riding in a small car. I come to the road. There is a very large man there. He smiles and says "hi." I find it scary and wake up.
Jumping off a swing on a swingset high up on a mountaintop. The incredible feeling of flying was wonderful.
Same type of dream but with different items that overwhelm me. Also, dreamt of Christmas Toy but not on Christmas and very unhappy.
a dog with a human smile saying I'll take care of you baby!

I have been dreaming of having been accommodated in my own house. Sometimes I just dream that I am in my own house and I become extremely happy. In my dream I just find myself cleaning this house and making myself very comfortable in it (home).

Bright daylight. I was in a classroom, a regular one with desks. I can't remember any of the others in the class, but there were others. My math lecturer was standing next to me, and he patted me on the back and when I looked up at him, he smiled, a reassuring type of smile.

My father died in 1982. When I came back from the funerall, I dreamt my father was sitting with me. He was trying to explain how he had died. Before he explained to me he asked me to call my sister. When my sister came she was frightened to see my father sitting with me because he was supposed to be dead. She fell down. Afterwards when my father started explaining to me how he had died my friends woke me.

85. I saw a congregation where every one had a small crown on his head, and two persons were standing in front, having quite large and magnificent crowns. One of them spoke in joy, and it was half in French, half in German.
68. I enjoyed a delightful and precious sleep for about eleven hours, with several representations: it was as if a married woman was pursuing me, but I escaped.

53. I had frightful dreams; dreamt that the executioner roasted the heads which he had struck off, and for a long time he put the roasted heads one after another into an empty oven, which nevertheless was never filled. It was said that this was his food. He was a big female ; he laughed, had a little girl with him.

8. About my joys at night. I wondered at myself that there remained nothing of the desire to work for my own glory, so as to have sensation thereof, and that I was not inclined toward sexual relations, as I had been in all my days.

I was going to my home. And [my family members] were happy because I was coming home after a long time. Suddenly, I met my younger sister, but she was acting shy. I treated her as if she was my girlfriend but when I realized she was my sister, I treated her again as my sister.

The context of the dream was familiar. I was having fun with friend[s] from my place. Some of them were of my age. They were all men. They were all kind of my close friends. There I saw a bird and my dream was good. We were all enjoying using something.

I saw a dream of cooking lots of food with an [older man and woman] I know. That house was a very small hut. We were cooking food in a traditional firewood stove and lots of disabled children came and ate the food. I was crying seeing such a scene. How hungry these disabled children were! I was crying because of seeing it. The children were happy and having a good time.

In my dream I created a Facebook page and uploaded [my] photo. I [connected] with many Christian organizations and friends. I chatted in a very nice way with my friends. When I was talking with [male friends] we shared good photos. I was very happy. I was happy to meet the people I wanted to meet. Then, I woke up.

In my dream my friend, Sangita, and I were at NMTS College. All of our college friends had to take kitchen products from the ground floor upstairs. Brothers were carrying heavy bags and my friend and I carried one bag that was very light. I thought, “How can that very heavy [bag] be carried?” My friend and I were happy. Then, I was in the marketplace. I was looking at the statues people were making. Then, I woke up.

In my dream I saw my close friend. He was a man. I called him and he gave me some food to eat and also he gave me some fruits. At that time, I was very happy because my loving friend had given me such things.

I was on a path in village. I saw my mother who had already died. She was talking with me; she was caring for me. She was my mother: only I could see her, others would not be able to see. I was surprised. When she started walking [and] talking with me I felt happy.

My dream was about my college friends, but in my school. I was with my four college friend. We were just talking normally as in college. In my dream I was happy and confused also. In the dream I laughed with my friends and [bantered] with them, etc. I only saw the school buildings around me.

I was traveling in a bus. I did not know where the bus came from or where it was going. In the bus were a few of my close college friends. But my voice was not reaching them or they were ignoring me. The closer I tried to get [to them] the farther they seemed to go. On one hand I was enjoying [the time] but on the other hand I was upset.

In my dream I saw my friends Bandana and Elisha. We were having a great time and we were wandering around. I went with them to my school to study. We were enjoying [ourselves] in the class. Then suddenly I saw myself fall off the cliff and I woke up.

In the dream there was a program at NEHTS College. My older sister and all my relatives had come for the program. They were all very happy that they sent me to the Bible college because it was very nice. But I was crying because I was about to separate from them. I was happy to see them come but I was crying when they were leaving.
I am at home with my [father]. I was [spending] time with my father and sometimes with other family members and I was enjoying [being] with them. At that time I felt so good to be with them.

Last night in my dream I saw things related to the 3-day tour we were on. I was having a good time with friends and I saw the daily activities we did. Everyone was enjoying, singing songs, dancing and shouting. And because of a jam, the bus stopped and we left the bus. I saw that all [my] friends were enjoying. While singing we sang a secular song and our teacher criticized us. [The teacher] was angry. Then, I woke up.

I dream that I am on a greyhound bus with a lot of old people, they are German and very dry and uninteresting, we drive to some sort of senior citizens meeting and sit on folding chairs, nothing is going on at all, sometimes someone laughs. otherwise it is the epitome of boring. I feel resentful for having to be there.

I dream my old friend is with me and a guy she was once very in love with. We are waking in a courtyard, I am happy to see them, I keep running my fingers through my hair, And eventually I pull off a wig size amount of my hair, it is greasy and stuck to my hands, I finally shake it off of my hand and decidedly throw it on a patch of white orchids freshly planted. I am relieved to discover I have nice new hair growing in place of the clump I just pulled off.the end

I am at work in an office building. The copy machine does not work. An unknown man comes into my office who I think is my supervisor. He says, "If I have sex with a woman, all the electrical appliances are suddenly fixed." He is disgusting but I have sex with him anyway because it is for a good cause. He changes into a dog while we have sex! I am just starting to enjoy it when the copy machine clicks on. The man-dog walks out of the room. The dream ends with the feeling I did the right thing.

I am having a house custom built for myself. The house is not complete, just the frame is standing, and the only completed room is the bedroom. My fiancee and I are spending the night there just to check it out and see if we really like it. The builder is locking us in to be sure we are safe. We take off our clothes and get ready for bed, and are happy to be together.

I am in a strange village with many small houses. The people are dressed in quaint costumes. A tall, older man approaches me and starts telling me about his wife and children. Then his wife and one of his children appear. The man tells his wife he does not want her to work, and that her place is in the home. The child places his hands around his mother and holds her breasts. She says that those breasts nurtured him when he was a baby, they gave him life. He is embarrassed and starts to laugh.

I come to a table that looks like an altar. There are family photos on it, and they bring back memories. I am enjoying them, and lift up the glass to put in new photos, taking out some old ones. There is a photo of my mother, looking glamorous, like a blonde movie star. Three are figurines of family members on the altar, and models of adobe homes. Nothing modern. The image of my father is superimposed on the front of the model home.
I am working with a male friend in my very messy garage, cleaning and cleaning. We are having an easy time, making decisions on getting rid of things. We are enjoying the cleaning process.

A brass quartet of male musicians is performing on the stage of at heater. They are playing jazz. I am watching and am enjoying it, especially the trombonist. My former husband arrives because this is an African-American event and he is an official in the sponsoring organization. I introduce him to the musicians but by the wrong name and am embarrassed.

Just as always, I am leaving home for school. I go to the bulletin board to see if there are any changes in my schedule. On Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday there are no lectures scheduled. On Tuesday, there is only a lecture scheduled in the morning. I was excited after I saw this. It means I could swim in a lake with no trouble for the entire five days!

I am on my knees before a big man, but to be exact he is not a man but a black terrifying silhouette. This figure is dressed in black with a long cloak and a hood on his head. I don't see his face, but see a very long beard with smoothly turns into a sword approximately just below the belly. He keeps his hands on the handle of this sword, raising it time after time with satanic laughter. The way he laughs scares me very much.

I saw a funeral procession. Many people had come for this funeral. Close relatives went in a file by the coffin of the dead person. I got in line. When I went by the coffin, I was really scared because it was my mother who was lying in the coffin! (In two days my mother fell seriously ill, but she recovered.)

I am near a cliff and think that it would be fun to fly. So I jump off the cliff. At first I am terrified, but then I start to move my arms. I begin to fly with the birds, and have a very good time. I think that I am doing something I never thought that I could ever do. I am very proud of myself.

Just as always, before leaving for home from school, I went to see if there were any changes in the schedule. There was the following: On Tuesday I had two classes, but none late in the afternoon. I had no classes at all on Wednesday, Thursday, or Friday. I was very excited after I saw the schedule. I could swim in the lake with no trouble for the whole five days, Wednesday through Sunday.

I died. My body was put in a coffin and was carried to a cemetery. I felt unhappy being dead and thought, "Why should I die and let them bury me?" I got up, ran away, and hid unnoticed. Everyone was searching for me. At some moment I realized they could see me behind the bushes, so I ran on the road. Two people chased me. When I got tired of running, I woke up.

I die in this dream but still am aware to a surprisingly large extent. So I go out of my body. From a higher perspective, I can observe my corpse. I stay out of my body, and after I while, I am happy to enter the afterlife.

I am back at work in my old job. I notice that I am with several male and female co-workers who I have not seen for many years. We are happy to be working together again, even though the work is quite hard. (In waking life, I have not seen my co-workers in my former job for many years.)

In this dream I am driving a car and feel comfortable doing so. I think that it is remarkable that I am driving a car again, because the last time I did so was two decades ago when I had a car of my own. But I enjoy the driving even though I do not know who owns the car. (In waking life, I do not own a car and have not driven one in 20 years.)

I dream that I am at a computer and am putting games into it. I am surprised that I am programming games instead of business material and economic data. But I am having much more fun with the computer games than I would with the other material.

I am playing a game called "Money." This is a child's game, and I remember that in waking life, I had bought this for my young son to play. But in the game I am enjoying playing it myself, with some adult male friends. I tell them, "at least we can earn money in this game, even if we can't on our jobs!"

I am outside with my mother, father, and brother. We are enjoying the open skies and nature. Suddenly, a gang of tough looking men appears. They are threatening to destroy our home, and the homes of the other people in the town. All of us defend ourselves and our homes as best we can with sticks. But the invaders have knives. They are hitting and striking us with the knives, and we are outnumbered.

I open a door and find myself in the Mesozoic era, in a primordial forest. The forest is dense but there are paths there. The air is fresh. It feels wonderful. I decide to have a run. I see a house and I can run through it. Then I see all my superiors, all women, sitting in this house on a bench. They are merry and laughing. I get embarrassed and run further onward.

I dreamed of a lovely young woman in a far away city named Chita. And in my dream, we were married and had a son. I see myself walking with my son in Moscow, and we passed by the buildings in Red Square. Our family was very happy in the dream. (I was unmarried at the time of the dream.)

(precognitive dream) I was in a city far from home. I was walking down the street with tall buildings on each side. I saw a beautiful woman approaching me from a distance. As she came closer to me, I could see her face. She smiled at me and I fell in love with her. I wanted to marry her and have a child with her. (A short time later, I saw the same woman in my graduate class in St. Petersburg; we are married now.)

I dream that my husband is in prison, and I come to see him. But an official tells me that my husband has escaped from the prison. Immediately, I see a train moving along flat country, with many people on it. I know they are prisoners. One of them, my husband who does not look like my actual husband, jumps from the train and runs along the plain on green grass. He is happy.

Tom Sawyer and Huck Finn were in my dream. There was a road across a field. My parents were driving on the highway. I had been quarreling with them. Tom and Huck were walking across the field, talking and playing. One of the boys attempted to frighten the other one, as if trying to ambush him. I watch them from a distance, as if they were in a movie. But I feel excited as if I were a child playing a joyful and intriguing game.

A cheerful, elderly man tells me that he has cancer of the liver. I'm frightened by the words, and at the same time I'm surprised that he is smiling. Then, like another frame in a movie, I'm dissecting a liver. I'm amazed, even enraptured, that it's so beautiful. I don't feel squeamish while cutting the liver into layers with a big knife. I'm really enjoying it. I say to my husband, who's standing next to me, "Look, it's so beautiful!"

I'm in a nightclub. Everybody is watching a film on a large screen. In the film, people dance in the water which is not quite up to their knees. Then I notice the people at the table are all dummies. A girl enters in a pink dress. She laughs and whirls. She runs against another girl who is very much like her. She embraces the other girl who is very pale and starts falling backwards. The second girl is a dummy! I rush to assist the girl, then discover that she is a dummy too.

In this dream I am flying. I am far up in the air, even though my wings are made of wood. I am enjoying my flight, but then I hear a telephone ringing. I know that it is a call for me from a male acquaintance, so I fly back to my apartment and get back to earth again. I answer the phone.

I am in bed with my husband. Almost immediately, we began to have sexual intercourse. During the sex, I have feelings that are very enjoyable and very erotic. The dream proceeds very slowly, and I have the sense of enjoying every minute of the sex I am having with my husband.

In my dream, I am buying beef in a store. I thought that the store would not have many supplies, so I am very happy to see that beef is available. I look through my purse to see if I have enough money to buy the beef. I do, and I make the purchase.

In my dream, I am going out into the country, intent on picking mushrooms. I see a clearing among the trees. I head toward the clearing and see some mushrooms. On close inspection, I see a giant boletus. I know that this is a kind of edible mushroom, and I am delighted to have found it.

I am walking in the woods and meet a young boy. He takes my hand and leads me along a path. We come to a clearing and there is a house there. The boy's parents live in that house. They are happy to see me. They treat me as if I am their own daughter.

My boyfriend and I are walking in a clean birch tree-filled grove filled with light. My girlfriend appears in a sun-dress, and I haven't seen her for a long time. She knows my boyfriend too. She sees us and joyfully rushes to my boyfriend, then gives me a much cooler greeting. This doesn't irritate me, as it might. At the same time, I have a feeling that this calm quiet of the grove is unnatural and is fraught with some kind of danger.

I am with an uncle of mine at some sort of a family function at a location that I can not identify. My wife, Vera, goes off with our housekeeper to visit a Roman Catholic priest in Northern Ireland. At first I think she wants to have our marriage annulled but when she comes back it seems as if our housekeeper needed to see the priest for confession.

Lights that seem to be coming from flames surround me. They are dancing and flickering. They could be coming from a bonfire or perhaps from fireworks. They could even be electric lights. It is hard to discern their source except that there is a celebration going on. I enjoy the lights, but I am completely baffled as to their source.

I was in the middle of a fire. There were flames all around me. There were strange people doing a dance and I was in the middle of the circle. They had masks on their faces, and flames were coming out of their masks. For some reason I was not terrified because I knew it was a celebration of some sort and they meant me no harm.

This dream started with a flash of a red heart. I see a calendar and the month was February. There is a large table set for dinner, an intimate dinner for two people, a man and a woman. There are mirrors on the walls, and big red bows everywhere. I assume this is a celebration for Valentine's Day, and that the couple will be arriving soon.

I think that it is Guy Foulkes Day. Some type of celebration is going on. A member of our family is putting on makeup for a party that she will be going to later to celebrate the day. I am rather sad because my boy friend is not there. I will have to celebrate with my family members, or at least those who are sticking close to home.

This dream took place on a small Caribbean island. There was camping equipment all around. I noticed a Stanley knife, a portable lamp, and some art equipment. My friend Mike was there and he laughed at me for putting my name on everything I owned. But I told him that without my name, I would not be able to tell what was mine. I thought it was a good idea.

I was with my family, my husband and two children. A man told me it was September 1961 and that we were in Denmark. Then my dream became lucid because I realized that my children had not yet been born. But we went out at night to enjoy the city. It was lit up with people walking around. It was probably Copenhagen, I thought, even though we had never been there.

I dream about dry leaves in a park. I am watching children laughing and playing on a merry-go-round. It seems as if one of the children is having a birthday, and so this is a birthday party. The dry leaves indicate that it is probably sometime during the fall season.

I dream of my two sons. Their birthdays will be coming up soon, I recall. One will be October 27th and one will be October 29th. I make a connection with All Souls' Day or Halloween. Joseph and Dominic will enjoy dressing up in Halloween costumes and maybe someone will give them birthday presents of costumes.

The sun is rising in the sky and there is an aura around it. People below are having a celebration. They are in the mountains and many of them have been skiing. There is a feeling that they are all like one family, and that they are moving forward. Then someone says that "Jesus is coming," but I wake up before I know the outcome.

I am in Paris. My friend, Utta, visits me there. She is from Germany. We go to see our friend Gisela in Munich. While we are having tea in Gisela's garden we hear the big bell by the garden gate ring. I jokingly say that it must be our friend Madame Gold, although I know she is living in Italy. Guess what. It is Madame Gold! She had stopped off in Munich on her way back from the United States where she had visited family members. None of us were there by design, yet we enjoyed the coincidence.

In this dream I am a young person, and resemble a character from a television series. I have fallen in love and the man is also in love with me. For some reason, we can not be together but we are very happy with our new love just the same. We send love letters to each other, and this will have to do until we get together.

I am taking a journey to an airport. I am leaving my brother-in-law behind in another car. But I am taking a very strange short cut. In fact, I see Adam and Eve as I drive through the countryside, and I also see a lot of cats along the side of the road. I have a very happy feeling, even though the route I am taking is new to me.

My family that is, my husband, our two sons, and I are enjoying a meal of freshly caught fish. The scene was very festive. It was Good Friday and so there was a spiritual significance to the event as well. The dream combined spirituality and a holiday mood in an integrated, highly satisfactory manner.

I was with a man on a bus. We were on a plateau, just the two of us. It was nothing special, just two people and I was one of them. We were pretending that we were like a tiny little boat or that the bus was a tiny little being. We were pretending it was a toy world and were just having a laugh at that, while we were cruising along. I felt quite safe, and seemed to know the other passengers in the bus.

I dreamed about a little girl who was lying down. I was watching her from a distance and she did not see me. She had a round opening in her chest area. It was like a button, and out of this button came a little blue elephant brooch. It was about twice the size of a large coin. Then a man came along and touched the opening. It healed instantly and the little girl was happy to have the elephant brooch as a souvenir.

I see a strange tundra-like landscape. It’s bleak, yet serene. I see a hooded figure pulling a sledge in the distance and I decide to follow him over the hill. There is a solitary wigwam tent with funny runic symbols on it and I want to know what they mean. Inside the tent is a hooded person sitting like the Buddha in meditation. I pull back the hood. It’s me. It’s my face.

A friend of mine is getting married, and I am at her wedding. Another friend of mine is nursing the bride’s baby. It was a bit strange because the wet nurse is over sixty. There is a great celebration going on, with dancing all around. The dancers are carrying a wooden coffin and are passing it around.

I meet an old Indian grandfather with long braids. He tells me to hold on to his braids. So I do. Then he starts to fly and I go right along with him. He is flying into the sky, and I am enjoying myself, holding on to his braids. We are swinging around. I think that I am learning spiritual wisdom and that this is some type of initiation. I am very grateful that I am with him.

I meet a beautiful young woman and fall in love with her. She feels the same way about me. Then there is a gap in time. But I see the same young woman again. This time she is a few years older and even more beautiful. She takes me to meet her father who is a physician from India with dark skin. He is very happy that we have fallen in love. He also is happy that we have waited until now to consummate our love for each other. We head off to have sex, but I wake up before it happens.

I was walking down the street and I did not know where I was. I walked for some time, and suddenly, I found myself at a beach that I know very well. There are many of my friends there, both men and women. I walk over and start talking with some of my friends, and am happy that I found the beach and the sea. It is a feeling that was very intense. I was very happy at the beach. My friends and I started to play beach ball. Then I returned to the street from which I had started.

I am slowly walking through a tunnel. My feeling is very unworldly, with no sense of my body at all. I look and can see my body at the beginning of the tunnel. Suddenly, I want to return to my body. As I enter my body, I have an intensely sexual feeling. I feel happy to be united again.

I dreamed that I was with my wife. I was embracing her very slowly and very tenderly. She told me that not only did she enjoy my embraces, but that my embraces and my tenderness were very important to her. I was pleased with her response and continued to embrace her with caring.

I am with a very sensual, beautiful woman. First we go to the bathroom together and take a shower. Then we go into the bedroom and have great sex. Then we go into the bathroom again to take another shower. We are very happy to be together and to enjoy each others' bodies so completely.

I am very excited sexually, but can't get out of bed to reach the unknown woman who is walking by my door. I think she would accept my invitation to join me in bed, but she walks right by without noticing me. I can not move or speak while she walks by. I feel frustrated.

I am flying in this dream. It gives me a great deal of accomplishment and satisfaction. I perceive that other people are watching from the ground and are admiring my capacity to fly. The act of flying is very pleasing and I enjoy the sensation. I feel powerful and feel a bit of exhibitionism, as if it enhances my image sexually.

I am climbing a tree, from limb to limb. I reach the highest limb, and am very happy to have reached the top. To my surprise, I see my father, who has been dead for ten years. He says, "I am glad to see you! I wish you happiness. I know that you and your wife are taking care of yourselves. I am also with you." At this time, I cry very much, but I feel very good.

I was on a large ship sailing across the Atlantic Ocean to Africa on an expedition of some sort. I was strolling along the deck and saw a man and woman kissing on the deck. I told them not to stop, and that I would not watch them. They laughed. It was at night and they probably thought that they would be noticed. I had not seen either of them before.

I am outside with a group of people, all of them students, men and women, people I know and people I don't know. We are laughing and singing. We are flirting with each other, and I think some couples are sneaking off to have sex in the bushes and trees. But I enjoy the company and do not see a man I want to be with.

I take a girl I know to the hospital because she has a fever. I get her to the hospital safely, but then wonder if I will catch the disease that she has. Someone says she has a sexually transmitted disease, perhaps AIDS. I am sorry for her, but am happy for myself because I know that I can not catch AIDS just by taking her to the hospital.

I am lying down and my fingers feel tingly. Then a man takes my hand and it feels very nice. I smile. Then I feel pressure around my lips as if being touched there. It is by the same man. He is unknown to me, but it feels so nice that I do not mind. I see the yellow carpet on the floor, but am so relaxed I can not turn my head to see the man clearly who is caressing me.

I am outside in a very beautiful farm. I see my grand mother there, and also my grandfather and my granddaughter. In waking life, they are all dead. In the dream they are alive, and seem to be in heaven. I have been allowed to visit them briefly to know how they are dong. They greet me and assure me that they are all very happy and that they will see me on this farm someday when I leave the earthly plane.

I am in a large auditorium attending a class of some kind. Many of my friends, both male and female, are there. Some of them are kissing each other, holding hands, and starting to make love. They say that they are feeling very good because there will be a special guest coming soon. In walks a famous psychologist! I was happy to see him, and to know he would be in charge of the class. He starts to speak in Portuguese, and then I wake up.

I dreamed that a dark, good-looking man came into my house. I had not seen him before. He carried me into the bedroom. At first I did not want him to take off my clothes. But then he persuaded me and I took them off. We went to bed and made love. It was wonderful and I had very good feelings after it was over.

I was at a farm that I had inherited at some point in the dream. The farm was a huge place, with a farmhouse. Each place I looked was more beautiful than the place before. It had gardens that were especially beautiful. It was discovering this inheritance slowly, and was enjoying my exploration.

In this dream, an old aunt came to visit me. In waking life, she never did this, so I was very happy in the dream. But when she arrived, she moved around all of my furniture, changing the places where I had put them. I did not like the changes, but I thought as soon as the visit was over I would put the furniture back the way I liked it.

I had a dream about my ex-husband. I awakened in peace. We separated about two years ago, and in my dream we were happy that we were no longer living together. I said that our separation was for the best, and he agreed with me. We should have no regrets about our separation and our divorce.

I dream that I hear a little bell that is ringing. Then I am falling. I have the sensation of absolute freedom as I drop into the emptiness. I realize that I am dreaming, and I enjoy the sensation which is quite spiritual in nature.

I am in an ancient place embalming a mummy. The mummy has its arms outstretched in the form of a cross. It gives forth a sacred feeling. I feel happy that I have found this relic from the past and am preserving it.

I am with a number of people in a playground outside. One of the structures is something to hang from with your hands, and the cord reminds me of an umbilical cord as appears in childbirth. I began to fly with that cord, under the direction of a man who is like a spiritual guide. I fly higher and higher, and have a great feeling of well-being. The breeze is very pleasant and the pleasure is indescribable. There is a female friend with me, and she enjoys herself too.

I am walking on a beach. A man and a woman approach me and say that this is the sea of the lamas. I can enjoy myself here, and it will be good for my health. So I am relaxing and a lama comes up. He approaches me. I feel good about his presence.

I am flying in the sky and meet an angel. I ask the angel if she can help my daughter find a job. The angel smiles. The angel gives me a large egg. A bird comes out of the egg. The angel says one word, "North." I think the angel has done something to help my daughter find a job.

In my dream I am swimming with a dolphin that gives me joy and renewal when I am with it. A goddess appears and starts to sing to me. Serpents appear, and they join the song. Usually I am afraid of serpents, but in the dream they bring me much happiness.

I was in my mother's home. She was very happy to see me, and she gave me a gift. It was a book I had wanted to buy for a longtime. But it was a rare book, and I did not know where I could find it. But my mother had tracked it down and had given it tome. I was happy, and she shared my happiness.

I am with some kittens who are frolicking and having fun. But there is a plague of some sort and the kittens get sick. I try to get the kittens to an animal doctor who can help them. But by the time I reach the office, the kittens are breathing their last. As we enter the building, there is no sign of life. I am very sorry that the kittens are dead.

I am with some people planning a celebration. They say, "This is the Year of the Dragon." They decorate the rooms of the building we are in, and they say that the outsides must be decorated too in time for a big parade of celebration. I want to join the plans but do not seem to fit in.

I was watching a game in a soccer stadium. I recall that my team was winning and I was cheering for them. I think I would have won some money on the event if my team had won. But they didn't. I think the game was fun to watch, even though my team did not win and I did not get any money as a result.

I start to go to a bus stop. I see some friends from my office. They were planning to take the same bus, and we all get on the same one. They talk to me about problems in the office, and I think they this was not a good idea. I tell them, "Stop talking about problems in the office. This is the weekend and I want to have some fun and forget about those office problems."

I was in a house on an island, and was quite happy there. But a young man told me that there was an even prettier section beneath the house. However, it was necessary to go through the water to reach it. I saw fish swimming in the water, but I was afraid to join them because I thought I might drown. Finally, I made a dive into the water, and found that I could swim underneath the water very easily. I reached the bottom level of the house and I just loved it there.

I was in my house and looked out the window. There was a truck of some sort, and it was menacing. I thought it was going to put its fuel in my house and blow me up. So I took a rifle and shot the driver through the window of the truck. I went down to see what was happening. I opened the door of the truck. It was my stepfather, and he was dead. He had abused me as a child, so I was not terribly unhappy. But I did feel guilty about killing him.

This dream took place in a house filled with birds and flowers. It was a garden house of some type. My little daughter was there playing with the birds and flowers. I seemed to have planted the flowers earlier and the birds must have come to enjoy the flowers' honey. The colors were very vivid and the emotions were very warm and happy.

I am with my ex-girlfriend in a department store. I ask her if she has missed me. She replies, "Actually, I have had more time to open a business where I invest in properties." On the one hand, I am happy for her success. But on the other hand, I am angry that she did not seem to miss me one little bit, she was too busy with these properties to need companionship.

I am going into a hospital. My sister is very ill and I am trying to find her. Once I reach her room, she is much better. And she has won some type of a prize, a hospital lotto game, or something where she came up with the winning ticket. We are both very happy.

I am on an island trying to get to my automobile on a street, and met with a great obstacle. The street is covered with fish. I need to get into my car and go to a conference. But the fantastic thin is that there are two enormous collections of fish all over the street. No one is there to assist me. Suddenly, I am no longer preoccupied about how to get my automobile because it is too late for my conference. So I am happy enough to be in this nice place.

I am a child, and am in a country house that belongs to a relative. The country house is not far from the city. It is the end of the semester and we have gone there to celebrate. I am running and laughing a lot. It is a sunny day, and we are able to see the vivid colors of people's clothing, and we hear the sounds of the place, people talking and other sounds. I start to run, and am not able to stop running. It is as though the space were endless.

The people in this dream live in an exterior space where they are floating. Their bodies are covered with gas-like clouds. I alone can see their faces which emanate peace and wisdom. They don't have regular eyes but their pose indicates they are happy and have plenitude. They are closer to God than humans. I give them books to read, cereals and grains to make bread, and wreathe of laurel to signify their spiritual triumph.

(I have this dream often.) I am being pursued down the street by some unknown pursuers. When I reach a street of safety, I can see four ducks. Then I know that now I am safe from the pursuers who were after me. I rejoice and am very happy that I have escaped. I am very relieved that I am safe.

Almost always, I dream that) I am in a house where I lived when I was first married, and where we stayed for 20 years until I was 58. In the dream, I am living in that house with my husband, children, and in-laws. I am happy to be spending a brief period of time in my old house. But I know I musty go back to my present house eventually. This does not upset me because I have found happiness in my new house as well.

I am in the home of my in-laws where my husband and I have lived for the past nine years. A thief breaks into the room my father-in-law had built for me, entering through the window which begins to crumble. I feel terror and desperation. This room falls apart and is transformed into a modern, more chic apartment that is more useful. It is larger and in a different place. I am happy there, but feel nostalgia. But I am comfortable here. It is super-modern and can hold more people.

I hear the sound of clever thieves in the house. The group of thieves is laughing and talking. I had forgotten to close the door, thinking that my brave dog would guard the house. But where is the dog? The dog is in the bathroom with my baby. I gather my strength to go into the bathroom and say, "My baby! My baby!"

I am happy with the new president of out nation. It is another opportunity for me to declare that my granddaughter will not have to wear a corset. Then I realize that many hours have passed, and that I am making a guess about her future. I know that soon I will have to wake up from the dream and face reality.

I am walking along a road in an area that I think I know very well. But I get lost, and end up somewhere I had not been before. I find that I am at the edge of a cliff, so I jump down and end up gliding through the air. I have not done this before, but I enjoy it.

I am dreaming of the man who lives next door, but not of his wife. In my dream, he leaves silently while I practice my piano lessons. This is my hobby, and I wonder what he does for hobbies. Then he comes back very late at night; but this time I am knitting because that is my other hobby. In my dream, I am happy that I am improving both my piano playing and my knitting.

I am climbing up on a cliff with my best friend and a guy she knows. We see a beautiful ocean with dolphins swimming in it. We all go down to the beach, and enjoy the water. This guy guides me while I go swimming in the ocean. Later, I go to a ski park, and there is that guy again. He calls me by name, but I ignore him. Finally, he comes up and hugs me really hard. I am afraid that my best friend is interested in this guy and I don’t want to encourage his attentions to me.

I am with a baby girl. She is beautiful and cute. Her mother and father are watching and smiling. The baby is playful, and she starts to play with all three of us. Then she is able to call each of us by name. I think she is growing up quite fast. The only problem is that I lose track of time while playing with her.

I had a dream about the movie star, Jim Carey. I tell him that I don’t like him, and don’t like the movies he makes. But he wants to play a game or two with me, and I agree. First we play chess. Then he pulls out some paper and some scissors, and we cut them into various designs, and I really start to have fun.

In this dream, a black and yellow spider was biting me. The spider seemed very playful and started jumping around from bush to bush. Then I saw a friend who I know in waking life. He is a college student majoring in ethics. He told me that the colorful spider was harmless and was just having some fun.

There was a woman in this dream who I apparently knew. There was a man in the dream who seemed to know us both. [I did not know either of them in waking life.] He started to cut off her feet, and then wore them around his neck. I walked into the room and saw her shoes on the desk covered with blood. When I looked up at the man, he was wearing her feet. He was laughing, and implied that it was all my fault. It was very scary.

I was in the school that I attended when I was a child. I was talking with my teacher about my school tests. She had been scoring a test I had taken, and had given me a good mark on it, even though it was difficult. I was very happy because I had received a high score on the test.

I am in front of my computer, making my home page. Somehow, I meet another girl on the net. I can see her on my screen. She is pretty. She is a tiny American girl. I have never met her before in dreams or in my waking life. However, we are talking like really close friends. She asks if she can link her page to mind, and I am happy to do it.

I am in a train station. A person moves toward me. He is a man who I like very much. I am very excited to be with him. He says to me that he also likes me very much. I feel really happy to hear him say that. I like him very much too. I am glad to be there with him and to know how he feels.

I go to a guesthouse on a hill. An old man who I never met is the owner of the guesthouse and gives me a warm welcome. There are lots of Japanese dumplings in the guesthouse. I feel happy when I see the dumplings, and join the other guests who are eating them.
I am drinking with my dad in a pub. The barmaid brings us drinks, and she laughs and jokes with us. I do not know her, but she gets along with us very well. We are all having a good time.

I don’t really know how it happened, but I am a pig. I am a real quiet and sober animal. My friend is also there, and he is wearing a black suit and sunglasses. I am running away from him. “What does this mean?” I ask. “It is because you are tasty,” he replies, laughing.

I was with about twenty men who I recognized from the office where I work. We were at a party, and were eating and drinking. There were tables heaped with food, and many types of alcoholic beverages to drink. I knew something was being celebrated, but I was never told what it was. So I just keep having fun with my office friends, eating and drinking.

In my dream, I was thinking how much I wanted to see my old friend. A man told me, "If you wish strongly enough, it will happen." So I wished I would see him, and he appeared with some other people -- classmates in fifth and sixth grade, a girl I had special feeling for in high school, and American friend I met in college, and a Senpai who was a senior member in my previous company. My heart beat rapidly and I felt happy feelings. (And a few days later, I saw my friend in ordinary life.)
Eating out and having fun with friends

A friend was sleeping with me and had wonderful sex.
I was at a fair, with some balloons. I was having fun.
I had a dream I was engaged to a Native American Man. I was very happy. I can't remember anything else. I also dream about water a lot. The flying dreams are my favorite.

The most recent dream I can remember was a dream about my last computer. It was very short and simple, I just dreamed about my computer actually working again since it crashed. I got excited and then I woke up. I actually had this dream taking a nap the other day.

I was hanging out with family and was very happy

ran into friend i used to work with.. havent seen in years. she was excited because another person we worked with was going to show up, and she was romantically interested in him. in real life, she had no romantic interest in him.. in dream i told her he was married now, and had a child, i had heard (true). she was very upset. thats all!

I dreamed I was spending time visiting with my parents, who have both passed years ago. But it was just as real as if they were both standing right in front of me. When I awoke, I was very happy & remembered the whole dream, as if they really had visited me.

i was a little girl again and living in my parents hoouse. i was very happy to have had that dream
Riding roller coaster like tram through a large fun house. It was frightening and woke me up. About a month ago. I blame these dreams on my high blood pressure medicine, metoprolol.

dreamed that I was hiking in the wilderness of California. I was just enjoying the scenery.

I had the worst dream that I had missed graduation at the end of the year. Then, this sketchy guy asked me to prom. I made a dress somehow, didn't even shower, and forgot makeup. And then my date was drunk.

I had a dream that we were back at school and already Judith and I were taking tests, something about being proctors. We had to choose people to live on our floor. I don’t remember details. The only thing I remember is searching. I don’t know what I’m searching for, but it’s for something. I’m not scared, lonely or upset. I am just searching.
The only thing I remember is that I was on some sort of circuit. Don’t know whether it was for educational, musical, or what, but I felt very sad with having to leave my home.

I’m on a lawn chair on Chilton Avenue. My grandmother, Norma, and I are drinking milk shakes while watching a sunset. She’s reading me one of her poems, “Little Miss Nobody.” As she reads, I shift time and space to the church where I’m eulogizing her. I can see the faces of my extended family- she’s reading again “Grandma, Grandma…” I look over at her chair; she’s not there. I’m crying…The sun burns out over the gorge….I wake up.

I awake and I’m somewhere in a great body of water. Breakers that mimic great seiches move me fifty-some yards. Looking out over the endless dark water I descry nothing that resembles land. However far I swim, like the universe, everything is symmetrical. It’s like I’ve been treading water. I turn on my back and float, looking up at all the nothingness.

119. first dream - I have to go to Chile and am running late. Kyle drives me to the airport, but then we have to go back to downtown L.A. to pick up my ticket and a photo of the ruler. You need a photo of the ruler to enter the country. I end up missing my plane. But then it turns out I don't go until October anyway. So I did not actually miss anything. I feel bad like I missed Chile, but have to keep reminding myself the trip is not until October.

I am in a room with kittens. The room is big and bright with kittens crying, playing, and sleeping. I close my eyes and they are now grown cats. The cats are meowing and playing. I turn my back and when I turn around, they are kittens again. This scene repeats several times.

I feel like I’m lighter than air. I have all these feelings and it’s kind of like floating through the ether. Every feeling maps onto a specific pulse of flight path. Fear is fast and undoubting. I soar past the moon on my way to death. Sadness is a drop through the troposphere. I have a sense of no control, like this ride is going to end badly. My visions are nebulous; mostly I see waves of colors. Then it changes and it seems as if I’m watching these “paths of emotion”. This is about it.

I’m with my friend Karen. We are driving to see her son Charlie Jr. We get to Charlie Jr.’s house and go inside. Charlie and his girlfriend Amy are at their kitchen table. We sit down to visit and the phone rings. Charlie asks me to answer it. The caller tells me that Charlie’s father died and could I pleas tell him. Everyone is staring at me when I hang up the phone. I look at each one and then proceed to tell Charlie. I am crying and give him the sad news. I wake up crying.

I dreamed I was driving Christina down some residential road. It seemed like middle or late fall. As we drove, the houses on each side of the road became more widely spaced until we reached her place. It was utterly destroyed. Sideboards were strewn all over the lawn; windows were missing. I asked if she wanted my help in restoring it. She answered. It was like “no”, but I can’t discern what exactly it was she said. She just walked into this rundown old mess.

I recall emailing several of my professors for recommendations. I’m standing in this cafeteria, but it’s not the university of Buffalo; it’s somewhere else. A teacher from several years ago, Erwin Segal, one that I knew quite well, approaches me. He greets me, shakes my hand. He mentions that he received my request, but acts rather discouraging about my going to this particular graduate program. I’m devastated and very depressed. I go to check my email and awake.

242. I go to an award presentation. On the stage, all the women on the stage hold hands and stand up for truth. They try to sit down, but I'm one of them and I say stand up. I talk further with Dr. Langone. He leans toward me as we talk.

163. *Drunk * It was pretty weird, I was driving on the highway and all of these dead people were lying on the road or people with missing legs, then later on I was driving on the highway and there was a big rectangle missing out of the road and people were driving off of it and I did and fell into this rushing river, but I got out of it.

I went up to Hillary Clinton and said, Thank you for running, it means a lot to us. Barack got elected President and I was crying out of happiness.

I was Hillary Clinton's personal assistant and I was miserable, partially because we were working non-stop on little sleep, but also because she was a tyrant. I slept really hard last night and dreamed that Hillary Clinton became President of the U.S., and Korea, China and Russia declared war on America and were going to launch nuclear missiles, and Clinton and others were ready to surrender to prevent devastation to the population.

I was hanging out with Barack, flirting with him a bit. My boyfriend was with me and started getting annoyed at this. I dismissed my him, saying, Dude...it's Obama! As in, DUH, of course I'm going to flirt with him, nothing wrong with that. Then I got a pang of guilt when I thought about Michelle Obama, thinking that I shouldn't be a homewrecker.

Hillary Clinton is my therapist. We are sitting on a bench overlooking the Mississippi River and I am telling her my real-life troubles. She is so warm and caring, sparkling in the sunlight. I start crying about my problems and she gives me a hug. I wake feeling safe and loved.

There was a competition going on. A battle in an old World War II European city. I had to complete several obstacles, like cross the beam, knock down the pins, and match up colored icons. There was a giant robot with a lot more xp and points than me. It had missiles and my attacks were fruitless.
I'm in the jungle about to go off on an exploratory mission...

213. (2) I remember what it looked like crystal clear. Erica lived in this house that was just like ours except it had a downstairs that was amazing which we had never discovered before, also a new little white room in the attic (never finished writing down the dream).

I'm on a mission to deliver something to an office. I have a laptop and papers. I'm on the side of a busy road. There's snow on the verge. I hide the laptop in a 'flap' in the snow and go down to a business park and up into a large glass and steel building. Then I realise that I've left my laptop behind. Then I panic, and go back but I can't find it.

Vampire. Stuck inside with faulty Internet or computer network. Dragons. Assembling the savior device -- the little robot that downloaded into the big computer system and secretly grabbed parts as it went. Like an r2d2. Waiting for the event. The bad guys had already captured our dragons. They were waiting to die. I was one of our assets, which I thought was sad, since I wasn't battle tested.

I’m trying to get Lightning our cat to settle on my lap….I’m outside with her at first, on the sidewalk….up the hill from here, on a nearby street?....At one point I’m kneeling behind her, almost like a humping or mounting position….I briefly wonder what she makes of that, if it makes her aroused or submissive….At another point I’m sitting on a couch with her, and for some reason there’s a medium-sized box in my lap, too, that I’m trying to maneuver around the cat….

I dreamt about a colleague Juan. In the dream he was an artist doping some kind of commission or course. He was about to undertake a new large scale work. I was there as his tutor or advisor. I’m going out into the ocean….I’m carrying a full glass of champagne in a nice crystal glass….In my other arm I’m carrying a kid?....Like this has something to do with Ronald’s school?....A big wave looms up, I realize it’s too big to ride with what I have in my hands….I get ready for the impact….I’m not super scared, just resigned….here it comes….

I had the most vivid dream that I was in the bookstore buying a sketchbook for architecture. The paper was all different sizes and organized into pretty different colored binders. I’m watching a baseball game with someone….on television, but at the stadium too?....It’s the Giants vs. the Yankees….the Yankees are winning….Suddenly I realize the Giants haven’t gotten a hit yet….It’s the 8th inning….Oh no, I cry in despair….They can’t get no-hit!....I recall several no-hitters have been thrown this year already….It would be a sad sign of weakness for the Giants to fall like this….

There’s a school bus stuck on a bridge, about to fall over the side into a river….People say don’t touch it or it’ll fall….But the teens trapped inside are panicking….I’m right by the back, and I help open the emergency window….I pull a couple of kids out (Milton is one?), but there’s too much baggage inside the bus to get more….I don’t know if the bus goes over the side, but a litter later I walk away and start crying in sadness for the other kids….I see Milton, he seems fine….

I see on the Maxwell’s front bush (with purple flowers) parts of Straus’ body….his back legs, head, front paws….What?!....I go to their front door and ask what happened….Mr. Maxwell says a big dog got him….I’m shocked and sad….I walk away and start crying….

For some reason I’m trying to keep Amy out of our house....She keeps coming inside, and breaks through the front door window, leaving a large hole in the door....I give up, and start crying....I tell someone they have to talk with her, I can’t do anything else about it....I’m frustrated....

Lots of Bridgestone admissions activity….Something about Willie Mays being involved?....the applicants have to compete, and he’s part of the process?....it’s an appealing feature, supposedly, to attract people to the school….other people are anxious, but I’m energized….It’s like old times, I know how to do this….

It’s a short image: I see a comic book or graphic novel page showing a woman considering having an abortion….On the left are a couple of people saying do it….On the other side are tons of people, both real and imaginary….Santa Claus and the Easter Bunny are among them….They’re all saying don’t do it….I realize how influential this will be on many women trying to make a choice….I cry in sadness and frustration….

I was standing outside there was a group of dead people around a picnic table, my auntie and two other people I worked with who are also gone and also others ? I didn?t know their faces, not sure where I?ve come from but I arrive there and I was shocked because my auntie was there, and I?m asking her why she?s there because she?s gone and then we?re hugging and both crying, I?m asking her where?s the husband and the children ? I woke up with tears on my face.

I?m on the island, I went to see my mum because I just wanted to see her face and I saw her, she was smiling at me, I was so happy and then when I looked back she wasn?t there. That?s when my tears started, I was crying. Then I got up.

It’s like I’m getting ready to deliver a baby for my wife….She’s not really there, but I’m in a hospital room and I put out my hands as if to grab and guide the baby, and I practice the words of advice I’d say to my wife….Then as soon as I’ve imagined the baby coming out, I go up to the head of the bed where my wife’s face would be and I hug her and cry….I’m actually crying as I lean down and put my face in the pillow….

I saw my wife on a beach, it was coming to a sunset and I was crying because I knew I was sick and I went and hugged my wife and told her how much I loved her and then I asked her to go out for dinner and I woke up.

I’m talking to a dictator….He’s very agitated, trying to put down a rebellion….He tells me and others I’m with (my family?) that after we have torn out the hearts, eyes, tongues, etc. of the rebels, we should make sure to tell the others he is promising them all medicare….to show how benevolent he is….He’s a dark-skinned man in a tan uniform….I say I’ll do so, while thinking about what a violent man he is….He’s like Saddam Hussein?....

I’m with a group of people having lively conversation….Bud tries to say something, but he’s cut off….The conversation moves on, but I see he’s upset, tears forming in his eyes….Concerned for him, I ask if he’s OK….

Ongoing images and thoughts about people no longer using or moving books….Rather, people are printing out papers when they need them, then disposing of them….it seems wasteful to me, and kind of sad….so much is being lost….
366. * High * At this point all I remember of this dream was all about Mission Beach. It had very beautiful imagery and had me feeling very blissful, romance.

I’m at a school….Next year I’ll run cross-country, and I’l be able to beat another guy who runs now….Davide?....But wait, I don’t really go to the school?....I go up a trail, with thick bushes, and get to a creek….The water is flowing, and full up there, more than before….I can’t cross where I want to go….Someone says it’s ok, go back, there’s nothing to miss….it’s just Philadelphia?....

about Nam or what happened with missles flying all over the place

Some tough guy is sad about a loss….A kid of his is going off to school?....I hug him from behind, and we cry together….At some point, I’m driving people through a city….I have to go up over the sidewalk to get around pedestrians….Then, I’m in a bed, someone is about to give me a blowjob….I think it’s a girl, but might be a guy?....

558. Being at the beach with Andrew and JT – very abstract place- on top of a white adobe like building with windows but no ceiling. I’m using people’s medical records to talk about their dreams….With their permission, but with more detail than what the records seem to indicate….Then, a different scene, it’s like I’m hiding someplace with the Queen….Other people look for her, and when they see her with me they know it’s okay….

There’s a big crowd of people waiting as a musical act gets ready to play….I’m supposed to help a woman who’s the DJ work her control board, but I get distracted by the two guitar players, one of whom is a woman….I miss the cue once the music starts….So I quickly get down and try to stay out of the way….

At the end of the filming shoot, some final missing prop….I wonder, did we get any shots with that?....Are they carrot sticks?....For a moment, it is like Kurt Cobain is there….He has taken all the carrot sticks with him, and he says to us in a taunting tone of voice, “I have all the squilggies”….I see that word written clearly, and I am unsure exactly what it means….

Something about disputes over a house….People where they should not be….It is confusing….Then, I get into a van, to move it, make it park in a better spot….But when I get in the driver’s seat and look back I see some people in the van, asleep, laying down, with white sheets….I wonder, what do I do?....I have to be careful not to wake them….they might get mad at me for doing something with their vehicle without my asking for permission….

Someone gives me an injured cat to look at….I do not know why….There is lots of blood, the cat is injured in its belly area…I cannot see it clearly, but I realize the injury must be so bad the cat will not survive….I am sad for the cat, angry at whoever did this to the cat, and confused why it was given to me….

Some kind of clear glass or crystal….invented by accident?....I think of using it as a decoration for clothing….or a letter?....I see the decoration as if it were fastened at the center of the waist of a white gown being worn by a woman….It is in the shape of a colon, two little squares, one above the other….

I am driving a car, lining up behind some other cars….Part of a mission?....some kind of intrigue….women are involved….In line on a narrow wood dock….A woman in the car ahead of me tosses her blue cap ahead….Somehow this is an act of disrespect from her to me….I drive up, get the hat, then go back to my place in line….This shows that I will not accept her insult….

I am helping a guy learn a second language….It is hard because he is angry so much of the time….he is a politician?....so he is constantly engaged in anger filled interactions, and that makes it harder to concentrate on learning the new language….Later, I am talking with Erin, Haley, and my wife, and it is pleasant….but then Haley says she lost everything in that, and I say I know she did….I start to cry, I feel so sad about her and everything….I am glad to be with them….

Other people are doing something about HP Lovecraft, I do not understand it….They have large glass boxes that have something to do with it….I am curious, and worried that I am missing something important or relevant to my project….

April, the young assistant on Parks and Rec, is sad about something….A party is happening, other people around, but she has been taken away by someone?....I say go on with the party, that will make the people bring her back….I am concerned about her, and I want to help make the situation better for her….

I am in a house, and the door bell rings….I go to answer it, and two kids are there in costume….they are trick-or-treaters….I say, but Halloween was last week….they turn and, along with their mother behind them, they all run away in embarrassment….I feel sad for them and say wait, I will give you some candy anyway….But they are gone….

I am walking with someone in an outdoor setting….We are talking about transhumanist philosophy….We wonder, is it here yet, or still coming?....At some point I see three small metal objects, like capsules, maybe an inch in length, set in a row on a white table….Then one of the objects is missing, two are left?....Then, something about a cat?....I am concerned about its welfare….

I am an actor, and I want to make someone who is sad happier….But the people in charge of the play will not let me go in to perform….They have other plans….I am confused and disappointed….There is a sense of an inner room where the play is happening, and I am outside, aware of the play but not participating in it….

63. I had compelling dreams again this morning. It seemed like I was talking to people I know and miss. But when I fully woke up, still lying in bed, the dream was gone. Almost as though the dream maker part of me did not want the daytime part of me to remember.

I am with some people….A man is in charge of giving a talk or speech….But he is unprepared….He only has a limited stock of words to work with….Only one word of two-word pairs….We are nervous, unsure if he can pull it off….he seems confident, though….At another point my wife holds up one side of a pair of scissors….The other side is missing apparently, and she shows me with some frustration and exasperation, wondering how this could have happened….

A woman is leading an expedition….I am watching a guy, who is also me?, take care of ships while she leads….There are 291 ships in total?....But I know it is futile what the guy is doing….it is not really part of the bigger mission….rather sad for him….
