I wonder how I'll get back.

158. A game, like the iPad Lonely Cat Toy [app]. You touch the cat and it explodes. But since it's real, it's more dangerous and makes a mess. I try to stop it so I can pet the cat and not have it explode and cause a scene.

169. :15 a.m. - I'm doing some projects with a man and we end up in bed. He tells me the man we work for has gone missing. That means we didn't have to be at work. We decide instead to make love. It's like a spider leaving my body - maybe my soul mate.

172. I am feeling kind of depressed. Then Michelle Obama and Hillary Clinton come along and get me to use a copper hose. The only part that's copper is the nozzle. Just touching the copper makes me feel better. I get a copper bracelet. They need the hose back for other people. I tell them okay because the copper bracelet does the same thing. I feel hopeful. (Dream is about the debate tonight and the visit of Michelle Obama tomorrow.)

I have had 2 dreams about Trump since the election. Tues night I couldn't watch the results so I went to bed just after Ohio went red. I dreamt I was at Trump's Fl resort with 2 other women at a table with Donald opposite of us. He kept asking us over and over, why we hated him. All I could do was cry.
White people start to be racist and they think they are the only one who deserve to be in america. I was very upset in my dream and woke up crying!

I am sitting on the dark brown wooden floor of a big room….I suddenly realize with surprise that a play is going on, with the main character, a woman, wearing a white dress, curled up right next to me on the floor to my left….She is sad, and the spotlight is on her, everything else is dark….Out of respect for her, I subtly try to move away into the shadows, without disrupting the play….

I was sitting in a bench in Manhattan on a park the city was in flames and destroyed I was crying. Mr trump walked up to where I was and sat next to me with his hands on his face. No one else was around it was just us. And he said to me I'm sorry.I was angry and told him No and i walked away. (I'm not a Trump supporter but he won the election after my dream)

I am walking outside along a street with a tall guy, like a basketball player….He is sad about something…..Another guy stops us and says when we go forward we have to do some stupid thing in a different room….Like look at a pop-up page from a book?....some kind of powder comes out of the pop-up page?....it is confusing, and I find it annoying that we are being diverted from our path….

Lots of changes are happening at the database….A woman is helping….A guy come in, he thinks it is time to start the normal stuff, but we tell him there is lots of work to do before that, getting it to function better….He is sad, I hug him to make him feel better….He has been out in the rain?....He is missing part of his shirt?....Earlier, I am eating some soup….To my shock and horror I see the soup has pieces of cut-up snake in it….that is gross, I will not eat any more….

I want to help a guy with some big thing he is doing, a project….He is famous, an actor?....But he does not need my help, and he turns me away twice….At some point I get a text message on my phone: someone has died….it is a sad way to find out….

A house is being redone….Trump is there….It is unclear if he is helping or not….I want to help attach some ropes to the house, to help people down the hill connect to the house and come up….I feel good about my mission, but unsure about his role….

A kid has a new technological device….it is small and white, like a little pen….It is a total recording device?....It can record video and audio from wherever it goes, a complete record of all that happens….We walk into the White House together, and the kid is recording everything….Partly I think dismissively, it is a silly activity….Why would you want so much recorded information when you are already there anyway?....But partly I think in amazement, wow, that device changes everything….

I am in some dispute with the government....They say there is a problem in our yard, but I say I do not know about it....Suddenly a military jet shoots a missile, and it blows up a big pile of dirt in our yard....I am shocked and scared, what are they doing?....That's a crazy escalation of force....Later, something about a woman and a bathing suit?....Going in our out of a building, along a second story walkway outside....I am trying to help, but also keep a respectful distance....

Some people are setting up theaters for plays along the Mississippi river....The theaters are on the shore at various places, and there is competition among the people about how to do it....I am facing upriver....Later, I see my wife, with a thin gold chain or necklace dangling from her mouth....I am unsure if she is aware of it, I tend to think not....

I am with a group of people, we each have our own skills, and we are being sent on a mission to help someone….a kid?....I see cones of shaved ice….I wonder, will they keep without melting while I complete the mission?....

In an outside area, my yard, with lots of trees….There was just a flood through this area….lots of destruction, debris….I see a couple of men laying on the ground in the dirt….Are they dead?....Yes, they were homeless guys….A doctor comes by, he knew them, and he checks their bodies….It is so sad….Also, Vito is also dead?....Some of the trees are leaning, in bad shape, dead….We have to cut them down at some point soon to make sure they will not fall on our neighbors….

Something is going on, I am outside and have two big coils of garden hose….I realizes this is not a good set up for whatever is happening, I am at a disadvantage….One of the hoses is black, one is green….

Something about a ring of cooking, making dishes to replace others in special spots on the ring….But it does not go as planned….There are problems in replacing the big dishes with little ones….Other people cooking around me….Later, I see from behind Billy and his son standing together….I wonder, is his son still alive?....No, he is not….but there he is….That is very sad….Later, I see someone take a pastry out of a pan….it is a big flaky mess….it might taste ok, but it looks terrible….

Some guy is handing out guns, rifles to a group of seven or eight of us….we are getting ready for a battle or mission….I am unsure if I want to be part of this….Later, someone makes a salad in a brown salad bowl….I see bright orange shredded carrots on top….

Some army guys want me to be part of a mission….They are going over a plan and need me and other people to join in….But someone else is saying no, do not do it, it is dangerous, they will harm you….A woman says this?....She says the army guys do not really know what they are doing, you should not get caught up with them….

I see a woman in a salt-and-pepper shaker Halloween costume….it is a complicated affair, with her head covered under a top with two cylinders, one black and one white….the cylinders have fluted carvings on the side, and sprinkles of white and black on top….It is a very clever costume….Then going back, I tell some guys it is actually a girl under there, and no one knows….She is doing this without any permission or awareness of others….Earlier: I am asked to join some group by a woman….

I am driving a van, and I realize it has the same hood insignia as a van used only for a charity group….My van is red, that one is white?....I drive the van up to an airport, which is across a large square green grass field….I suddenly realize no, I should go back, this is not right, I am not ready for this yet….Earlier, I am with a boy, and when he sees a group of people he starts crying….He was crying earlier, and now he’s crying again….I wonder why….

When I was walking in the jungle, I heard someone crying so I went following the voice. I found a man who was turning to the other side and was crying. And I asked, "Why are you crying?" He said, "Because I see you." Perplexed, I asked him, "Why are you crying seeing me?" He said, "Because you are spoilt." Then I asked, "Why are you crying because I am spoilt?" He replied, "Because I have a great plan for your life." Lastly, I asked, "Who are you?" He said, "I am Jesus."
In my dream a tiger was chasing me. I was restless. I was crying and running and the tiger was chasing me. Suddenly I woke up.
And I saw [my father]… he was dead in my dream, and I was crying like that
So I had a dream like I’m in my school and I suddenly heard that my dad is no more and I’m crying like that… my friends are approaching me with the bad news, like that

I saw my friend… she was like so depressed, and I tried to ask her what happened but she wasn’t telling me anything… she was going far away from me, and I tried to stop her as well… and it was like, “I don’t know what was that”… I just saw that only

Above my house there is one road… on the road there was one bus and many students were riding the bus… when that bus was coming there was an accident… and after the accident all of the students had died… but I had not died… but many students had died… And it became like this, in our village all the students died… after they died those children’s mothers were crying because that bus came… and [all of a sudden I woke up]…

I was attending a party. In that party there was a girl who was unknown to me. Everybody was sitting in the room but I was sitting outside the room. And suddenly the one whom I love came. He was flirting with that girl and I was getting angry. He came to me and I asked him why he was flirting with that girl. Then he replied that he is leaving me for that girl. Then there was some cold drinks’ bottle and I hit it on my head. And I was crying with him and gave him a slap.

I was on top of the mountain where the environment was [like] the sun was not shining and the rain was not raining. I was feeling lonely in that place and I did not even know the place. At that time one man that I did not know gave me a New Testament and said that the book talks about the way and the truth.

I saw a dream: my sister was dead. I was crying as I looked at my sister. Then I remembered what my uncle (mom’s brother) said [a few days before]. He said one believing in [Jesus] will never die. And I prayed in my dream. Then, I saw my sister coming back to life. My eyes were filled with light.

In the dream my family members all were crying, shouting. I was asking them for the reason. And when I found that [reason] I too started panicking. My brother who is in Dubai was dead. And his dead body was lying on the floor covered with a white cloth – so cold and so lost. I also burst into tears. Then the dream suddenly finished. I woke up.

I saw that I was writing the exam… before I was going to exam my mom put tikka here, blessed me for exam… [then] I was giving the exam… and the time ran away… and I could not write all the questions and I could not pass the exam. Actually it’s the exam of +2, 12… board exam. And I was crying there, I could not write the exam, I became fail in dreams… All my friends [passed] and I could not pass… I became fail so I was [feeling tension]…

I was bound and gagged. There was a man with a gun holding it directly against my leg. He fired the gun but somehow the bullet missed. He fired again and missed. He tried yet again. He became frustrated and angry. He grabbed a stun gun and placed it against my abdomen and it jolted me awake.
A series of dreams after getting divorced - my kids hated me and would be cussing at me. I would be crying in my dreams, and when I woke up, I would be crying.

When I was about 10, I spent a few night's at my cousins' house. While there, I recall very vividly a dream in which I was hiking with my father through the woods and I fell down a very steep cliff. The last thing I remember is looking upward at my panic-stricken father as I fell through the air to the ground. I awoke screaming with tears streaming down my face. I also managed to wake up the entire household.
My teenage daughter was in an auto accident and I went to the scene and saw her body. It was so real I woke up crying and could not get over the fact that is was a dream

I had a nightmare where I do not remember the dream as much as the day that followed. the dream was of being in love and loosing the person for some reason. I was very depressed during the dream and it was quite unsettling, and the mood followed me all day long, I found myself depressed and distraught well into the next day.
I saw my husband in a coffin. I was wearing a yellow outfit. He was in a dark suit. I woke myself up crying and my husband comforted me.
the worst nightmares have been that I somehow missed heaven

I had a recurring nightmare when I was in my 20's that my younger brother was being hunted by some group of people and that he'd get shot in several places (sometimes with guns or sometimes with arrows or knives)and I'd be trying to stop the bleeding and save his life and begging him to hang on and live and I'd wake up crying.

I was in grade school (probably in first or second grade) when I dreamed that we were under Atomic attack. I saw the mushroom cloud and could feel the heat from the blast. I woke up crying (my parents woke me because they had heard me cry)
I showed up for a final exam and realized that i had missed it.

I used to have nightmares about my boyfriend, who was working in Iraq as a civilian contractor and me fighting. They were brutal fights, and I would wake up crying, sweating, etc. I haven't had that nightmare in quite a while.

I was 11 or 12. I was in the house when I heard a baby crying. I went outside and heard the crying coming from the garden. So, I went out to the garden and started looking for the crying baby. Suddenly, a panther jumped up from between the rows of okra and started chasing me. I ran for the house, trying to scream for help, but unable to make a sound. Then I tripped on a hole in the ground and fell. I knew the panther would kill me.
I dont remember any nightmares, but I do remember having dreams that made me very sad.
My daughter is with the youth group somewhere and I go to pick her up and she is missing. He friends and she have been kidnapped by evil people. I wake up before she is found.
Being former military they range from missing formation to a gun to afamily meberss head.

Worst nightmare was being chased by someone down dark city streets. I didn't know who it was or why they were chasing me but I seemed to know they meant to do me harm. I remember feeling like I could hardly breathe, was sweating and also crying. I was pounding on doors and begging for help but no one would open the door. I woke up with my face wet with tears and my pillow soaking wet from my crying and my hair drenched in sweat.

I had two young children. My dream woke me up with a shudder... I looked down into the outdoor stairwell of my neighbor's backyard cellar and there was standing water in it. their were two things floating in the murky water. One was a tiny tears doll and one was a decomposing baby. I was really shaken by the dream then, but in time I realized it was about perfectionism. I let go of trying to be perfect and the dream didn't bother me any more.
I was standing in front of a fresh grave in deep sorrow. I could see my back. Someone placed their hand on my back and told me to let it go. And I was relieved.

I was in the AF working with a co-worker who was know for making mistakes. In the dream he dropped a screwdriver and set off a nuclear explosion in a missle silo. This was back in 1978 not long after a maintnace accident that caused a titan II missle to explode and hurl a nuclear warhead sevral hundred feet from the explosion.

About a week after my dear father-in-law died, I dreamt I heard a knock at the door just like he used to knock, and he was standing there. I opened the door and cried out to him that we thought he was dead and where had he been. I remember waking up, crying, knowing that he really was gone.

In high school, I had a recurring nightmare where I would be at various parties and was looking everywhere for my boyfriend and couldn't find him, and Tori Amos' song "Caught a Lite Sneeze" was playing during this dream. It was the feeling of sadness and loneliness that was the worst part about it.
I dreamed one of my kids were missing. I felt total and complete dispair. I did everything I could to find her. Finally woke up when I couldn't take the grief anymore.
All I remember is being chased and pushed down. and then waking up with tears in my eyes. Waking with a start.

That my husband cheated on me and he wanted a divorce. I was very upset!!! He kept telling me he wanted a divorce and I was crying and asking him to work it out. I remember him kissing another woman in a corridor, like high school, and they saw me and didn't care.
Worst would be living through the death and burial of spouse or parents or both, feeling the despair and anguish of missing them while knowing that this is a dream and should not be felt.

My husband had died and I was utterly devistated. I knew that I would never see him again-ever. I felt alone-like I was the only person in existence. I experienced extrememly realistic-intense emotions in the dream that carried on as I woke. I woke up crying. This dream stayed with me in detail for days and I would cry whenever I recalled it.

My mother died in Afghanistsn. The grief was unusually vivid and the feelings of shock occurred the next day after the dream. In reality, my mom had been back from Afghanistan for 6 months at the time.
Any dream where people in my life die. They are always so real and I usually wake up crying.

I don't have details but my arm had a terrible disease which made the skin disappear and made it look the the crystals on a stone, in golds and browns, in large size bumps in a pattern. I had the disease a while but I just noticed it.
don't remember many details, but I've dreamed about family members dying, and woken up crying.

I was flying on a plane with a friend, we were sitting in the middle three seats of a large jet (2-3-2 seat set-up) and then all of a sudden the plan started shaking and then spinning and plummeting to the ground,my friend and i were screaming and crying and praying, and then we crash landed and I thought I had died.

I was standing in the gravel and dust parking lot of a John Deere tractor dealership. It was slightly overcast and no one else was there. The wind was blowing through the tall grass and around the machinery with a sad, lonely whine. I felt alone and scared.

I remember dreaming a silly dream about being in Disneyland riding on the tea cups eating cotton candy I woke up sad because I lost my mickey mouse hat. I was a devoted Mickey Mouse Club viewer and if I wasn't dreaming about being on the show, I was dreaming about being somewhere in Disneyland.

recurring earlier in life. I am hiding under a staircase in an old two story house. My grandmother's house. My mother finds me hiding. She is wearing a black dress and a pillbox hat with a light veil covering her eyes. She says she is leaving me. I am sad and afraid but she is smiling.

I remember dreaming of war I had seen on the news when I was about two years old, I was sitting on the couch between two mean looking buzzards in a dark room watching that on TV and they told me I was in hell, and I began crying. Another about the same time was simply me around our home and I was dreaming how everyone always seemed to be asking me to slow down cause I had a lot of energy, so I ate a bumblebee and it made me float in slomo.
i dreamed i had a pony and it died and i woke up crying.

A fox was in a big tree outside our house. It had a rifle and was shooting at my parents. Someone in the family got a gun and shot the fox. But, then a neverending line of wolves appeared at the door. And then I woke up crying.
My mother had died and I was riding in a car behind the hearse. My father said, "Don't cry anymore." a week later my fatheer died and my mother said in rhe car behind the hearse "Don't cry anymore."

I lived in an area where I had to cross a bridge over the Mississippi and walked over it every day to school. Indians lived on one side and would make me walk on the railing over the river. It was very scary, and I dreamed about crossing bridges until I was probably in my 30's. I could never get across them.
Swinging in a porch swing with my mother who was singing a sad but beautiful song about some orphan children.
Falling from a very high place - can remember waking up crying.

I remember one that was reaccuring. I would be falling but a school teacher I had that did not like the fact my mother was a working mother pushed me. I did not like this teacher and would get in trouble because I would tell her she was mean. That was 3rd grade.more than 55 years ago and I still remember even the teacher's name Miss Smith.
Someone was taking me away from my mother and I couldn't stop them. I would wake up crying.
I dreamed some one was chasing me & where ever I went he was always there.I couldn't get rid if him & I was so scared.He had almost caught me when I woke up & I had been really crying.It was awful.
I was in bed in my room and then a bunch of statues that looked like the oscars appeared and started toppling over toward me. I ran out to my mom's room barely being missed by each one.
I was alone in the world with no one else. I saw myself sitting on the ground and looking around looking for people. (For me it was a bad dream and I woke up crying about it and told my father.)
I was playing with a girl friend/cousin and we got into an argument. She started crying and I scrunched up my face in anger.
Age: 2-3 yeras. I am in a crib crying for my mother. That's all I remember.

I usually dream I am being chased by somebody and when I try to run I fail, as result I start crawling on my knees faster and when I try to shout for help my voice goes out and I start to cry and all of a sudden I woke up feeling tired and scared.
Last night I dreamed that Ba Miller [missionary] gave me a pastor's manual and a hymn book and he asked me to lead the service and he walked away.
In my dream today there was a small child with me. He was crying and I was trying to make comfort to the child. I don't know who the child was.

Last night, I was singing a Christian song in a group of people. While we were singing, a certain man I didn't know came and chased me. He didn't say anything. I started running away. As I was running away that man said, "Why are you running away? You come back here!" I kept on running until I was in the bush alone. I started crying. I thought the man would injure or kill me.

In 1985, in October, I dreamed that inside of my cheeks was a burnt cob of maize coming down from inside my head. Then I began crying, being afraid. When I awoke I began getting sick. There was a wound on the outside of the cheek where it was swollen in the dream because of the cob.
Last year I used to dream I was crying because I was fearing to be burnt by my husband with a fire. Several times. This year I dreamt I was beaten by my husband and then he burnt off my clothes.
Last week I dreamt I had a baby. Then after a short period that baby passed away. I started crying while asleep. I awoke.

Once I dreamed (one month ago) of my mother who passed away. When she came to me I tried to follow her. When I followed her she fell down. I found she was dead when I got there. By then I was crying and my husband woke me up.
Second dream. I see my family every now and then, arranging my burial. I don't know why. That's my main problem. They are arranging my coffin, and crying.

I found myself in the street with a Bible in my hand. I was crying and preaching to people in the streets, but they just looked at me and passed. I felt very bad that people did not stop to listen. As I cried I awoke from the dream. My brother woke me because I was crying.

106. Last night I seemed to see a commission [for me] as a Lieutenant or captain or something similar; but I asked Secretary Bierchenius to report that I desired to remain in my former office as assessor.

51. I heard a bear growling but did not see him. I dared not remain in the upper story, for there was a carcass there which he might scent. I therefore descended to one of the chambers of Dr. Monneus and shut the windows. Dr. Monneus seemed to be courting a pretty girl; he obtained her consent, and had permission to take her wherever he wanted. I teased her, saying that she was quite walling to say Yes, etc. She was a pretty girl, and grew taller and more beautiful.

In the dream I went to my college friend's house. She was very sick and she was lying on the bed. I went close to her and talked with her (I don't remember what I said). But I was sad. As I was still talking, I woke up.

It was a place in a village that I knew about. There were many houses, many people. There were many known and unknown people. There were also animals like cows and horses. I was afraid in my dream. Lots of people there were crying a lot. I also wanted to cry. Other people's houses were swept away by a landslide. All the people were troubled.

I was walking in my village with my friends. As I was walking I reached a place where there was a barko tree. As I turned back, I saw the ghost of a dead daughter of a village brother – she was coming towards me. The ghost child did not look that terrifying but I was very afraid. And I began crying [in my dream and] even in the real life.

I’ve got a dream that my exam were coming near and me and my friend Pratiksha – age 20 – went to the college to give the exam. I realized that my seat was on the first bench and my friend was far from me, so I was so worried. [I was writing the exam] then suddenly my friend came and said that she was going to Bangalore, India, for the abroad study. Then she began to catch the bus, and I cried for so long time that when I woke up from my dream I was really crying.

When I was walking, I saw a woman of about 32 years of age. She was our neighbor. At that time I saw a snake. I wanted to kill it but it escaped. It was green in color and the woman was asking me not to kill it. I hurled some stones at it two or three times but I missed the target. And it ran away. Then, I woke up.

In my dream some men were chasing me and I was afraid. But at that time, one person came and saved me. Before that I was crying and he wiped away my tears. And I thought I would not live but I was flying in the sky. And I saw the green forest set on fire. On top of the green forest a strange person clad in white, bright clothing was standing. And the five people who were looking for me were looking up to me from the ground but I was flying up in the sky.

I saw one dream three days ago… I saw a dream like my “mummy” she was dead… I saw a death dream… and I was feeling bad in the dream and I was crying in the dream… I was crying a lot… I didn’t know what happened but I woke up suddenly with a start… my mummy was dead… Timothy Sir told me, “Your mummy is dead,” and these [sorts of things] in the dream… and after I woke up I said, “I have seen a dream”… [It was the most scary dream I have seen in my life]

I see an image of a small quartz crystal pendulum that is attached to a very worn and dingy string. It is mine. I think that it needs a new string. I hold it in the palm of my hand, and it is in color. I feel that I need to replace the string soon, as something is going to happen. There were men and women in the background in a warm, well-lit colorful, friendly place.

I am driving home and my car breaks down so I have to walk three miles to get home. I am joined by three men who tell me what is wrong with my car. one says my front tires are low on air. One says I have run out of gas. One says the axle is broken. But I know the transmission has gone out.
I was putting on my makeup. My mother took it away from me. She also took away my jewelry and the other things I used to make myself beautiful. I could not get them back, and I was very sad.

I was in our courtyard, standing in front of a tenement as Nazis come out of the front door of our house. They notice me, shoot, but miss. I fall down on the ground, I do not know why. Then another Nazi comes over and he shoots at my head. My mother runs out of the building and shouts at him. But I do not hear her. After some time elapses, I rise. My fall is all covered with blood but there is no hole in my head.

I am in a waiting room at a train station. I see a French text on one of the seats. I take it, and start to read it. I ask a man if there is exercise equipment like dumbbells. He answers that there are. I say, "Okay. If so, I won't waste my time. I will combine learning French and physical exercise." Then I hear a voice saying that the train is about to leave. I run very quickly and catch it. But I see the staff is making small monuments on the seats to the people who missed the train.

This dream was colorful in blue and white tones. I am very high in the mountains. All the time, I try to run away from a man. I run very fast, almost flying. I want to cry "Mama!" But I have no strength to do it. Some clouds are beneath the level where we run, but the others are as high as we are. Through the dream, I was very scared of the fact that the man might catch me.

My younger son and I were walking down the riverbank. We found the breathless body of my older son in the water. We got him out of the water and placed him on the ground. I realized that he was alive, but he was not breathing for some reason. I started crying. (Then I woke up.)

I am in a hallway in an apartment house. A young woman who I do not know enters the hallway alone; I assume she is coming back from work. Suddenly a man comes out of nowhere, and grabs her. He tears off her clothes and starts to rape her. I am horrified. But I know I will be in danger if I try to come to her defense, so I just stand there. I look for a door so that I can escape and call the police, but I do not see any.

I see a bright orange flaming ball explode in front of my window. I seem to know that the war has begun. The missiles and bombs are flying. The explosions are everywhere. Gorbachev is sitting in an easy chair on the town square. The bomb falls down on him and it explodes.

I am in a low, wooden house. Two young women are there. The newspaper with Lenin's picture on it lies on the floor. Someone's footsteps are on the portrait. I say, "You dragged him through the mud." The woman answer, "Our school director told us to throw it away." I say, "The time will come when everything will get into its right place." I take the newspaper, leave the room, and start crying.

I am at home. I hear somebody knocking at the door. I open the door. My husband (who I married two months ago in waking life) stands on the threshold. He has stumps instead of a right arm and a right leg. I escape in tears into the other room. And he follows me. And he keeps saying, "Well, now. The, I am such a man. Just bear it."

I am on a strange street trying to find my way to a place I have never visited before. I am walking along a road going through a remote town. I hear that a man in the town I am walking through has just fallen into the river. He has hit his head and drowned. This makes me feel very sad, even though I did not know the man.

This was a sad dream because a friend of mine, Chris, had died. He left his schoolbooks behind and I began to cry. I asked another male friend of mine if I should give the schoolbooks away. He said, "Yes, that would be a good idea." I noticed that some books had a girl's name on them, and I wondered if Chris had borrowed them from her.

I dreamed about a handsome Eastern European tennis player with long hair. He was about 30 years old. We were in a grassy, sunny place. But there was a feeling of underlying sadness even though he was popular and was talking with many people. I couldn't hear what he was saying but I knew he had AIDS and he knew it too, but no one else did. He climbed on to a motorbike. It was metallic, brightly colored, and well kept, but not huge. I realized that this was at a tennis club in Bristol.

I get on a double-decker bus with all of my possessions. I remember having trouble getting going, and also had trouble with an earlier bus. Then I see my bus being started and driven away. I try to catch it in my car, but the council workers had removed a bridge and left a chasm. I break down and cry in utter frustration. It is feels very important. The council workers tell me that they will put steel girders over the area so that I can get across in my car.

A child is being adopted, and is taken away from a mother who does not want to give him up. She is being coerced. I become the mother who is being forced to give up my child. I am wailing over and over. I think that no one will understand, that this is really not what I want to do. They will think that I am just sad about it, as are lots of others who do the same thing. I can’t seem to get my feelings across to people, for some unknown reason.

I am with a young woman and her parents. A friend of mine is there in the role of a psychotherapist. He tells us about her psychological condition. Her father is very depressed and distant, and she is too closely identified with her mother. During all of his talking, my friend uses a hoarse voice. This voice is similar to someone who is drunk, or even a person who has been possessed by a "caboclo" spirit, the spirit of someone with mixed parentage, both native Indian and European.

I am talking with someone in a place that is like a restaurant when a person tells me something. He tells me that my brother is very sad and is crying, and that he is right besides us. I look in that direction, and my brother is really there, very sad. But my brother looks much younger than he is now, perhaps fifteen years younger.

Some female friends and I are cultivating a garden in a natural setting. We find some stones in the earth, and two of them are crystals. One of these is impure because it contains streaks of metal. The other is clear and pure. A young boy asked me for one of them and I give him the impure crystal. But he wants the pure crystal to protect him spiritually. At this moment one of my friends leaves the garden and offers both of us some coconut candy.

I am with a group of people, and then one woman starts to run. I see her passing by my side wearing a bright red scarf. As she passes, she is crying about how tragic her life is. Then I try to cheer her up by telling her some of the tragedies in my life. I began to cry, and she asks me what is tragic about my life. Slowly I stop crying and pull myself together, but now the woman is far ahead of my in the race.

I am a bird, a bird of the desert. I am flying across the land and see a tribe below. They are procuring food. The warriors are in front and the old men, women, and children are behind them. They do not have the strength to keep up with the warriors. Some of them are leaving the road to die. I feel a great compassion for these people but can do nothing about it. I fly to the top of a mountain. I feel strong with great power and then remember the tribal children who are dying and start to cry.

It is the end of the world. I am with a group of people who are trying to escape the water that is coming to cover us. We are very sad as the entire planet starts to become completely inundated. We are able to swim on the top of the waves, at least for a time.

I am in the apartment where I used to live. I am cleaning the kitchen and feel a strange presence. I think it may be thieves. There are two strangers who arrive, and they frighten me. They help me clean my apartment. They place molds and frames around all the light in the apartment. They give a box filled with three crystals, dolls, and other nice things. I keep the box open so that others can see it.

I am in a university classroom that is very hectic. I am trying to study for an examination. A woman asks me many questions and I can not concentrate. I think she is another student, but I do not recognize her. I tell her to shut up. She keeps on talking and I punch her. She runs away crying, and asks the teacher to eject me from class. But he takes my side and says the woman should not have interrupted my study.

I saw an opportunity that was available to me for a job that I desperately needed. Other people had promised me a job but they did not deliver. But the person who had the concept for this undertaking did not keep his promise either. As a result, I had the profound feeling of sadness, injustice, and anguish.

I am on a small airplane being flown by my friend. It is a damaged airplane. We go, without secure conditions. We begin to make turns and somersaults, and he keeps flying faster without my assent. I ask my friend to stop. I shout. The situation is desperate. Suddenly, I see the ground that I had warned my friend about. But he has been thrown from the small airplane and smashed to death. I survive, but I cry wildly with much sadness.

I have just arrived in a city where there are many people crying and screaming. There are many houses destroyed by an earthquake. I feel desperate and sad as I observe the destruction. There are men and women burned, with ambulances driving around, and civic helpers helping, and people from various religions helping, giving counsel, trying to find those who are lost, and calming the bewildered.

My cousin, who I adored and with whom I feel a close identification, died. I felt a great grief, but aside from this, I tried and I tried to console my aunt who was destroyed by her child's death. I told her that this would pass, that it was like a dream, and that meaning would return to her life.

I am imprisoned in a sanitarium with my husband and my three sons, two, five, and seven years of age. We have not done anything wrong. Terrorists enter, armed with guns and dressed in black. I escape with my youngest son to find help. My other two sons stay there and are killed. My husband survives and I saw, at least we have saved one son. I feel grief and sadness because I had not been able to get help from anyone.

I want to go back to my home, near a star, the planet "Lilaz. "It is made of crystal rock and amethyst. There, I'm only energy with other people who are also energy. Always in the dream I feel intense emotion, being homesick for my home on that planet. And I feel that I am travelling in the direction of the planet, through a dark space.

I have to get down from someplace, usually outdoors, and find the stairs are shaky, and some steps are missing. And I'm scared and begin to fall. I consider using some shaky structures like boards or planks that are loose, and I seem to swing back and forth and sideways when I try to step or crawl on them.

I am walking outside, and notice that my wallet is missing. I turn around to see a guy running away with it. He drops it, and I pick it up. But it isn't mine. Then the guy comes back and shoots me in the head. I fall to the ground, holding my head where it was shot, and I hear a man say, “Man, pop her again.” I act as if I am dead, so I won’t get shot twice. My legs start to feel stiff and I can’t move.

My girl friend and her former boy friend start to chase after me with needles. I keep on running, hoping that I can catch a bus. But I just miss the bus. I am glad because I see my boyfriend coming down the street. I start to cry as he holds me. I wait with him for his bus, and my attackers don’t dare come after me.

I had a dream that my boy friend left me. I thought that everything was going well in our relationship, and I had arranged to meet him for a date at a shopping mall. When I arrived, he was already there. But he said, “I do not love you anymore,” and walked away. I was surprised and sad.

I was watching a ship at sea. A storm came up. The men and women in the ship were caught in the wreck. I think they all drowned --hundreds of them. There were no survivors that I could see. Their bodies sank into the water. A long time later, one of the drowned men appeared to me. He said that he wanted peace. His soul wanted rest. He came to me, asking if I would help him. If I knew about him, this would give him permission to finally have peace.

(Dream within a dream) A witch was attacking me. I felt miserable and lonely. Then I woke up. But I was still in the dream. Now I was with another woman, and I was tired. I was telling her about the terrible dream. She wanted to know what city it was in, and wanted to hear about the structure of the city. I drew a map on a piece of paper. The houses were built along a winding river. The woman began to criticize my drawing. (Suddenly I woke up and I was really awake.)

This dream took place in the house where I grew up. I was with my sister's corpse. She had died. I was very sad. Then the dead body started to talk to me. She was very friendly. We had a nice conversation. She told me where some candy had been hidden by her. I went to her room and found it. It was in a box. I ate it. I told my sister it was very good.

I am in a room and it is in the dark. Many friends and my husband are present. They believe very strongly that they have to getaway from me. So they are leaving me. I have been very cold and indifferent to them, so they have given up on me. I was scared and sad, crying and trying to stop them. Then I woke up with tears in my eyes.

I am lost. I cry out, "Someone please help me!" Then I realize that even though I am lonely, I am okay. I find some berries to eat in the forest, and I drink some water from a mountain stream. So I have found a way to take care of myself.

I am at the Shinto shrine and it is festival time. I am eating some Chinese noodles with my parents, but then I go outside and I get lost. I can not find my parents. I cry. My father finds me and picks me up. I felt very safe after my father found me and picked me up.

something was missing; then somehow unrelated I was in different apartments, either people were looking for me or I was looking for them. can't remember much but it was not unpleasant, it was kinda nice - no problems.

I go to a run-down public bathroom, broken toilet seats, dirty. I miss the toilet, get it on myself and my robe. Interpretation: Self expression; getting rid of negative experience or emotions. 7. “Two Different Guys” or “Mediation/Negotiation” There’s a big guy who wants to fight with a little guy. And he actually wants to kill this little guy. The little guy is afraid. And then a woman goes in between them as a mediator and starts negotiating with the big guy. [abroad]

I am involved with a family who is trying to eliminate drug activities in their community. The real danger is the drug lord is aware of their intentions. The only thing I remember is running. I am running and my shoelace becomes untied. It’s my right sneaker. I can’t stop running to tie it and I am so afraid that I will trip and fall.
196. Packing, having to go to a class then the airport. I'm afraid that I'm late but people help me and I find some friends and get to the class right on time.

213. I see some dead bodies and call the police. I get so scared I can't talk. One is a woman stuffed in a washing machine. One is when the old guy stuffs bodies into suitcases. I push him down a flight of stairs. I get so frightened a dead body in the washing machine I show the cops.

I am at an airport. Security is extremely tight. Accidentally I enter a section of the airport which is off-limits to passengers and a variety of alarms are immediately triggered. Men with guns surround me and take me to an interrogation center. They let me go as soon as they realize it was a mistake.

I am in a haunted house with haunted grounds. In the dream I am going around the house and grounds, knowing how dangerous the area is. Candy is also in the dream, she tried to get close to me and I keep backing away, annoyed. It was a long dream; a lot of moving in a circular direction around the house and grounds. Later in the dream we realize the house is not haunted after all and there is a big party there (or dance) where everyone dances in and outside.

I had a dream about Hillary, although I remember only the end. She was president and was ordering a nuclear strike. I have no recollection of who it was against, or the circumstances that led up to it, but I was very frightened in the dream.

Hillary was coming up the steps to my front door. In a panic, realizing I was wearing a big tin Obama button, I dashed toward the back of the house, yelling to my kids to waylay her. I didn't want her to see that I'd made the decision to support her opponent. I darted out to the back porch while hastily plastering something over my Obama pin so I could neutrally greet my high-profile visitor. As Hillary came into the front hall, I realized I'd pasted over my Obama pin with an Obama sticker.

There was a huge animal - a wolf or bear-like beast loose in the area. It is enormous - the size of a horse but fatter, squatter and has features more like a cat. Initially this beast was captured and sedated - tied down with straps and blankets, but somehow it revived itself and got away. There was panic. People were running around trying to get to safety.

My_brother and I (with perhaps also my_partner and kids) are trying to cross a border in a snow covered harsh rural environment - perhaps somewhere in Russia. We are part of a long line of refugees, but for some reason we are being chased by some agents or border control guards. We're trying to get across unnoticed, but it doesn't work, and a chase ensues. We end up being split up in the panic and crowds. I fire a gun. I'm highly stressed when I wake up.

I live in a very large shared house with several other people. It's an old victorian building with several several stories and rooms in the roof. We may be students, because we have piles and piles of records. There was previously a flood here, and all the stuff got destroyed. It's pelting down with rain outside, and the river has burst its banks again. Brown water is rising gradually. We panic and move all the stuff to the attic. There's chaos in the house, and arguments break out.

I was in a valley filled with pine, between massive sweeping snow-capped mountains. There was a trail that led across the basin around the lake in the middle. I had a camera. There were animals that were unafraid. A red raccoon came nearby, and I began to photograph it in detail.

I found myself climbing out of a reef. It was almost built into a building, half outside. I had fallen asleep under water with scuba gear on as I was watching the fish and coral. I woke up and gently rested on some live coral. I was afraid I would hurt it and that it could sting me. Then I realized how long I had been under water and climbed out. My hands and feet were very wrinkled. I’d stayed in too long.

I’m in a bedroom somewhere….Bad guys, assassins, keep trying to break in to kill me….I’m scared, but I manage to fight them off each time….In part, I’m surprised at my skill and quickness in fighting them….Someone else helps me at some point, like a superhero guy….

My son is in a concert and what was happening in the concert and him getting crushed and him being frightened and his father losing the kids and then when the concert had finished the kids and the father going back to the car and losing both of the kids, the father losing my son and my son getting frightened.

I get really mad at Ronald (or my brother?) for threatening someone with a hammer….I have to intervene between them….I tell Ronald to go to his room as punishment….At some other point I’m running, with a flowing sweater cape for some reason….I go down a winding road (like in a nearby town) and happen to cross in front of a pickup truck….Then a gray-haired guy on a bike rides next to me….He gives me a weird look….like he’s checking me out?....I say go on already, ride past me and be gone….

I had a dream that memories and dreams weren't allowed. There was a secret service that went around and erased peoples' memories. There was a way to hide if you had any memories, though, and I tried to figure out what it was. I was terrified that they would erase all my dreams, my past, my memories, so I tried to pretend I was blank and had already been erased. Then they went into my room in Fenster and tried to rip up my pillows and comforter to find my dreams. Ugh, it was awful!
I was staying with my_friend Ron and his sister in a dilapidated house. We were hiding there from some threat.

I see a long (3-4 feet) yellow and red striped snake slither fast into a kitchen….My wife and others are in there….The snake goes up onto the counter….Everyone is surprised and scared….I hurry in to catch it….My wife gets it, and so do I….I grab it by the neck so it won’t bite me….Then I walk out, with the snake curled around my hand and arm….Now what do I do?....

I’m in an apartment building….A girl leans out a window, she starts to slip and fall….I grab her legs and pull her back inside….I’m not sure at first if she needs help, and I’m reluctant to act, to touch her without knowing….But it turns out she was very scared and glad I grabbed her….Later, the building is under attack….Bombs hitting from outside….we move further inside for protection….they’re shooting rockets at the building, with big explosions and lots of destruction….
