Dreamed about my step-brother Jason; something about needing help and having a huge, black, futuristic, muscle truck.
91. Showing homes to prospects, including Lorrie.

92. More real estate dreams - showing houses, listings, people. I have some things to take along or return. I have a few ceramic items I will keep because the clay cracked - a large glass face, or something. We must go on busses.

I am making a presentation to a group of army personnel. Since this presentation was developed and written by someone else, I had never seen it before. Since this is the first time I am seeing the script, I am not familiar with the material. Once I have finished the group and I decide to review the script and come up with some themes to vote on at a later meeting.
93. Showing houses. In one part I see old friends and we make up nicknames for each other. I see one woman and tell her we want to call her Auntie Ann.

A bunch of adults are standing in a line. I’m not sure what we are doing there, but it seems to me we are being treated like school children: if we talk, we will be kept after school. Which is what happens to me. I kept talking to my friend who was behind me. Eventually, I was caught and punished.

94. I'm in a big warehouse with lots of old junk. Some is for sale. I see Kerry and some other people I know. I tell Kerry that if she decides to have a yard sale, I can help her look for people stealing stuff. She stops to talk to our old friend Wendy. I stop to say goodbye. I hug Kerry, then Wendy. Her hair is very stiff with hairspray. She says she's been staying in Brentwood where people take care of her.
95. Setting up MLS searches. There's a big white limo parked at the airport every day. I met the man who owns it. He drives up there every day along a route that takes him through Papago Park.
An old girl friend of Matt’s drops by. Matt is not here. Delene has been in the army and is home on vacation. We chit chat a bit and then she leaves.

My grandmother (paternal grandmother) is reading a poem she wrote “Halfway to Heaven”. As she reads, I look through the sunlit porch wishing I could believe what she believes. When she’s done, I’m thinking that she’ll never get there (to heaven). We drink our tea and talk. It’s nice. I fade out.

96. The MLS takes me right into people's back yards. I go see Ron Dragin again and get him to sign with me. Kyle and I live together and want a child. We go talk to a surrogate. Then I decide to have the baby myself.
I am at a reunion of my ordination class. This seems to e a rather fancy affair. I come across a couple friars I haven’t seen in a long time: Blaise and Colin. We have a great time.
I am with a group of people. It seems to be a group on tour. Anyway, I end up being the caretaker of everybody’s money.
Somehow, I got the job of calling up parents and enrolling their children in CCD. The family that sticks in my memory is Pally and Russ. What doesn’t make sense is their children are all in college.
I seem to be in a crowd but what doesn’t make sense is that we are involved in sexual activity by way of fondling. I wake up.

I am participating in a huge political rally. What is different about this rally is that it is made up of both democrats and republicans and this is what is most unusual; everyone is getting along and agreeing with each other.

Again dreamed of a Kore figure: Greek female statues. I dreamed about waiting in line at a huge buffet, watching the food being replaced and not able to get to the salads. I find a rolled up turkey wrap that looked good but still waiting for salad.

We are part of a good size parish picnic. There is much talking and eating going on. Finally, people leave. I am the last one left (at least so I thought) when I spot a boy’s hat on the table. As I start looking around , a little boy comes out of the men’s room I realize after talking to him , he does not know how to get home. So, I call the police but they can’t help me. So, I take the boy home

I am at some sort of religious seminar. We are discussing topics like celibacy and abortion. My attitude about celibacy is that this commitment is very effective in freeing up the clergy to pursue their vocation. However, I do believe the commitment should be freely chose rather than imposed as a condition for ministry.
The only thing I remember is the smell of flowers; very sweet, very strong.
98. A friend comes over and shows me another friend's baby. It's so small it fits in her hand. It looks like a little wax Buddha.

There is snow on the ground. It is not easy getting around. I am on foot. As I try to get through the snow, I notice three men coming towards me that I don’t know. They seem to be upset that I am in the area. They begin making snowballs and throwing them. I wake up.

I am an officer in the Navy. I am in the search for a radio studio and am with a friend. We are going to make a recording. I remember singing a song and feeling pretty glad about my performance. I wake up.

99. I am in school. Supposed to leave for class but a bunch of stuff prevents me from going. Blake Griffin helps me by offering to watch for thieves. Someone keeps stealing the iron gate and something inside I get for the tenants. he is going to sleep in front of the door and catch them. But he won't stop talking and I'm late. Finally I make it to class and the teacher is nice and gives me a make-up assignment. It's a writing class.

I find myself back home in Old Orchard Beach, Maine. A person who plays a part in this dream is a man who owned half of Old Orchard Beach. This man also was a friend of my family. There were two brothers and a sister. One of the brothers would visit us a lot. We were next door neighbors.

I’m on my bed at Fredonia State College and I’m staring at the snow falling through the blackness. It’s so quiet and I’m so at peace. I’m going to lunch in an hour with Christine, then I’ll go to dinner with John. I’m staring at my roommate Mike’s picture of our galaxy, and I watch the ecliptic run past Gemini. The winter solstice seems to throw all planets into alignment. AS I stare closer and closer at each individual flake, I notice their fractal arrangements. I fade off.
I am waiting for my son to come home. I understood that he was going to drive up from Washington to be here for Father’s Day. Anyway, these plans do not materialize.
This dream takes place in a basement. I’m sure it is not my basement because this one is clean, almost like a place of business. I don’t know I was doing there. I wake up.
This dream had something to do with music. As if I was auditioning at a music study. It wasn’t very clear what I was dong there. I don’t remember a lot of people being there.

I am attending a math seminar which seems to e a continuing dream through wake and sleep. First part of the dream was an interrogation which evaluated participants. Second part, was breaking up the discussion groups to consider why students have difficulty learning math. Third part was our departure which seemed to focus on my taking a shower. I was attracted to a younger lady who was quite verbal and intelligent.
Dreamed about bats: people using bats for different purposes. There were 2 separate groups of bats and each had an evil or sinister side; like the bats were evil but not outwardly.

I’m in some classroom and the teacher is talking but I’m not listening. The teacher’s hand begins to whiz by. Looking at the face, I realize I don’t recognize him/her; I’m just sitting there in a daze. My legs feel like jello, like I’ve been sitting here forever. There’s a nearby window, it’s quite nondescript. The grass turns from a lush green to a desiccated brown. I try to listen but I can’t. I’m so out of it, so punch drunk. I fade off.
101. Selling homes, I set up a clothing rack in the vacant houses, with credit cards that start with the word "vacant."

102. I want to move my parents’ boat(?) to a new place with beach access or at least a good pool. Every time we move it, I leave it plugged in, but it just unplugs itself without breaking. At one point I’m going to buy the house up on the hill(?).
I am a football coach and I have called a get-together for all the coaches. We need to brain storm how we can improve team performance.

103. I go outside for something and see some people walk by. I tell them I'm a real estate agent and they come back. I collect their info., what they're looking for, the man wants a house all updated. I tell him we can look for a house a little below his budget and hire painters. I skip away on my tiptoes.
I am a school principal and I have called a faculty meeting. Purpose is how we can improve student performance.

There has been a terrible rain storm and I am returning to my home to clean up the area. When I get there, I see that the house is pretty much destroyed. We clean up what we can. The scene is very discouraging.

104. I go in the car with my parents. We get a late start, go to the beach. I might get back together with Dave Schiller, but he has lots of stuff. Also, he might inherit all his brother's stuff. We go through it. I spend most of the time in the car. There's a pool that needs hand rails, Instead of one in the middle, it needs two - one on each side of the steps.

I am a truck driver and the trick is trying to negotiate the roads under construction especially in the cities. One situation was very difficult because the street was very narrow and at the end of the street, there was a very sharp curve.

This dream seems to be a mixture of skiing and Muslims. In some confusing way, the Muslims help me with my skiing and I in turn, am required to bring peace and understanding to the Muslim people. I become very good friends with five Muslim men. Reconnecting with the rest of the Muslim people is much more complicated. Dream ends.
105. dream one - I go around looking at houses. There's another woman doing the same thing. I might be able to sell her a house too.

106. dream two - I go to a house where I live and work with other people. One man comes in to use the bathroom. I take him to show him some empty rooms and bathrooms. Outside the back door some people are taking care of an aviary. We say hi to them.

107. I go to see a listing and the owner is an artist - she gives me some artwork. I want to go back and get another copy, but she charges $42. In another part, I go to a gathering. Steve Hulberg is supposed to get some pot. I see him roll a joint but then he disappears. Someone passes me a roach and I take a hit from it. Another woman and I walk to the car, which is parked outside in the parking lot. Some ex-ISKCON people are there.

108. I live in a big apartment complex. Lots of parts to the dream where I go to a party, see my grandmother, etc. Later I come home and the apartment manager offers me apartment seven if I want it. I go see it - the apartment is right on one of the pools. Lots of people. I pick up my mail - books, etc.

I’m back in my clerical life. I may be in a monastery. I’m dressed in my Franciscan brown habit and we are praying in common. The breviary is our prayer book which is a very tricky prayer book to negotiate. I am next to an old friar friend, Claude. Since I am not really confident in using the prayer book, I am depending on Claude to help me. I wake up

109. I'm at a temple and write a large manuscript. The leaders tell me they reviewed it and it can't be published/written. Too many plot points, too much liability. I want to write it anyway at my own risk. After everyone leaves, I scramble to try to find the manuscript. The other women keep it for me and I pick it up. It's a huge stack of papers with notes and tags and paper clips.

I’m in a garden with beautiful flowers. All colors and sizes. It is so peaceful and smells are soothing to me. I am in awe of the vibrant colors and the care and love that went into this garden. I wander around and admire the flowers. It is just the flowers and me and I am in a very peaceful state.

110. I go visit some people who have dogs for sale. The dogs are very nice and well trained. In one part I go to a school with my mom and we get separated. Then I can't find her. I find the car. Then I find my cell phone and try to call her.

Linda Taylor, a former co-worker, her daughter Jen, and her husband Bill and I are looking for a car for Jen. Jen wants a brand new sports car; Bill wants to buy a Jetta. Linda Taylor wants her to get an SUV. I tell them my first car cost me a hundred dollars and it was used. They are going to buy Jen a brand new car. I can’t believe a girl in school is getting a new car. I’m feeling jealous and slighted.

111. First, looking at listings with clients. It all becomes confusing, who is who, what listing is for what, etc. Then Steve Gelberg, Gina Catena, and I receive our Ph.D.s and then go to a house where there are a lot of people. A lot of people are swimming in a big pool, so I go in. I am swimming around with a big log, but it sinks. I get out and go back to find they drained the whole pool to get the log out.

I’m with my brother Ethan and we’re at my maternal grandparent’s old house on Lake Ontario. We’re playing on the neighbor’s bluff when we both recognize what appears to be an opening in the side of a nearby embankment. Upon nearing it, Ethan decides he doesn’t want to go inside. It’s a tunnel and I head in. I crawl along some way emerging in my grandfather’s study. He’s alive. He’s watching a football game and I sit there happily watching with him. I fade off.

I see myself as a Franciscan and a doctor. I am in a hospital trying to find a resident who is giving a lecture in his room. It seems like I spend the whole dream walking the corridors, trying to find the doctor’s room. Eventually I spot someone who directs me to the room. I wake up.
113. A listing is calling me, like I get my first listing. It's near one of the houses we saw at the caravan.

I am with a small group of students who have just finished class and we decide to go skiing. Alps? The slope is magnificent! One of the group has just bought a house. As we angle toward the bottom of the slope, we notice an incredibly beautiful chateau. It is so striking that I can’t stop looking at it.

I’m working at Super Duper Supermarket in my hometown of Lockport, NY. I leave work and get into my car and drive on Main Street. I am talking on my cell phone to my mother. I see my ex sister-in-law go up to a second story bar. I say to my mother, “Oh my God, I hope she didn’t see me!” She sees me and follows me. I feel like I am being stalked.

I am on the I-190 expressway approaching Buffalo. There is tons of traffic. As I reach the tollgate, the traffic jams up. As I attempt to pass through the tollgate, the police intercept me and for some unexplained reason, will not let me through the barrier. I wake up.

I had a dream the other night that Uncle Bill was sitting on the swing that used to be in Valery’s back yard. He had lined up about 10 beer bottles across the back of his arm resting on the back of the swing. It was night time. Billy came out in a fit of rage with a gun and began shooting a hole in each beer bottle so that it shattered, fell and spilled. He didn’t say anything, but I got the feeling like he meant to say, “If you don’t quit this, you’re next!”

All I remember about this dream is that I am living in a beautiful mansion with huge hallways. This mansion seems to have some connection to a spy ring. I’m not involved, but I know it involves a female that I do not know very well. I wake up.
118. Something about someone who is doing a book, or some sort of complex work, with papers spread out all over.
120. second dream - In a second dream I sell some people a house. It works out fine.

121. I go to Dad's house. He is there. We have an orange cat like Rocky, but there are several other orange cats with similar collars living on the hill. Dad is having a good time entertaining guests. He takes me aside and warns me to be nicer to his guests. I get plugged up with Fleming and he says to just clear it out of my head. He has a clock Brit gave him.

I am on a bicycle heading home. I must be in my twenties because my home is on the ocean front at this time. To get home, I decide to bicycle through the back yard of my neighbor’s. I was pretty good friends with the neighbors, but not with their dogs. Two dogs start chasing after me. I head for the road. One dog gives up, the other dog persists. I wake up.
122. Something about meeting the owner of Terrace (open house). People get ready to go somewhere.

148. Well it started out by it was Nash's birthday and his mom made me distract him while they set up the party and I had to kiss him and stuff, yada yada. And then I got to his party and it kinda sucked, and then I don't know, I was at the airport type thing and there was “hook up” rooms and Holly and Daniel Bryant went in one and James and I went in one.
149. It was basically what happened that day. Greg and Holly were fighting, then Holly and I went somewhere and then we had to go to Chicago?

Kevin and I were riding in my car. He had some sort of illegal drug (a pink powder) in this container, which was plastic. He was eating the powder drug and was higher than a kite. He kept insisting that I eat some. Kevin kept eating it and I just kept driving. I finally broke down and started eating the pink powder.

I am in a school cafeteria (teacher’s section). There are twenty or more people there. I see someone who I know take medication similar to mine. I decide to check with her to see if she is faithful in taking her medication. She is. This encourages me to be as faithful.

I’m walking around a circular lake. As I walk, the seasons change from spring to summer to fall. Ethan is getting married. From a distance, I see him saying his vows. I stop during the fall. Breezes carry leaves past me. The echoes die somewhere in a distant canyon. From a distance, I can see him walking off…it’s getting colder now-winter come too early. He disappears and there I am shouting at the sky. I feel a sense of loss so profound, it breaks me. I fade out.

I am in a room with containers. There are all kinds of containers, plastic, cardboard, wooden in all sizes and shapes and colors. I am in awe and don’t know where to start. I don’t know what that means. I am like a kid in a candy shop.
The only thing I remember is standing in a room (sort of like my screened in garage) with a hose in my hand. I am spraying the screens, walls, etc. with water (almost cleaning).

I am driving through the streets of Buffalo with friends when I notice the total absence of cars and I remark along these lines. As I keep driving, I’m wondering if there is something wrong happening in the city. I come to Hopkins Street which is perpendicular to Lake Erie and I am stunned to see the street totally under water and not negotiable. I wake up.
I have a pain in my back. As it persists, I decide I should see a doctor.

I am in a men’s room washing my hands when I notice the water from one of the toilets is overflowing. As I stand there, it becomes clear to me that the water is not going to stop and the water is spreading everywhere. I wake up.
124. I help redesign the house on Terrace so it can have a garage and make sense.

My role is that of a classroom teacher. I believe I am in a middle school. While I a in the back of the room working with a student, I hear a disturbance in the front of the class. Walking up to the front, I notice a boy who has suffered a bowel movement. He has taken his outer garments and is a mess. I try to encourage him to go to the locker room and take a shower. He won’t go because he is too ashamed. I don’t know what to do. I wake up.

125. I edit a woman's interview into a book and it explains everything about her battle against corruption. Once it's edited and published, it will go a long way toward curing the evil that grips the world now.
126. Something about a flower becomes rare in America. Used to be common, when America was more benevolent.

150. Greg kissed me and spent the night. Holly got a station wagon for her car and it had a huge back seat/ trunk. We went to MacDonald's and Ellie and Josh were working there, then we got pulled over , but then they let us go.
I seem to be a high school student preparing myself for regents exams. In classrooms and with small groups of students, I am sitting in with anyone who can help me. End of dream.

This dream seems to take place in a village which I do not recognize. There has been a serious rain storm and there is water everywhere. As I look across a field , I seem to notice a three or four foot wave of water coming towards us. I wake up.

127. Sitting out in front of a place naked - I see workmen out in the driveway and try to cover myself with shades. (Includes drawing of me on a lunge chair with a shade, a small fence, a tree, in the foreground a man with a wheelbarrow and work hat.
I seem to be on a college campus with some friends and a girlfriend. I am much younger (college age) and very involved with my girlfriend. We are doing a lot of hugging. I wake up.

128. At the end of the dream I am by the pool and I see my necklace on the edge of the pool, then it falls in the pool. It inches toward the drain, so I dive in and get it, just before it disappears down the drain.

I seem to be in a college setting. In a gym to be specific. I am playing basketball with some of the team players, but I am not part of the team. What amuses me about this dream is that I have never liked basketball!

I’m moving slowly down lone city blocks. It’s like a post-apocalyptic rendering of Niagara Falls. I’m heading past the alley separating Whitney Avenue from Pierce. An old corner store run by an old Italian couple lies in ruins. I’m looking at the old cash register that the proprietor used to ring things up on. The sky is glossy and gray and my thoughts are tempered. Sitting in the shade of a near-by sycamore, I think I must be ancient

129. I go to stay at a beautiful house on the beach. It has many rooms. I go out to the beach and walk around. There's a path to the beach. A woman in one of the other front yards is painting in her yard (painting a picture). My cousin wants to stay there too, so I tell her she can stay in the master bedroom and I show her around.

I was walking into my cousin Barb’s house. The foyer was different than in real life. It was very large with a white floor that was almost stark. There were two couches with men laying on them. I quickly walked through to the kitchen where Barb was standing at the sink. The kitchen was very sparse, unlike Barb’s real kitchen. The floor was a stark white gleaming with sparkle and shine . I said to her, “Charlie (her husband) is out laying on the couch.” She knew it and it was okay.
I am at a school and it appears that I am applying for a job. I believe I will be teaching math. Anyway, we are touring the buildings and I am given the chance to see my classroom. I wake up.

One of the little dreams was that Jack handed me a little prayer box charm and said, “Here, I bought you a riff.” Apparently, he’d written a chord progression on a little paper and slipped it in there. Then, I opened my hand and it was gone.

152. (recurring dream) I don't know, I have to travel around to deliver John Lennon’s babies that some lady had, but then the plane crashes in San Francisco and only two babies survive. Then we have to hide in my grandparents’ attic, kinda like the holocaust or something and I can’t quite remember the rest.

I am having some kind of a family get together. I seem to be spending my time spraying different areas off the property with weed killer. This has been an ongoing activity for me all summer. The family is getting on my case because my efforts don’t seem to be effective. Running out of weed killer, I take off for the store to pick up more. On returning home, all the weeds are gone. While I was gone, the gang got together and picked all the weeds by hand. I wake up.

130. I'm traveling in some little towns along a highway. Also taking classes - getting a degree in counseling [and] real estate. My mom and brother are there. In part, I am re-designing some of my mom's clothes to fit me. In part I am driving my bro around to show him the town - the best hotel, the health food store.

131. Lots of scenarios where I'm trying to sleep but keep getting woken up. In one part my brother is doing puja to an altar - I keep trying to fall asleep - on a spare bed, outside, etc. At one point I say, "Don't wake me up. If anyone calls, tell them I'm not available." But I keep getting up. Several kittens in this dream - cute little things to keep me awake.

I’m in an office, not mine, but an office. There is a large copy machine. It is very large and spits out copies at a very fast rate. I am standing , watching the machine work. I am mesmerized by the machine. It goes faster and faster. I go into the machine and come out as paper.
132. People struggling to buy or sell a house. Agents struggling to get paperwork and to get their clients to do things - sign, show up, etc.
133. Getting the SPDS disclosure. More about buying houses.
153. I was working backstage for a play and Mrs. Benncort kept getting mad.

Alex and I are on the QEW going through Toronto. It’s 2001, Summer. We’re heading toward the Garden Expressway toward Dufferin. She’s yelling at me; telling me to come with her; to lose weight and drop my girlfriend. She doesn’t like Lisa. She says that Lisa is a user and an airhead. I just am so uncomfortable. Suddenly, we’re flying off the highway; I can see all the lights of a dying fire as we fall. I’m unmoved.
134. Lots of dreams - lots of people - a class (?) a big house - can't remember now.

136. Something about traveling with a bunch of people. Trying to find food, trying to get a bathroom, not sleeping enough. I tell one woman, "They get you home at midnight then expect you to be up for breakfast at 7 a.m. - how can you get enough sleep?" Something about the temple. Trying to get out of there. Looking at houses, talking to the people who want to buy a home with RV gate.

I can even discern the tiny orbitals of water spinning like tops in these vast stretches of water. Then I’m flung immeasurably far and fast. I’m barely aware of my body, just the rising swell that lurches forward and up. The spray whitens, water eddies twirl, polar jet stream mistrals collide, oscillate and whirl; higher and higher. I’m no longer human; like a great telescope or satellite and survey a tiny blue sphere wreathed in white. A wave carries a powerful lens on into the infinite.
137. A closing - I am supposed to pay for an item that is invisible - I pass over it. But then the escrow officer points it out.
138. Doing real estate agent stuff - seeing properties, filling out contracts, etc.
139. I go stay at my dad's house. He takes some photos of women - no he's been dead a while - the photos are old. I invite Kay to come stay there too.

I’m in a vast subterranean cavern. In the center is an enormous stone turn with a crank. There’s a voice over an intercom; it’s telling me that if I don’t keep turning the crank, I’ll shoot an aneurysm. I push it. I’m pushing these enormous levers higher and higher. After about ten minutes, my arms and legs are burning. I keep going and going. After about two hours I pass out.
140. I go to my dad's house and he is there. He asks what he can get for his house. I say $200 - $800. He says he wants to keep it and get roommates. I ask if I can move in.
141. In another dream, I have lots of people from the Century 21 Lead Router. In the last part, a house with a big bird cage at the front and a few cats.

142. A holiday card with four photos - my mom, brother, and stepdad. He complains that his photo is hard to see - bad lighting - he wants to fix the card - reprint it. (Bill said it's about not accepting D2 as my real dad.)
All I remember is that I was having a sexual encounter with someone I did not know.

In this dream, I am in a Pre-Vatican II chapel. This means the altar is facing the wall and the priest says the liturgy with his back to the people. In post Vatican II chapel, the liturgy is said at a table and the priest faces the people. The irony of this dream is that I was saying mass with my back to the people which I hated.

I am at a party. Seems to be a family affair. I am sitting with Priscilla, my ex-wife. For some reason, Priscilla leaves and her twin sister sits down in her place. I get the idea that she doesn’t want Priscilla to sit next to me. Eventually, I walk away with someone I don’t know.

I am at my grandparents house. I am at the bottom of the stairs in their house. The stairs are worn. The paint is rubbed off in spots from years of use. The stairs are much larger in my dream than they were in real life. I am at the bottom of the stairs just looking up. I can’t seem to bring myself to take the first step to climb them. I continue to stare at the steps without moving.

Paul, my eldest son, is teaching religion. Paul is now 29 and a resident doctor at Walter Reed Hospital. As a teenager he taught religion for about four years. Anyway, he thinks that teaching religion now as a doctor is really cool.

A group of teachers and I have opened a school. As we approach opening day, we realize that we are not ready or sufficiently organized for teaching a student body. So, I have the responsibility to call the faculty to come together and develop a curriculum and program strategies to meet the educational requirements of the state. So, I call together all the heads of departments along with teachers to meet our responsibilities.

144. - I only remember part of it - an illustration of how someone went down in an airplane. His wife saw it - he climbed up above a pointed cloud and then dove. This might have something to do with the long political discussion Sallie and I had last night. In the dream, the cloud was illustrated like this.

I don’t remember this dream too clearly. It seems to have involved a romantic episode with a woman that I’m not sure I knew. This fact of not knowing the person always amuses me. I always believe (at this time in my life), that having a romantic relation with someone I knew would be difficult enough, but with someone I didn’t know, would be a miracle!

I’m on a beach in Newfane on Lake Ontario. I’m skipping rocks with my brother Ethan. We’re talking about taking the canoe down Eighteen Mile Creek. I’m going to watch the Chargers play the Dolphins at four with my grandfather. Ethan pulls out a map that I made of the surrounding area. There’s a small stream just east of here. I can smell the mixture of seaweed and decomposing fish. There’s something deeply nostalgic about this scene. As we near the canoe, I fade away.
145. Slept a lot and had some important dreams I can't remember now.

There see to be a number of people in this dream. We are in a room just hanging out. Then, the dream changes to a group of people doing relaxing exercises. I end up with my son’s girlfriend who is very stressed out. ( She is a Buffalo State student who is compulsive about getting a 4.0). I remember she was having difficulty standing up, so I tried to help her maintain her balance. My efforts work. I wake up.

146. I want to get a condo and it will become part of the steamboat world. The building is stationary but several boats could advertise - "Come on down to the river," etc. I start to talk to a man who works there. He knows everything. I start to explain to him who my family is.

It seems that I have been employed along with Priscilla, my ex-wife, by the Episcopal Church to start up a pre-school. So much of my dream is occupied with getting the endeavor off the ground. An interesting part of the dream was the fact that Priscilla’s dad was also helping us. He is ninety-one.

I am visiting Paul (my oldest son who is 29), in D. C. As we meet, I notice something that I had never seen before. He has a very large birthmark that runs from his forehead down to his chin. This upsets me. I wake up.

I have this sense like I’m under anesthesia. In the distance, I hear my grandmother’s voice. I’m staring at a street lamp now. My eyes are soft. I can see particles in the light. I’m so relaxed and contented. I feel like I could stay here indefinitely. I just keep staring; a flood of memories hover amidst the particles. It’s like I have nothing left to do in life. I feel so complete amidst the particles of light.

149. I'm staying over someplace and have to get ready to go to the airport. I look at my ticket and call my parents on my cell phone. I have a couple big suitcases that aren't packed very well - lots of food I will have to leave.

I’m playing with my hamster Friedo. She’s running around my couch. I have a long tube connecting the couches. She runs through and looks up at me. She lifts her little body and I can make out her orange honey bear coat and her little dark eyes. She squawks as if to acknowledge me. I pick her up and she rests on my arm. We watch TV together. I love being with my pet.

150. I'm in a place with a bunch of people. We are taking a nap. I cuddle up with Kyle. After a while we start to wake up. (This was like yesterday at the open house, when the cat got up on the table and let me pet him, then someone came to the door and the cat ran off.) In the dream when we wake up Kyle and I stopped hugging.

151. I go to Los Angeles and stop by my apartment, or do I still have an apartment? Did I move out? Did I ever move out? Did they just take it back because I stopped paying rent? Some friends want me to stop by their place and maybe help rent it. It's a condo where the people have buried their ancestors under the floors. I wonder about the place until I see the view - it's of the coast line beautiful blue water and hills.

This dream does not make a lot of sense because I am in a Navy facility: the Adjutant General’s office. I seem to be a lawyer (I’m not in real life). It appears that a friend of mine has an assignment which I volunteer tot take for him. The dream ends.

My dream includes my mother (she died thirty five years ago). We are in a residence she owns in Maine. I get very irritated at a man who comes into the house without being invited. I tell him to leave. She thought I should have my kidneys checked. The dream ends.

152. My mother was in a successful stage show that went on for seventeen weeks. She says it was covered in all the papers and picked up audience as it went on. She says her mother was so proud of her.

I am in a very nice house with a couple other people and one is a middle aged black lady with which I have a special relationship (married?) I say this because I become very irritated when a man starts paying a lot of attention to her. I end up going to a basketball game and come home late on a school bus.
I am involved in a non-denominational service which is in a very large church and in the middle of the church there is a very wide path- a path that seems to be a symbol for “ROAD TO HEAVEN”.
156. Vague now, but the dreams were about moving. I had a person moving in and had to be in contact with the moving vans, etc. Can't remember now.

I’m playing video games with my brother Ethan and he’s showing me this painting that he’s finished. It’s brilliant; it’s a great man in a white beard standing over a chessboard. The pieces on the board consist of human demons, animals and plants. The great man has a puzzled look on his face. I suddenly notice a piece on the board that I hadn’t before. It’s my brother.

162. In another dream I have to send out a memo about a change in a concert date I also want to send a box of sacred items to a temple in DC. I have to repack and resend them. Someone from there has a fountain for me. I set it up in my back yard. The water will fall in a series of bowls. The memo has to be written in a certain way.
My own mom and dad are giving a party (mom and dad have been deceased for over thirty years). This seems to be a party to celebrate my coming home.

164. At a convention. I talk to children and others. Gelberg is there. I chase him around and try to kiss him. He resists and finally tells me to leave him alone. I remember he's married and admire his fidelity to his wife. Also in the dream I meet some homeowners with a beautiful back yard. I have someone who might want to buy it but the price is too high and the owners don't want to sell.

I’m in my grandmother’s house. I walk into the kitchen then into the dining room, then into the living room, up the stairs and into every room. I end up out on the porch and then go into the kitchen then back into the dining room. I keep doing the same thing over and over, each time going faster and faster. I’m getting frustrated and tired. I wake up very thirsty and tangled in the sheets.

175. At an SATW convention. I go off and get in a sauna with some people. I go under the water and fell like I'm drowning. I can't touch the bottom or swim up. Later, I go in a sauna that is set up not to go under. In another part I hug a dog and talk to it. I let it go.

I am a Bishop celebrating mass in Latin in a cathedral. As this is happening, my mind is trying to process what is happening. How come I’m a Bishop and why am I saying mass in Latin? (I couldn’t stand saying liturgies in Latin thirty years ago and I feel the same way today)

178. At some place with acupuncture needles stuck in my arm. The receptionist ran off to find out something for me. Lots of people are milling around waiting for the receptionist. I ask my friend, maybe we could help them set appointments, or whatever. Meanwhile, the needles start to hurt so my friend suggests taking them out. I pull them out one by one. Earlier some parts about animals (?) pets (?).

179. Something about a house with windows and several stories at the end of a bluff. Also, something about picking out a vacation. I pick one to a resort in Arkansas, but not sure if I want to go. Kyle is there.

I am in a car garage with my dad. This has to be gong back sixty-five years. (When I was a teenager I worked for my dad in his garage. I did things like wash cars, change oil and batteries and fill gas tanks). In my dream, I was helping him out. I

180. In this dream I decide that for a good career move I could invest in a Persian cat and breed it. I write a note guaranteeing that I will invest the money. My brother is also involved. (In real life my brother bought a Persian cat - Alison - to breed, but she only had one kitten.)

I am driving a pick-up truck along a very narrow road that is in the process of being paved. I am moving along at a good clip when the traffic ahead of me brakes quite suddenly. In an effort to avoid a collision, I lose control of the truck and run into the ditch on the side of the road. I wake up trying to get out of the ditch.

181. A long one. All I remember is at the end. I'm in a night club with friends. Kyle is there but he has a jealous girlfriend. I want to talk to him, tell him that I love him and drop the other woman. He dances on the dance floor for a while, then he leaves with her.

My maternal grandmother is on the phone with me. She’s asking me to meet her on Goat Island. She’s written a new poem and wants me to hear it. The scene suddenly changes. It’s so good to hear her voice for some reason. We’re on the island we’re sitting on a park bench overlooking the water. I’ve really honed my craft and I want her to hear my new poem too. I turn to look at her again and she’s gone. I’m alone there on the bench by the water.

This is a good example of a dream that has me guessing. I am in a large house with a lot of women. For some reason, I believe they are all prostitutes. I am the only man. I don’t have the impression that I know any of the women. All I remember is that I am there not really sure what I am doing there.

Fr. Mark and I are together in a church. I am not aware of people around us. We are saying mass. He is the celebrant and I am a co-celebrant. This was another way of us praying together and I woke up.

It’s sometime in late summer and it looks like I’m about a mile out from shore. I can’t tell where I am, but I’m trying to swim to shore. It seems that hours pass and the hot sun hammers the back of my head. The shore is so far away. I can make out the figures of everyone who was ever in my life on that shore, yet somewhere in my head, I know I’ll never get there. I’m floating now; the sun is setting. Lights out.

I am at a beach resort. Someone has been hurt and it seems that One of the life guards knows something about the mishap or may be responsible for it. Since I know the man, I volunteer to go on the beach and find the lifeguard. I go to the area where he is usually stationed but he is not there. I also ask some people if they have seen him. No success. I stroll along the beach, pick up rocks. I wake up.

My pen pal has sent me this video game that was never released in the United States. You play as Kos-mos, the main character from a game called Xenasaga – and you’re forced to negotiate these brutal moral dilemmas. Do you obliterate this town filled with women and children as they may be harboring a terrorist cell? The game is so life-like that it’s disturbing. You can see the dirt being kicked from under Kos-mos’ boots. That’s it.

183. I'm at someplace with a big bunch of people, including my family and our cat, Rocky. We get on a big elevator and Rocky won't fit. So we leave him. Then I go back down and make a special trip to pick him up and bring him along.

184. Some fragments - I'm going to the bus stop, but must cross through traffic against the light. Someone says "Hey - you're jay walking" (something like that). I say, "I have to catch the bus! Wait!"

185. Fragment: I'm lying in bed. I want to stretch my shoulder but the people around me tell me to rest, then watch my tai chi tape and stretch out with the video. (I often feel some pulling in my shoulder and stretch out after I wake up.)

I’m forty years old. I’m living in this beautiful home on the water. My childhood friend Milo is living there as well. Several others sit in my vicinity, are walking around. Others are there somewhere. I’m reading while I watch the sky from the window. I vaguely sense that people around me are partying; liquor, cake, etc. Drinking and getting is high is so tedious. I feel an inexhaustible sense of waste; at least I can be alone, I think. This is a pleasant thought.

186. In this dream people are trying to develop a Hummer - Jeep-type vehicle that can be thrown off a tall building like the World Trade Center. They throw it from the top of the building and it has giant tractor tires that hold it to the side of the building as it plummets to the ground. It lands okay. In the other dream we are trying to sell or buy a house for someone.
I am in a karate school. We are going through our routines. After the lesson is over, a few of us get together and we discuss the great job our teacher does. I wake up.

187. I have lots of work to do and am traveling. I stay in a vacant apartment up on a hill. There I can do my work. Later I try to go look for Pat Stanley / Kay Lancaster (both old friends). In a dorm, the other people are not much help in finding me a place to sit down and work, but then I find Pat/Kay and she helps me.
I only remember a woman being in this dream with whom I am having a very intimate encounter. She is not anyone in my real life.
And then, I dreamed I was awake and didn’t know what time it was.

I don’t remember much more than this dream was involved with school and education. I was much younger, probably High school. The issues were related to the educational process and how we grow as a result of this process. Something I have my doubts about.

I’m in a doctor’s office and all I can feel is the sensation of falling. I’ve just been diagnosed with liver cancer by Mark Kozim, M.D. I’m just sitting there and time seems like it’s moving so slowly. My parents and friends pretend like it’s not even happening. I’m just sitting; I won’t say anything. I really feel hatred for my family, for the world, for being born.

I am in a dormitory or barracks. I think it is a school. The place is very clean and my job is to do laundry and I am pushing around a cart full of cloths. I am on my way to pick up more laundry and then I wake up.

I am entirely of ice atop an enormous fountain; water spills in, what I can discern twelve different directions, streaming out into the void. I can barely describe their distant contours. Beneath everything is a great tree of immeasurable height and breadth, it just up from the infinite. Little bits of my world seem to meander by in self-contained bubbles. It is so damn cold, and I can’t feel my legs.

I am living in a black ghetto area. I am a little apprehensive , yet I seem to be getting along with everyone. I am having a conversation with a black man when we notice a very large blanket suspended over our backyard. Then I’m in a truck that I am driving. As I back it into a garage, I meet a man who wants to come to Buffalo and direct a play for high school students. I offer to help him. (We used to have plays at the high school I taught at)

189. I'm at my dad's house with a few friends. Paul McCartney comes in and talks to us all. Before he leaves he lets each of us kiss him. I kiss him three times and follow him outside. He asks how much my dad's house sold for and I say $11 million - he says, "Oh that's about what mine is worth." Then I say, "I, I mean $1 million." Then tell him I'm a real estate agent. He is surprised.

I dreamed that my maternal grandmother, Norma, took me to a supermarket; she told me that she could operate here and make me a new hand. The din from the store seemed like a mixture of supermarket and hospital. I was a small child. She had a difficult time working with the anesthetic and I would just get woozy. I remember being fixated on the anesthetic. It looked like Vaseline. I became so ill that I left the table and quit the project. She was furious.
I am in a small town visiting when the entire area becomes flooded. Everywhere there is about five or six inches of water. No one really knows what to do.

191. Just a few fragments - I’m at someplace. I have a cat with me and it keeps getting away. I stop into the ashram - I guess on Watseka. There's a woman lounging around there. I need to wash some spilled food off my sari - I use the kitchen. Ask her if I can use the bathroom. She says no, but I find one in another building. My family was waiting for me. I find the cat.

Last night I dreamed that I was back at school, but it was a combination of my high school and my college . I was having my English seminar with Clark, but James and Ed were there. Then I was naked, but I had to go to philosophy where we were reading Wittgenstein. I was horrified that I was naked, but no one seemed to notice. Then it got dark and I couldn't find my way back to the dorm. Then I woke up.
192. A house where I’m staying - they send a shower over to replace the one in the hall bathroom, but they install it in one of the bedrooms bathrooms.
193. There are books that represent each client on a bookshelf. They're stacked on a pile instead of vertical as a row of books.

This dream has something to do with football. It starts out at a training camp. This seems to have something to do with the Super Bowl. Only the teams that are playing are the Giants and the Bears. The major incident of the Super Bowl game is the last play which will determine the winner. All the players (including me) are lined up at mid field. The team that is able to push the other team across the goal line wins. Here I wake up.
I didn’t sleep that well last night. Sometimes when I

I dreamed of being in Neverland with Peter Pan. Several other super villains from other comics and cartoon were also there. Hydroman was there with this other guy who could turn to ice and water. Hydroman was more powerful. I dream of this great fight on the Jolly Roger. I’m watching the torn sails white on sky blue then red. Peter flies into an incredible back flip and falling on his back. Wendy readied a large net to try and stop the villains.
I’m on a cruise ship in which we are participating in a huge dinner party.
I am involved with two women sexually, although I wake up before anything really happens beyond hugging one another.

195. Two dreams about friends dying in front of me. First, Laurie Pepper. Kyle and I are sitting there talking to Laurie and she has a giant seizure and dies in front of us. We set her up in a chair. Next, in another dream, Trina dies in front of me as she's walking up to the house. I think, Oh well, that's the end of Trina. (Not sure why two people died in front of me in my dream. Both Laurie and Trina once tried to become real estate agents, but didn't like it.)
197. I order a custom made dress but then worry how much it will cost $200-300k? So I find out I don't have to buy it but I can order a plant instead. Maybe something to put on my patio.
198. A lot of dreams about buying a house. There are two houses - the second one is better.
And then I had another brief, stupid dream about a fire drill during math class.
199. Buying houses - we look at two. The second one they're having a party. We want to look under the house, so we come back later. Lots of other parts that are vague now.
200. More houses. Animals too. Vague now.
201. Showing homes. Looking out for west facing windows.
202. Buying, selling homes - Listing appointment - traveling - lots of people.
203. Helping someone decide between two houses.

204. I take some people house hunting. Along the way it's like school for me. Toward the end I want to leave the class to find a bathroom. It's very far away, outside, across a meadow. In the class we talk about Hemingway and a dance he writes about - tango? I want to try it out but nobody there knows the tango.
I am in France visiting a school. I am mostly roaming the corridors. Eventually, someone starts following me and interrogating me. We speak French. The conversation is somewhat aimless and I wake up.
205. Helping Tim(?) look at property. A school or place I'm in - no privacy. I need to find a bathroom but can't pee.

206. I see Steve and Kathleen Kautz. They explain that they don't want the Cunningham [floorplan], but ask me to find them a smaller house. The Lakes HOA comes in and [the directors] sit in a circle to start their meeting. They pass around an agenda and ask me to write something on the agenda, so I write, Let's do something good for the people and do it in an honorable way.
207. I go to see houses - they each have something that needs to be fixed. Or was fixed to make them more expensive. Like, one home needed to be retired, one needed to be moved, etc.

I am in a religious community of men and women: three men(maybe four) and four women. I am in my forties. A couple of us are discussing man/woman relationships in the community. We moved on to the situation where two persons (a man and a woman) become attracted to one another. How does the community deal with this situation? I wake up.

208. The first dream there are two properties. One is mine and one is Pam's listing. I buy new light bulbs and fix mine up, then I go over to hers to look at it. I notice her stuff there. She is there. I leave with her.
209. Next some people come by and want to see a beachfront listing. I want to stay there in their extra room.

210. In another dream the Kautz's have a big house. I go to see them. Like the Alameda house. I have my stuff there. Steve Kautz says it took him a while to get used to my stuff being there but he moved it out.

I remember having someone chasing me in the dream. I was running and looking back to try to find out who it was but could not. My legs were so tired I thought they were going to give out, but they didn’t.

I am in the Army. A number of soldiers and myself are patrolling the area around the base. I am using a dirt bike and getting the job done much more quickly. When I get back to the base, I find myself in a facility which resembles a house and a lady is there preparing a meal . She is naked. I wake up.

This dream is extremely brief or at least what I remember is brief. The lady who was cooking for me on the previous night is doing my laundry tonight. She is still naked. I do not know her. I wake up.
214. In another dream I'm visiting my parents' house on Longbow. There are a lot of little things to fix. I want to bring a handyman over to fix things.
215. The only part I remember is walking around with a blanket that drags on the ground. Someone was with me who picked up the ends for me. I didn't care if it got dirty.

216. Hanging around with friends Jeanne and Janet - also some doggies. Then I am to go travel in India. I am going alone but they say I can bring someone if I want. It's kinda late to invite someone, but I run into Pat Thomas and she says she's going. I kinda don't want to go.

217. dreamed I was listening to the Stephanie Miller Show in a van - sleeping in the front seat. Some other people got in the van and I woke up and left (Then I woke up and listened to the last fifteen minutes of the show.

I am buying bran flakes and when I get to the check out counter, I start fumbling around for change which I’m having trouble finding. This is an issue that drives me nuts especially when women are having trouble searching through their humongous pocket books for four pennies.

221. I'm living in a big, beautiful house. Different creatures are around. First I notice seals in the pool. Then baby chick seals like penguins. They live behind a wall and go back and forth to the pool. Next - a bat gets inside and dive bombs me. I chase it out to the patio and it flies away. Next a pigeon gets in and flies around. I chase it out to the patio too. Also, in bed, I feel there are a couple of dogs down by my feet. Also, people are around.
222. An apartment complex - one of the units was painted up like a sixties place. I say Joey lived in several of the units before he died.

In this dream, I am saying goodbye to Priscilla (my ex wife) and her husband is standing there with her. We give each other a very meaningful kiss. As I am leaving, I find myself feeling guilty that Priscilla’s husband witnessed the kiss.

I think I had another little post-script dream that something was wrong with the car. It was something with the electrical system, preventing it from starting. From now on, we would have to take the Grandpa truck when we went driving around town.
Very vague…I remember lying in water, very warm water like a pool that was covering me. When I woke up, I thought I had wet the bed, but I didn’t. I had to pee like crazy!
I had a very descriptive dream but when I woke up, it was almost gone. The dream involved: dice, alligators and boats.

I am driving along a city street when the traffic comes to a halt. Eventually, I realize there is an unmarked toll gate ahead of me. I have to get out of the car to pay the toll. The toll taker tells me the toll is five dollars. I don’t know what to do because I don’t have five dollars. I had forgotten my wallet. (I often do this) The guard then tells me he was kidding. The toll is really twenty eight cents. This is all I had. I paid my toll and took off.
223. In a house or someplace with a bunch of people. There is a man there who is a combination of Kyle and Tim. He kisses me.

224. I'm packing to go to India. A big suitcase and several big dogs. Not sure if I want to bring them. Also, earlier, a part where I'm with a large group of people and we line up to play a game. Everyone picks a partner, but there's not enough - I don't get one.

I am at some kind of a religious convocation. I am not sure what is going on. It seems to be a gathering of a variety of religious. It seems we have met to consider if we can find a common ground for us to agree on. As we debate some initial issue, the governing committee elects me to be in charge of the convocation. (I have been reading books on various groups that have been seeking greater inter-religious cooperation and understanding)
225. Vague now - little bird nests with my hair in them.

226. Long dreams vague now - In one part I'm in an HOA meeting and notice they put a link to steamboats.com and said "Nori Muster's site - a lack of content." (Something like that) and I think, "How could they say that - I have plenty of content." I want them to change it.
227. Something about a boat and buying a boat.
228. I see Kyle and want to ask what to do, but nobody can tell. Vague now, but we go to a place.
229. Something about being on a board of directors - seeing things, going to meetings, etc.

I am at a party. I am dancing with a lady that I do not know. However, it seems that we have known each other forever because our relationship is most intimate and caring. I cannot understand how this can happen with a person I don’t know.
230. Something about meeting a man who is an expert - a doctor or scientists - who has a TV show. He explains a few things.

231. Two families want to blend together and get a house in The Lakes. They have a house they can all move into. The woman has a lot of clothes that take up a big walk-in closet. That is like a symbol for the kids - the children of the father may not want to be like the mother. A huge closet full of shoes.

232. Buying and selling real estate. The buyers don't feel ready and the sellers are having trouble feeling hope. In one part I go to India and walk with a man. We stop to buy something at a stand. The woman gives me the check and I pay her $4 - it's overpaid, but she give me obsidian arrowheads as change. Later we go in a cafe and find some arrowheads. I find a large one in a package and put it back on the counters.
233. first dream - Real estate - some legal issue about who can sell a property. Like, if it was already someone's listing, only certain agents can take over.

234. second dream - Another dream: certain materials have to come from a compatible source. Like, tiles from a Native American company must be set together, not mixed with other tiles. (Not sure what it all means. Lately I've been struggling with real estate. Not sure I like this job, wish I was still just a writer with a day job.)

235. On an SATW trip, we check into a big hotel. The elevator is large and open. I get up to the floor but then go back down - I want to check with the desk or something. (Lots more parts to the dream I can't remember.) I think in one part we go to my dad's house and see him.

236. I go to a place with a big reservoir - like The Lakes - It has a ledge and no boats will float past the ledge. Also, another big lake with some other problem. (Woke up working about 1. My tooth, 2. Money, 3. My plane ticket, 4. Everything else.)

237. About global warming and how to cure it - it will take love and cooperation. Also in the dream - I see Tim again, but he looks much different. I think that if I still love him, he will turn into the same man again. I am a secretary for a guy (Mukunda?) and sit on his desk to take notes, but then move to a chair. I look at news clips and other materials.
238. dreams about the boat and fishing committee - we work together to fix the lakes.
239. Lots of dreams. Someone bought the tree in our atrium with a steamboat. I go to a place with people. Stuff going on. (Vague now.) A good dream. I get the steamboat.
240. A woman asks me to look up some property for her, then wants to buy. I'm surprised, but I'm selling property again - a good dream.

241. At a pool or pond, I swim with a big friendly turtle and a man who is a combination of Dave and Tim. The turtle is soft like the sting rays at the zoo. I turn the turtle over, then turn him right again. In the dream I have a bicycle that I ride for a while. I want to give it away, but then I see it has no brakes. I want to fix the brakes before giving it to someone. Lots more dreams - forgot now.
243. Writing up ideas for the anti-cult people. On the Delta King. Lots more dreams - vague now.
244. Another similar dream - doing things for the ICSA. This time in a big house. Very comfortable, peaceful. Easy to get things.

245. packing to go home. I have a large suitcase but have room for lots of things. (Long time no remember dreams . . . Too work hard . . .. dream fragments are of travel, packing, visiting houses - dreams feel instructive like they have something to teach me.)
246. A party is planned for a politician. I come over to see what it is and tell him.
247. I work at a place where I have all sorts of piles of work to do. Typing, sorting, editing, etc.
248. A man - I fall in love with a man who has a large bat. (Vague now. . .. )
250. Getting some work done on the house. The girl Tim knows as me has a history as a real estate agent here, but they're using me to do the real estate work.
251. I go to someone's house to fix something. I get upgraded stuff to replace what we change. (I wake up thinking about the wall that's leaning, that we share with the Arrowsmiths.)
252. A dream about a house that I own (or have listed) that I stay in while it's for sale. It's very comfortable and easy.
253. another dream earlier - woke up at 3 a.m. - The dream seems so obvious, so easy to remember, that I didn't write it down. Now I forgot it.
254. Long vivid dreams about doing things for people - can't remember now.
255. All night showing real estate - Janette was here and I took her to see several large buildings. The last one was a big hotel - about fifteen stories high. Lots of work when I should be sleeping!

256. I help people look for property and write a book. The book includes one adult and a child he has abused. At first I want that to be in the book but everyone says no, but then it is true and in the book. The perpetrator realizes that what he does to the children is wrong. The child sees it too.

I had a dream that I was at the Caan dining hall, which was actually my high school's dining hall. I don't remember why I was there. Aaron was there to see Britta. I saw Britta and kept trying to get a better look at her. I remember being disappointed by the cereal selection. I called Tyler to help me with the cereal. And then I saw Aaron again right before I woke up.
In this dream I am back in my clerical days. All I remember is celebrating mass.

160. [Pretty crazy dream with lots going on.] The highlight or main part of it was I met David Bowie at this party and he was doing all sorts of crazy drugs and he told me the future in this dream that I was going to die. He saved my life that later on in the dream a gas station sign was going to explode in me and it did, but I remembered what he said, so I ran and I lived, then something else dealing with a locker room.

162. (2) ) I lived with my mom and grandma and was having a party while they were asleep upstairs and a bunch of people came, including Sean, and we went sneaking to Nate’s house and back, on the way back we had pin wheels and did not get caught having the party.

164. Started out with work, Red Robin was putting on a Renaissance play and I fell off a rock and had to go to the hospital and somehow, somewhere these horses got out and this one was chasing me throughout the whole dream, a big black horse. And when it was chasing me, a song was playing. /then I think Stephen took me to Mike’s house to get my glasses and Jon was there, then I went outside and there was a bench.

165. It was pretty much all about work and the people there. Joe was flirting with me and Kate. He ended up kissing us both and Tyler wanted to also and Sam was there. A symbol I remember was a water tower and the health inspector was coming and I was wearing sandals.

167. *Drunk * Jon, Eric and I were driving in this tiny car on this road by a field and there was a huge grand opening of a shed, a big plain ass shed with nothing inside but rows of folding chairs and they were in AW. Then I went home to try and call James and his mom answered the phone and she was like, “Is this Jamie from the pictures?” I replied yes and she said, “You’re so hot,” and I said, “Well, there is a mutual attraction,” then woke up.
Then I dreamed that the DART fare was raised to $10!! We decided it was outrageous, and agreed to drive me to school, but I’d have to make do and pay that money until they got back to town.

170. * High * I had another dream that I liked Jon and he liked me and all that bullshit, but he kept on flirting and kissing another girl. This gives me a pretty shitty feeling. I think these dreams represent some insecurity I might be having, but I don't like these dreams and don’t want them again.
171. * High * I was rolling a joint outside my room and had left the zig zags laying on the floor, so I went back to get them.

172. * High * Zack was having a huge party at his house and everyone was there like Race, Sean, Jon, Jason, Mike and everyone was so drunk off their ass and throwing up. Then at one point I went to sit on Sean's lap and we had an idea to scare Jason. We would set up tape recorders of our voices as ghosts, then all of a sudden he had one on his lap. I was eating a hamburger at an amusement park type place and there was a smoked joint in my burger.

I had a dream that people at my college were being sexually assaulted. It would appear in the paper and people at other schools knew about it too. Then I had to go study abroad in some bar. Then I woke up.

174. * Drunk * Jon, Steven and I went to MacDonald's and Jon was so embarrassed to be with us because we were being so loud and rude to all the workers and stormed out of there and went back to this roof of a building. Steven and I were paranoid that things would rise up from the MacDonald counters and scan our brain waves and crazy shit like that.

175. I just completely rebelled against everything in my life (mostly parents). They tried to take away my car, but I went upstairs and said, “Fuck you, I fucking hate you. “Took my car keys and loaded up my friends and drove off. And this felt amazing.
176. 1 Richard came back and I did a bunch of coke.
178. I was dating David Bowie and he knew my dad. I tried to keep it a secret.

179. I wanted to go back to work for Red Robin again. So I went there and everybody was different. Eric used to work there, so he was in the back working for cooks. I kept getting small checks from Breadeaux Pizza and other places.

I was back on the island. There were trip leaders (an outdoor group from college) there instead. They were taking us on a mystery trip, but it turned out that they didn't plan well. We were chilling in the Starbucks before we learned of how/when we would depart.

Going through the Arab marketplace. The trowel debate. The sticky, $1500 worth of pot. I knocked some over. But rolled a blue putty joint and smoked it myself. I held it for a long time with my eyes closed.
Plane came down in a very fast water landing. It was supposed to be a crash, but somehow, we managed and came down in just the right spot for transport to the airport.
192. (2) I had to recite something over and it was just things like v25502x25 on a work sheet type thing.
191. (1) It was all about the make-up, Bare Minerals, I went to a store with Aunt Susie to get makeovers and I bought a big kit. I woke up on the couch and a Bare Minerals info commercial was on.
Let's go. Hands behind your back. Let's go. The officer's voice was so calm, so soft and casual. The words entered my dream. (I woke up and found a man was actually being arrested outside my window.)
I was with Obama at a Council on Foreign Relations meeting. He asked me if we'd accept him naming Ron Paul as his VP if we dropped our opposition to the IRS.
I had to write a report on Obama so I went to one of his rallies, and in the middle of his speech he looked right at me and said, Some of us need to leave and hinted at me, so I left and felt bad.

I was still a student in some sort of school. For a project, we were paired with celebrities. I don’t remember who else was there except for Penelope Cruz. I got Barack Obama. I was intrigued by our pairing. I wondered what he would ask me, but he just "mailed in" the interview. He was on his cell phone most of the time. He could have shown a little class. In the end I just told him that I watched Lost and Heroes.
I was shuffling Obama and his wife around from campaign stop to campaign stop. I was driving a beat-up old Toyota Corolla.
I had a dream last night that I met Obama in person and spent a lot of time with him. At the end, he gave me a US passport.

I had a dream that Hillary Clinton was trying to seduce me, and it worked a little. I was thinking, she’s never looked more beautiful. her eyes shining in the light. eventually, we went shopping for Tupperware.

I was standing with Hillary and a man who was her former husband (much better looking than Bill Clinton). She was berating him and recounting all the things that she did not like about him when she was married to him. He was looking very hurt, and I felt badly for him. I also felt protective. We turned away so that we would not hear her.
I dreamed that I was in Hillary's small, one-bedroom apartment and she had a little bit of coke left, like a line, and I did it and she got mad at me.
We were in a car going somewhere. As we talked and things unfolded, I found myself liking her. By the end of the dream, I actually found her desirable.
I had a dream last night that I went to Stars On Ice and Hillary Clinton was skating as the headliner.

I walked into a restaurant and Bill and Hillary were sitting at the bar. At first I didn't realize it, but Bill Clinton was hitting on me. Hillary regarded me coolly. Then Bill leaned close to my ear and said in that voice of his: "I like the way you dress."
I dreamed last night that I was running towards something and Barack Obama was chasing me.

Barack Obama was my teacher. Despite myself, I kept falling asleep in his class. This baffled and irritated me. We sat at a long table. Obama said important things and others were deeply moved by his lessons. I desperately wanted to focus, wanted to submit assignments, to impress him, but I was utterly unable to stay awake.

In my dream, Hillary kissed me a few times on the cheek. She had hot red lipstick on. I saw Bill's pecs. He had a hot bod. For a second I thought I was going to sleep with him, but then I ended up in a car with someone I didn't know and I learned about Obama's secret affair with his black slave servant.

I once had a dream where I was choosing between Hillary Clinton and Barack Obama but at the same time I was deciding between these two girls I have a crush on. I ended up choosing Obama and then I heard Snoop Dog rapping.

I dreamed last night that Obama was assassinated. I was like No! This is a dream! Can't be true! Then I woke up but I was still in the dream. I went to npr.com and there was a picture of him shot. I thought, Wait a minute, am I still in a dream? People were trying to tell me I wasn't.

In the dream, Barack's daughters were my age, 17. They invited me to their house. We was talking about boys and we was getting loud. Barack came and told me I couldn't talk with his daughters cause I was getting loud. I was like, That's dumb, we're just having girl talk. The Mrs. cooked food for a whole bunch of people. Then it cut to Barack running up a hill with his supporters. It was just like a commercial.

Hillary Clinton and half her campaign staff came in to eat. They sat in my section, which was cool at first, but then they started requesting all sorts of food that we don't serve, like baked potatoes, bouillabaisse, and "English tea squares." I tried to explain that we didn't serve those. They got mad. My section filled up, I was beyond weeded, I tried to get the manager to help me, but he was walking too fast for me to catch him!
I dreamed Obama was reading me a bedtime story.

At the end of an otherwise non-Barack related dream, I had the astonishing image of Barack eating the votes that had been cast for Hillary like slices of smoked tofu. He didn't say anything, but seemed calm.
I had a dream about Obama last night where he was giving a public speech that I had written for him. He was even speaking in my voice.

I was watching the Democratic National Convention. Al Gore was giving a very powerful speech. He chose that moment to tell everybody that he'd thought about it and, yes, had had decided what the heck, he would run for president after all. Everybody went nuts. I looked at Barack, who was sitting with the other candidates. Edwards was there, too. They all look startled. I turned to my my wife and said, Wow, Obama looks upset.

My girlfriend and I are hanging out with Barack, leaning against the brick wall of a public school, casually talking. There is an attractive young black woman there, too. I lean over to tell her that we are going to dinner if she wants to come with us. I'm not Michelle, she replies.
I was sitting in the back of a stretch Hummer SUV with Barack, and when he learned of his New Hampshire poll numbers, he gave me a double-handed high-five.

Barack was being interviewed on one of those Sunday news shows and the host asked him if English should be the official language of the United States. He said yes, absolutely: It is the national language. How horrible would it be to hear somebody speak a language other than English in our country? I sat there watching and thinking, This campaign is pretty much over...

My recurring dream is that I am Michelle Obama. In one dream we had a lot of campaigning to do, but I needed to take the kids to see their grandparents. I told Barack that I could not handle all this pressure from campaigning. He told me we didn't have any events scheduled for that day, but I didn't believe him and I yelled at him because we were in the middle of campaign season, primaries were coming up, how could we not have anything on the schedule that day!?

I was at a Kmart and Hillary was speaking to a small crowd. I began feeling really sorry for her and hugged her. Hillary asked me if I had voted for her. I hesitated and then said Yes, even though I hadn't.

I was in front of a building when Barack came out by himself. I went over to introduce myself and shake his hand. He gave me a dead fish handshake and wouldn't look me in the eye when I spoke to him. His secret service people came out right after that and he left. I decided that I didn't like or trust him.

I was watching a news special about Hillary Clinton on TV, and she had two husbands -- one was Bill Clinton, but she was talking about her other husband. Her other husband was a college student in the United States who played Division One basketball, and whose father was from Libya. In the dream he was interviewed about Hillary and he sounded like he really loved her. He said he had a lot of pride in his roots and he wanted Hillary to learn more about Libya.
I had a dream where Barack was winning the election, except instead of an election it was a volleyball tournament.
In my dream last night, Hillary announced that she was separating from Bill. She fired her campaign staff, won the Ohio, Texas, and Pennsylvania primaries, and became president.

Hillary was at my house, although it didn't look like anywhere I have actually lived. I had her rest on the couch, and her hair turned white like Bill's! I went off to look for my honeymoon photos to show her, and my husband was telling me where they were, except it wasn't my present husband -- it was the voice and body of my first husband. EWW.

I had a dream last night that Hillary was about to give a concession speech. Supporters in the audience could tell what was coming because her voice began choking up. Everybody became very upset in an almost biblical way – shouting, tearing their clothes. Those guys who use the lighted wands to direct aircraft on the ground came on stage to try to calm the crowds – to no avail.

I was in a Barnes & Noble with my boss. Barack stopped in while we were perusing books on the second floor. I guessed he had a speaking engagement nearby. He was standing next to us and all kinds of people were coming up to him and telling him that they supported his policies, telling him their stories, asking him questions. His presence was very calming and he answered everyone's questions thoughtfully.
I had this dream that Hillary was shot down by terrorists while in a plane flying over the ocean. I was relieved to wake up and discover it was not true.

Barack and I were in the back seat of a moving car. He was on top of me. We were making out (clothed). Barack kept whispering in my ear, Tell me what you want me to change...Tell me what you want me to change... Each time I tried to tell him, he'd go, Shhh, not too loud. I think he was trying to protect me. It was pretty hot. Let's just say I was on the fence between before I went to bed that night, and when I woke up, I wasn't.

Last night I dreamed my head was resting on Hillary Clinton's thigh, her left one, as we were riding in the back of her car. She was wearing sunglasses, the big, round kind, and didn't take them off even though I wanted her to. She brought her hand down to my cheek as I nuzzled into her jeans.

It was Valentine's Day. I was waiting in line at a cheap department store. I was fifth or sith in line, and all of a sudden I saw that Barack was behind me. No one would let him cut in line, so I let him go ahead of me. He was wearing a completely pink suit. He had a dozen roses. How come you're not dressed up for Valentine's Day? he asked me. I told him I didn't usually do that, and he replied Oh I see, you like to take it easy. That's cool. He paid for the roses and strolled out.

Barack and I had been involved in what I thought was a serious romantic relationship. Throughout the evening, I was sending him loving text messages and continually checking my phone, though I never received a response. As the dream progressed it became clear that he was either focused on his campaign or, more likely, had just lost interest in me, which was very upsetting.

I was taking a trip to Hawaii -- but it was all very rushed and sudden. I could see the plane waiting on the runway and I was in my room thinking I needed something to read for the trip. As I was getting closer to the plane (its colors were brown and red) I saw Barack, who was going there, too. I thought that I should have brought a swimsuit.

I was at a Hillary Clinton press conference. When she appeared we were all stunned. She was wearing a gown reminiscent of Queen Elizabeth I -- a tight bodice with bubble-like bustles completely surrounding her waist like petals on a flower, and voluminous sleeves. The entire creation was made of gold and silver lame and looked more theatrical than authentically royal. A male reporter asked her why she was wearing so much silver and she replied, My father was a miner.

I needed to make an appointment to see my OB/GYN. When I arrived at the office, the staff tried to convince me to see another doctor, but I refused, saying I really wanted Hillary to deliver my baby and I needed to see her. They made me wait for a very long time, but finally she came into the office for my appointment. We hugged and I was so relieved that she was finally there and could see me.

I was in a large restaurant. Hillary came over to my table and sat down with me for a half hour or so and told me all about why she wants to be president.
