Then she went to go speak to the audience in the room, and Bill replaced her at my table while Hillary spoke with the crowd. She was brilliant, formidable, and slick. They both were. After she was done, she returned to my table, looked me in the eye and asked for my support. I shook her hand and told her she could count on my vote.

I'm watching a movie preview for Horton Hears A Who. They're showing clips of the actors reading their lines, then a clip of the cartoon character finishing the line. The actor playing Horton is Barack Obama! He is saying the line, We must travel secretly...

I was in an empty restaurant, sitting with Barack at a table. I asked Barack about his feelings regarding the constant need for him to publicly reiterate that he is not a Muslim. Barack said nothing, got up and walked away. I tried to follow him, but he was elusive. I grew humiliated and upset.
Last night I dreamed I was making a salad for Hillary. There were plates of vegetables and I was carefully choosing some veggies from each plate to compose a scrumptious, elegant salad.

I had a dream that Barack, my favorite musician, and my first love were the same person. When I woke up I began thinking that these three people have inspired me in a similar ways and intensities but through different mediums (politics, music and love).

I went to see my therapist at our regular time. When I entered her office, Barack Obama was sitting on the couch, leaning forward, looking like himself on the cover of The Audacity of Hope. My therapist informed me that instead of our regular individual therapy, we would be having group therapy with Barack and one other person, who I didn't recognize. I felt angry that Barack was intruding on our session.

I had a dream that I met Hillary at a campaign event. She was being so pleasant that I did not have the heart to tell her that I was an Obama fan and would not be supporting her campaign. She was so genuinely impressed with my character that she urged me to give her my contact information and offered me a job. I obliged, just to be polite, but doubted I would get a call because I didn't believe she would ever be elected.

I dreamed I was at an Obama rally. As he spoke, he began to raise his hands in the air and levitate small objects around him. Everyone was shocked at first, but quickly accepted his abilities as real. He seemed a bit uncomfortable with what had happened, like he didn't mean to do what he did.

I dreamt that I was in a great big field. There was a volcano near me. Barack appeared above the volcano with an elephant on his head. The volcano erupted and Barack flew toward me. The elephant picked me up and put me on his back.

Hillary was in my kitchen warming me up some leftover risotto. I was hungry, and kept asking, Hey, Hillary, how's the risotto coming? She kept saying, Just five more minutes! But I never got the risotto.

So there was a jazz band playing. Hillary was in front of the stage with the mike, trying to be hip and somewhat relating to black people using language like Let me tell y'all about it! Then she started to play the saxophone - she sounded awful. She obviously didn't fit in with the band. She was wearing a red dress and pearls, way out of her league in terms of hipness. It was unclear whether she had been invited to play, or the band had been paid for her to sit in, or she just showed up.
Me and Barack, just hanging out, watching Lost together. Sweet.

Hillary and Bill came over to my apartment and it felt like one of those highly-orchestrated campaign stops where the candidate speaks with the common folks. My family was there too, and everyone was being very embarrassing, except my father. He and Bill hit it off, even though my father is a conservative. I spent the visit frantically rushing around the apartment trying to conceal evidence of my support for Obama.

Barack was teaching a middle school class. I was at a desk in the back of the room. Everyone had slightly over-sized bobble heads, including Barack. He was a passionate teacher and had all of us engaged in a lesson. Then he pulled out an electric guitar and started playing and walking around the classroom, singing. When he came near my desk I jokingly yelled, Do your thang Huckabee! Do your thang!
I was traveling with Barack and he didn't want to use a public restroom because, it was understood, he's a germophobe. I invited him to my parents' house so he could use theirs.
I was shopping at a drugstore and came across a display of Valentine's Day gift ideas. It included a CD entitled Barack Obama Sings 20 Classic Love Songs. I considered buying it for my sister.

I dreamed that an old romantic comedy which Obama had starred in in his younger days was dug up and was playing at every theater in the country. The movie was pretty bad but I remember thinking how unfair it was for people not to vote for him just because he wasn't a good actor.

I was on Obama's campaign bus and was sitting right next to him on some sort of a bench. He was wearing a crisp, light blue shirt, which I think contributed to me wanting to snuggle up closer to him. He then hugged me and we held each other for a while like that. The embrace had the warmth of fatherly affection, but I also remember waking up semi-aroused and thinking about his body.

Hillary was driving with me to a biochemistry class. We were driving in a grey Mercedes and she was extremely beautiful with pretty pink lipstick, pearls and a yellow suit. I felt like she was supporting me in my life goals.

In my dream of Hillary, she has her Wellesley look, shaggy hair and little round glasses. I pick her up at a peace rally and we go back to her apartment. She has a waterbed, a Melanie poster (Candles in the Wind) and a book of Kahlil Gibran's poems but she won't put out. She was really interested in going to a peace rally and not just cruising. I am really put off but I leave with grudging respect for her.

I had a dream that I received a personal email from Hilary Clinton, thanking me for inviting her to participate in Girls Day and sharing with me her t-shirt size. I don't remember what she said her size was. Then, in my dream, I had this revelation that I really ought to save that email since it may be valuable some day.

I dreamed that I was acquaintances with Hillary Clinton, even though in real life I don't like or support her. Nevertheless, in my dream, I was bringing a few of my friends to meet her. After a complicated time finding her location, I go into a house alone and she is standing in the hall with her people. We say hello, then she leans over and says very snidely, I love how your boots almost match your coat... but not quite. I woke up quite peeved.

Hillary was yelling at me for everything I've ever done wrong in my life, literally haranguing me that I need to make serious changes or my life will have been a waste of precious resources. She was yelling, You need to lose some weight! You need to go back to work! You need to submit your book proposal! You need to get your shit together!

Barack was giving a speech at The Phoenix Zoo, standing inside an exhibit. He had an orangutan on his shoulders and was talking about the importance of conservation. I found myself very impressed with his ideas but a little put off by the fact that he was so rushed that he didn't have time to talk with us after his speech, and was just hustled on to his next engagement by a crowd of handlers.

I'm standing on a street corner watching Barack enthusiastically help a baby onto a pogo-stick / bicycle hybrid made of flimsy white plastic. The baby and pogocycle topple over onto the pavement. The thuddy sound was not unlike an old mushy piece of fruit landing on the floor. I remember being at once fascinated by the fact no brains spilled anywhere, and horrified at the sight and sound.
My family and I went to see a badminton match in which Hillary Clinton was playing. I was amazed she had enough energy to play a badminton match because wouldn't she be too tired from campaigning?

I was standing on the sidelines of a baseball game, when I began to speak to one of the outfielders about why I support Obama. Eventually, a large crowd gathered about, listening and cheering as I elaborated on how Bush's war in Iraq and the massive deficit were impeding American progress. I was neither stammering nor hesitating as I spoke. Talking about Obama seemed to eliminate any sense of self-doubt or uncertainty about my value as an individual.

A few days before giving birth, I dreamed I was in the hospital in labor. For some reason, Hillary Clinton was there and they decided to let her deliver my baby. Everything went fine with the birth. It was kind of a hassle afterwards, though, because there were all these news crews hanging around wanting to talk to me and her and take photos of us, and I just wanted to get some sleep and cuddle my new baby.
Hillary and I went shopping for corned beef in a New York deli. In the dream, I was overwhelmed by all the selection, and Hillary said, Don't worry honey. I'll show you the best stuff.

I am with my stepfather's family and they are making me crazy! I get so angry and frustrated that I fall on the floor and start throwing a temper tantrum. My husband arrives and sees me. Without saying anything, he turns on some reggaeton music, which he knows I can’t resist. I get up and start dancing. We dance and dance and I think, I'm so lucky to be married to somebody who knows exactly what I need! Then I realize, That's not my husband -- that's Barack Obama!

I'm in a college classroom and we're having a discussion about current economic troubles. Hillary is teaching the class, and she is using the Socratic method, asking students questions and trying to elicit the correct response. No one is getting her point, so I raise my hand and she called on me. I say, The problem is liquidity! She agrees, Exactly. I feel so proud.

I was at a rally with my sister and her eight-month-old baby when my sister decided that she needed to feed my niece. As she was getting ready, Hillary saw and asked my sister if she could feed the baby. She grabbed my niece, then sat cross-legged on the ground. She started talking about the trials of being a mom and that her heroes are mothers everywhere. It was lovely.

In my dream, I hopped a plane to Tokyo. All the stores were run by Canadians. Hillary Clinton was there. She came up to me and asked me if I wanted to take a picture with her. I didn’t want to. I had on a silly headwrap that I didn’t think would photograph well, but I said yes anyway. When the photographer tried to snap the picture, the camera broke.

I traveled through a dimensional rift to a place and time where me, my friends and family (parents, brothers, some college friends) launched a successful pub/ice cream shop in the heart of a college-campus/trendy city place. Like a Lifestyle center. Business was booming and I was looking for a way to expand even more, without compromising our core values of ice cream and service.

I woke up naked for some reason, and wrapped myself in a towel. I climbed out on the porch roof -- the house was similar to the summit view place. I looked down, like in call of duty, and prepared to snipe someone or something like that.

I was in a theme park-type place. It's flat, lower budget. More like a historical old-time city, like what the city where I first worked would look like if the tourism industry took over. Sort of like if it became more like a nearby tourist city.

My boyfriend Alex was in this dream. I remember very little of it but the one thing that stuck out in my mind was this... I was trying to explain to him that the saying "don't throw rocks in a glass house" was the same as saying "don't throw flaming birds in a wooden barn".

212. (1) Nothing really, I was at work, working with Anne and at some point Andy fell asleep on top of me and I explained that I had a pine cone in my pocket and I better leave. Shawn was in it, yada yada work.

I’m with the group of girls from the hostel. I go with them and follow them around as they shop. It's like an elite discovery channel or national geographic store. Bored, I go off to the kids section and look at all the toy maps. I wish I could have had these as a kid. I would love to look off into Here be dragons.

217. Work - going to Pineapple Express and leaving /forgetting a wallet. Greg helped me look and I found it. Went to Greg's. A waiting room with my mom, Richard and other people, took a shower, went back out with Jon. Tyler moved in and we had a party. I left to ride my bike, stopped by a dumpster, bike got stolen, started to chase everyone with me. I went back, Samantha was with them with a baby, this time a house. Sitting in the street with Greg. Climbing out a window.

I inhabit a world whereby countries as different as Germany, China and Sri Lanka exist as suburbs or village-sized locations in the local landscape. I walk from one to the other, which are separated by a gradual change of countryside. In 'China' I stay in a hotel, which is small but beautiful - some kind of mixture between modern and traditional Chinese architecture which consists of interlocking planes of reds, pinks and blacks.
My_friend Terry comes to visit my hut. I have a few drawings up, none which I particularly think are that good - I'm kind of embarrassed because he talks them up and showers me with praise.

I kept going to a locker that was supposed to have been assigned to me in a swimming pool clubhouse, but the key didn't work. The place outside was like the downtown of the town where I went to high school, with the pier 1 imports and rooms to go and other places I don't like.  I had people from work with me. I was trying to do work, but it was difficult. Some friends traveled with me as I tried to find a store that was selling the thing I needed then -- a computer or a car.
Drinking/kissing game in a group out of a big dirt pit we'd dug. Back in high school. This could have been with Jillian (a friend from high school).

I was out late. I met a guy who said he had a classic vintage bottle of wine - a very famous one. The trouble was, he said, he had opened it a while ago, poured one glass, then re-corked it. But he said it should still be ok. I asked how long ago this was, and he admitted it was years ago. He gave me the wine so I could try it. I took it 'home' (which in the dream was a cluttered wooden house) and opened it in the early hours of the morning. It smelt absolutely rancid.

I was trying to get home. I had a bike that didn't work, and I was with my_old_friend Tyler. We'd hitched a lift with some hippies in an old van who kept stopping or having to go somewhere else on route. It was hopeless, so I got off and walked, and had to trust them to look after my bike.

I'm looking at some houses on a street in a neighborhood that seems lawless. The housing is newly build, and aesthetically unpleasant. The occupants seem to be wrecking the place. One house is teaming with children of all ages who should be at school. Then I notice the mother is drunk and more interested in her partner, another woman, who is high on drugs and grinning from ear to ear.

I was in the city where I work prior to this, going to the movies with my brother Gerald, showing him around. Batman was showing. There were large crowds. I remember we walked past the waterfront, and had trouble finding parking on the street.

The details of this dream have faded. The only image I have left is of some kind of control panel, made up of instruments and screens, set into wood. It is retro, tactile and beautifully made, but old and battered and very complicated. It looks as though it has been altered several times over the years. I can't remember what its for - i just remember being confused.

220. * Drunk high * I started to work with Greg more often. We started to become friends. Then 04/27/09 Dream 1: Blockbuster got a dog (the puppy from Marley and me). Greg got too attached to it. We had a truck by a river. Then Tyler started to work at Blockbuster and he had to wear a suit. This cramped his style ( never finished writing down dream).
I'm out in a small hilly town at night. Some of my students are about. One of them has disappeared into the woods. It seems as though we have all been drinking. It's chaotic.

A had a job on a ship - actually it was a small ship that sat on a much larger one. The small ship was like a ferry that held private parties. I was working as a barman on the deck. Suddenly there was a storm, and we all had to hold on to something to stop being swept out to sea. Later a party did take place. There were several fairly glamorous people there including a black woman who was dressed very elegantly It may have been the opening of my_uncles's play.

A friend of my_father's was (in the dream) our maths professor at university or college. I'm in an advanced physics class, and there's an extremely difficult problem to solve. I was determined not to give up and to understand it. My_friend Toby was also in the class and struggling too - I got the immersion he hadn't even grasped the first part. It may have been beyond me, but I didn't want to give up, or admit that I couldn't do it.

A fragmented dream. My spine was broken and had to be reconstructed. Apparently the trick was to mix a very smooth gradient of colored paste, and infill between the ribs or spinal columns carefully, to look continuous. The rest of the dream involved pain, and something relentless and stressful.

My_friend Tyler was going out with a girl who worked in a brothel. We went to meet her after work. It was a large bungalow surrounded by overgrown fields on the outskirts of town. We didn't go in - rather she came out to meet us. She was tall with long hair and didn't speak much. To me she was simultaneously attractive and repulsive. Tyler didn't seem to share my view. Some of her friends or colleagues came outside. There was drinking. It gets fuzzy after that.

232. (4) Flashes of Justin looking through the cabinet with food saying he did not know where anything was and he was going to re organize it. My mom downstairs in the basement of her house holding a wire remote that was regenerating an image if a 20 oz coke bottle that was empty except for a few water droplets. It was projecting the exact image of this perfectly. This amazed me.

237. (1) : I went over to Tyler’s house with two, maybe three other people, maybe girls I think, and one had two dogs. One was black and kept trying to get me. Tyler would just jump over me. I would go and hang out at this one book store until I eventually started working there.

I'm in a small group of people who have some kind of super power. We can transport ourselves just by willing it internally. It works by creating an illuminated line from where you are to where you want to go, then you levitate at any speed you like along the line. We can all go as a group. We shoot through a busy town, or perhaps it's an indoor mall.

243. Shawn left me with his girls to stay at Blockbuster after closing. This Blockbuster looked like a movie theater almost. It had rows of seats and then there were still posters. I know there was much more to this but cannot recall. More people started to show up and start drinking.

038 Dream Fragment. I am in a war. A plane of unknown origin flies overhead. It is identified as hostile and anti-aircraft guns begin to fire at it. The plane circles around in the cloudy sky and begins to drop bombs. The explosions are sharp and devastating; fountains of earth raise high up and fall back to the ground. There is a fire storm of smoke and flame. I run and become engulfed in the haze. I find a clearing and find my dog. Recollection ends here. I wake up anxious.

072 I am in Vietnam with the men who composed last night’s group. They are talking too loud; I am anxious they will give our position away. We recon a small abandoned villa and examine an old foundation. Next, I am in a hospital corridor, walking with Steve Melhop, a squad leader from my old platoon. He has been shot badly in the thigh. As we walk a doctor points out the injury, which is bandaged and bleeding.

There was a lot more to this dream but I only remember the end. I was working on a computer or something and suddenly it wasn't working right. A message popped up saying that they were having problems because of power outages in Virginia. I looked outside and the sky was extremely dark and gray and it was very windy! I was concerned that maybe a tornado was coming. I was looking out all the windows in my condo to see if I could see anything coming my way, then I woke up.
I dreamed that Kevin was swimming at the beach, and he was so hot! He got out of the water and came over and kissed me. The kiss was so intense; I swear my lips were tingling when I woke up.

I dreamed that Jackson and I were on a bus on the way home from my elementary school. He jumped out of the bus to run to my house. It was pouring rain, so we had to change into dry clothes. I was changing when he walked in and saw me. I wasn't embarrassed, for some reason. But there was something I was trying to hide in my closet, so I was worried that he would find it. Then I woke up.

I had a dream that there was a graduation concert in the music building. All the juniors had to wear teal. I think I was sitting in between Conrad and Arthur. Gianna was taking pictures, and I was really nervous because I think I had to go on stage at some point. I can't remember any more.

I am with a woman named Candy who resembles my step-sister. It is night time in Seattle-ish city with skyscrapers. Her parents had flipped their car in an accident. There is a scene where my step-brothers are having a big party, drinking whiskey and Mandy tells everyone I’m pregnant. She is worried about me drinking (I wasn’t). There are huge frosted, Easter-colored cupcakes that look very delicious.
Tonight I am a truck driver. I am trailing another truck driver through some tricky maneuvers. This test is taking place in a narrow street. Not being a skilled driver, I was a bit nervous.

A lady and I are frolicking (so to speak) in the yard. Mostly by way of kissing-never the less, we are pretty intense. Without realizing how we got there, we are in the house and I am in the process of removing her slacks (all this, while carrying her- had to be a dream!) The kissing is still continuing. Suddenly, I decide undressing her is not a good idea because if someone walked in, she would be embarrassed. I woke up.

The scene resembles a Theologate. A lot of clerics are sitting around discussing their scholastic evaluation. Everyone seems worried and concerned that they have not done well. At this time, the clerics receive their theological aptitude test results: I was in the 99 percentile which is a major shock. I wake up.
The only thing I remember is when I wake up, I kept saying we have to de-bug the system. I kept saying it over and over. I was very anxious when I woke up.

100. I go to 1515 Skylark Lane and see people. I'm supposed to drive somewhere and ask directions - go down Sunset to La Brea, go south. Change clothes - meet people (wake up very upset and angry about net neutrality - worried the goons will run in the Internet).

I think I am walking through a college campus with a friend. As we walk, we become aware that someone is following us on a skateboard. Both of us are concerned that this person means to harm us. As he comes close , we both grab the man, but it becomes clear he meant us no harm. Also, I thing I recognize him as a former priest friend. I am wrong. I wake up.

I am working for a company that is restructuring. Myself and another man have been brought in to assist with developing our more effective paradigm. In the meantime, a crime has been committed and we all are being questioned. During my questioning, I am concerned about losing my keys. They interrupt my questioning to audition a singer. He is very good. I wake up.

I was escorting Hillary to the stage at a rally at some fairgrounds. When I greeted her, I was surprised to discover she was wearing a completely over-the-top red ball gown and spiky heels that poked holes in the soil as we walked. I was really worried she was going to make a fool of herself, but I tried to pretend that she looked absolutely fine.
I had a dream that I was Filipino and was making dinner for Obama. I was worried that I wouldn't have enough food

Hillary was at a classical music concert, slumped over in the chair asleep. I became worried that she was not getting enough sleep, and I remember thinking, I'd better get on the phones and raise more money for the campaign so Hillary can sleep.

My_brother and I are preparing to go into an exam. It's some kind of art exam, and it's going to last about 4 hours. I'm in a house with my_brother and my_grandfather who both seem laid back about leaving to go to the exams. I'm getting concerned about being late, and I'm expecting a lift. An old colleague is also there from an old job. He starts pointing out how difficult the exam is going to be. Have I researched this or that? I'm thinking "no".

I was sleeping on an air mattress in my friend Stephanie's apartment. It deflated. So I inflated it. I was worried that it was too full. I sat on it. It wasn’t. I went out to take a shower. I was worried Stephanie and Mark would be awake. I didn’t want to go walking through their apartment too early in my underwear and disturb their day. It had slept in – it was 11:30 a.m. already. Nobody was awake. I was in luck.

I see Thunder our cat, and it looks like her tail has come off….I touch it, and it falls off in my hand….She runs off with a bloody stump for a tail….I’m worried….What should I do?....I she going to be ok?....Can cats do fine without a tail?....Should I try to take her to a vet to reattach it?....

295. I was pregnant about 3 months and I was a little worried about it. But then I knew it would be OK in the end. I thought it was from when I had sex with James. Then I was on my bike and found a gray kitten. I wanted to take it with me but then I had a hard time finding something to take it with me with. It was at night and I was riding through a neighborhood. Some creepy guy came out of my co- worker’s house with a camera, filming me.

Something about the surveys I’m doing….Multiple numbers of them….trying to keep them straight….there are four total, with one of them for Bud, having to do with gay issues?....two others are for right now, and one of the surveys is for long term….Someone reminds me the polls are about to be done, later that morning….I haven’t called the caterer to arrange for the party afterwards?....I’m worried….Can I just get pizzas for everyone?....

Ronald and I sneak off onto a strange little boat….If we’re seen we’ll get in trouble, but we’re ok….We sit down in a hidden spot and play catch with a ball….I tell Ronald do NOT throw it too high, or we’ll lose the ball in the water….Some other people come, also hiding….They’re impressed at our daring….Earlier, I’m calling and yelling for Fern….no one else is worried, but I am….where is she?....

This dream was to do with my mum and dad. In my dream they told me how to focus on myself and live life as it comes. My dream was a pleasant one and I also thought that my uncle died with cancer. Also in my dream I had concerns about my other family members having cancer.

320. * Key Points * Strange dreams of people dropping dead or committing suicide. More kidnapping dreams. I first got a view of a girl that was buried alive or trapped. I kept trying to find her. I felt as if this is a recurring dream. Very intense. I would keep barely escaping situations. More dreams of Alex. Dream of pregnancy (the birth of something new- no doubt about this, life is about to take a drastic turn). I remember feeling the pain of giving birth.

The Green Day band is playing their song “Holiday”….I have a guitar, I’m going to play in the song….but I have to run through a crowd of people and cars in the street to get to the stage….Is my guitar turned on?....Do I have a pick?....the song is already half over and I’m still not there, I’m getting anxious….

I’m with someone, trying to get out of a house without being seen….We manage to do so….I see a guy on a surfboard trying to dive under a huge wave….oh oh, I’m worried he’s not going to make it….Then I’m running up a hill, and I get to a house where I stop and ask for a glass of water….A guy in a wheelchair says sure….I feel a bit awkward about asking, but I’m grateful and say thanks to him….it’s good to know I have this resource up the hill….

I’m walking down a hill with my wife, behind her, rubbing against her, wanting to fool around….So does she….We have to get where we’re going first….At another point, I’m driving behind a green pickup truck….It goes one way, I go another….Then it’s front of me again….it turns, and I accidentally clip it in the back….not bad, but I’m worried the guy might be mad so I call out “sorry!” to the driver….it’s such a minor bit of contact, it’s not worth stopping, and he keeps going….
Someone, a girl?, is having sex with me….wow, it feels really good….It’s surprisingly intense, I can’t believe it’s happening….

I’m helping Jaron Lanier deal with the adoption of his daughter….Some people are hassling him about it….It’s not a problem for me….Later I’m in our black minivan trying to drive around a tight corner….The car tips over to the left….One the edge of murky water….Oh oh, I’m concerned and now I wonder what I’m going to do….At another point Haley comes into my study, with some others, and asks if I’ve signed the donation pledge form….I say yes, you haven’t gotten it yet?....No, not yet….

With some people I’m going to a house where a girl I like lives….We get there and the girl’s friend/sister says she’s not awake yet….But I say to one of my companions, she is awake, she’s not the type to sleep super late, she’s just saying that because she’s nervous to come out to see people unexpectedly….Later, I somehow have my “Dead Man” t-shirt taken from me….I say it’s ok, and I’ll deal with it, but I’m mad about it….

I look out the window of our house and I see the cats are out….Oh oh, I’m worried….I run down and find they are in a garden, playing with another cat….Dustin, from back in my home town?....I pet them, not sure if I should bring them in….At another point I’m trying to hide from people in a refrigerator….Somehow if I stand with a robe covering me they won’t see me….It worked once before, but now it doesn’t, they see me….A girl?....At another point Ronald asks if I’m going on a run….

I see the Terry family, outside on my street….They ask me what’s happening with Bridgewood?....I explain about the $13 million bond and the issues repaying it….I’m nervous as I talk to them, wondering if they will understand….

I’m in an airplane….The pilot goes down into a cement tunnel to get through a city….I’m nervous, but he says it will be ok….I sit back as the plane goes through narrow, narrow places, too narrow to fit?....But it makes it outside again, and we go back up into the air….It didn’t seem possible, I’m amazed….

I’m sitting on a park bench with my wife….Some people with kids come and set up a car game, right in front of us….My wife is angry and ready to leave, but I think I’ll be OK with them in front of us….I stretch out my legs and relax, showing that I’m not worried by them….
Yes, 2 nights ago. I was getting ready to lead my first fitness class as lead trainer and I was very nervous about it.
No I do not have drama about my job. Although I have concerns about the level on unfairness applied to hospital employees in general.
I had a bad dream about a job interview, it meant that i was just nervous.

always dream about my former boss and what a idiot he was,always confrontational,never gave compliments or admitted when he was wrong even if you were 100% correct and could prove it. as far as i was concerned the dream was telling me to get out of that job.

Dreamed I was unable to successfully complete a job assignment due to lack of supplies and an inability to communicate with my staff to ensure they knew what to do. I think it accurately reflects my current concerns about my job. Due to cutbacks we do not have enough trained staff and sufficient materials to complete tasks properly. Therefore I am always concerned my superiors will criticize my performance.
Yes: I was back practicing anesthesia, in a hospital that I recognized, but much bigger. I was having trouble getting to the right surgical suite, but was not particularly worried.
Dreamed about giving a presentation which I was scheduled to give the next day. I assume it meant I was nervous about the presentation.

I had a dream last night that our secretary told me that my classroom was out of fire code and that all of the work I put in to making it presentable and useable was going to have to get taken down. There were also giant staplers chasing me down the hall. I don't really know what it means, but I knew that our superintendent was going to visit our campus today, and I'm sure I was worried about my room looking perfect.

I misplaced a file, spent hours looking for it. Left work, worried about where the file cold possibly be, told my boss I couldn't find it & he said I had to find it & don't leave work until I did. I should be more organized & centered when it comes to important decision making in both my professional & personal life.
Yes, I dreamed we had a major catastrophe at work that got out of control quickly. I believe I was anxious about a new process we were developing.
Giving a presentation and not being prepared. Probably anxious about not reading the notes over enough
Worried about not having completed specific tasks that had been previously forgotten.
Yes. I was worried about meeting the new requirements for customer referrals. I dreamed about trying so hard to get referrals. I could actually feel my stress in my dream.

As a teacher, I have a recurrring dream where I for some reason forget to go to school on the first day of school. I dream this not because I am actually worried about forgetting to go to school, but because I am always concerned about being ready and doing all I can for my students.

I am a teacher, and I dreamed that I got in a heated argument with a misbehaving student, and we were soon yelling loudly at each other. I think this means that I have concerns about student discipline.

I dreamed that I had forgot about a project I needed to complete, and was not ready to teach class that day. It probably means I have too many responsibilities and am worried I will not be able to complete everything.

I work shifts @ many sites. I woke up recently having dreamt I reported to the wrong site for a shift. I did this once and it was quite embarrassing...I guess I was reliving the experience concerned I'd do it again.
rehearsing exchnages with superiors about difficult issues. As a means of addressingn the concerns fully and appropriately.

The most recent dream about work was probably about pay changes and how to bring it up to the employer. It was complicated, and I kept trying to run through multiple scenarios. I think I was anxious and my mind was trying to figure out how best to handle the situation.
I have had a few dreams about the first day of school. I think it is just nerves, since I am a teacher I get a little nervous about the first few days of school.
Yes, it involved leaving work early. It was right before I was taking some time off, so I thought it was anticipation of that.

I dreamed that my mother appeared at the foot of my bed and she only wanted to know that I was alright and when I said I was she disapeared. The dream means that She was worried about me and still loves me....

Yes, I have dreamed that my father came back to my parents house and that I was so worried that he would be mad that I had done so much in the house (gone through all his papers, gave away his clothes, etc...)
I don't remember any of the dream details, but frequently, especially in a scary or intense dream I will realize I am dreaming and try to wake myself up.
Something calamitous was happening but I wasn't overly concerned since I knew it was a dream and I could wake up any time it got too overwhelming.

I had a very suspensful dream where I was searching for someone but didn't know who it was. Then, finding out that someone was searching for the same person and me. I realized I was dreaming when I felt uneasy about something bad getting ready to happen in the dream. I woke before I could find out what it was....
Yes, it had something to do with my wedding, several months before we got married...but I can't remember the details. I think it just meant I was anxious about everything going well, though.

I dreamed I woke up from a nap and could not walk, as though I had a stroke. I knew if I could wake up, it would not be true. So I dreamed I woke up, but couldn't walk, and was aware that I was still dreaming. This happened three or four times before I actually was able to awaken. I believe this dream is a reflection of my anxiety about my own health, and is triggered by concerns about my siblings and family members who are experiencing health problems.

I appeared to be at a team meeting at my place of work discussing patients. The setting, however, was a room that looked out at the ocean and my sense was it was Chile. Some of us, about four, were standing, the rest sitting. Perhaps the last four to report. My feeling was one of anxiousness, needing the meeting to end so I could get out and get going somewhere. A sense of needing to get moving toward some other place, being frustrated and delayed in that goal.

Something about computer files....Someone has access to my accounts, and it's ok....I want them to help me with something, but I'm worried other people will get in there and mess things up....At one point Ronald is slithering on the floor like a snake?....

Lots of things about helping Fern with some project, an online computer activity of some kind in which many other people can contribute....Maybe there's a guy around too?....At another point I'm flying in an airplane, and twice the pilot has to climb up and over a house, barely making it each time....I'm looking out the window to my right and I can see the roof of the house below....The second time in particular, I'm worried, sure we're going to hit it....But somehow we don't....

J., an old friend is standing in the middle of the road blocking me from driving into a gas station. There is a very controlling man at the station who wants us both there, but he mainly wants J. J. won’t let me drive in. The area is very “country” with a lot of woods. This is the only road that leads out of the woods. I wake up annoyed that J. won’t let me by, and feeling uneasy about the man at the gas station.

Something about a woman....And going down a short tunnel, maybe twenty feet long, at about a 45 degree angle....The ceiling of the tunnel seems to be dark fabric, black....I come out in an area with other people behind me....They are nervous, but I am confident....At some other point, I look at Ronald's report card from school....I read the report, and it shows he got an F in one class and C's in two other classes....I'm surprised, that's much worse than I thought....

I was in Perth staying at a long low flat for some sort of course that I was teaching. I was worried that my work pile was nearing 1 foot tall and that I’d never get it done. When I’d finished the course and the flat was inspected I had a heap of washing up that I decided to leave. Dog and I caught the underground tube that went past a concentration camp. I felt like I should help the people inside so I smuggled 2 of them out into the community.

I find myself in a race, running with lots of other people....Waiting to go at a street intersection....All the other runners are kids?....We wait, standing restlessly in a pack, trying to get subtle advantage over others....Then we go....Fast down a hill....I see I'm rather close to the front....I realize if I push it, I could get the lead....So I run hard and get up into the front....One person is surprised as I run past with long strides....
I’m outside standing in a driveway. My son, N. comes over to show me his new car, an old Corvette. I am worried about the fiberglass body and him getting into an accident.

I’m with some people, and we’re supposed to fight a big guy….With swords, to the death?....It’s some kind of ritual or tradition, always done like this….I’m worried, I don’t want to go through with it, and try to think of ways to get out of it….But then I hear the guy saying he does not want to do it anymore….I’m surprised and relieved….At some point I am startled to see Thunder our cat jump down from a kitchen counter onto the floor….She looks good….Her black, white, and orange fur is glossy….

I’m supposed to box some guy I know….As part of a weird drawer or dresser piece of furniture in a room?....I say we should not use the lower drawer, but a higher one….and, I remove his gray skull cap….I say you can’t wear that….I’m nervous, this is going to be difficult….I made the points about the drawer and skull cap to delay the beginning of the boxing match….

my wife sees a picture, she looks more closely and sees a detail in the background….A tiny image, but as my view zooms in I see it’s a mountain, with sunlight shining on its snow capped peak….I’m surprised, I didn’t see it before….my wife says I’m troubled by that….Earlier, I’m serving people food?....good delicious stuff….I say something mean to another guy, then I walk off to another part of the house….I’m worried he’ll be angry and follow me….

I’m in some kind of a building, and water starts leaking down from above….I’m surprised by this….Where is it coming from?....It’s like a thin sheet of water pouring down the walls of the room, from the ceiling….I’m worried, is there a problem?....
I am trying to write the essay, and worried it will not be long enough, it won’t make sense, it won’t have enough good, interesting content….

A kid is riding his bike down a street….He bumps into a car or something like that….His mother come over, concerned about his safety, and takes him away….She is more commanding than I think necessary….I see the kid drop his dental retainer on the ground….I pick it up and give it to them….At some point Strauss our cat is there, checking things out….I think of how intelligent he is, paying close attention to human activities….

Something about Chandler from the television show “Friends” being nervous about going to a place to meet his fiancé Monica….He gets so aroused with everyone else going, doing rides?....Trying on wedding clothes, flirting with each other….It makes it hard for Chandler to concentrate on learning the non-arousing aspects of being married, being in a good calm place to meet Monica at the end of each day….

I see Lightning the cat, she is alive and people are trying to catch her….Surprised and worried, I get to her and take her somewhere else, to protect her….I am in a house, and through a window I see her walking outside, beautiful white fur, looking confused as the other people seek her out….

Something about a house….A certain part of it, like an added on room, needs to burn?....be changed?....The structure will be very flammable, go up in flames fast….It is supposed to happen, but I am nervous about possible damage to the rest of the house….A lot of women are watching from the periphery, waiting for me….

A bad guy is torturing another guy, trying to put this black ball with metal spikes all over it into the guy’s mouth….It upsets me, I look away….at another point I see a guy and a girl surfing….the girl is in the lead, on her surfboard in the water….they come towards me on the wave, and for a moment I am worried they will….but they curve gracefully away from me as they come to the shore, so it ends up fine….

I am driving a van along a dirt road on a cliff….It is very narrow….At one point I am concerned about falling….It is ok, however, and I get through successfully….But I wonder how long that path will be safe….

I am serving lots of people outside, like a food catering situation….Fireface our cat is out with me….I am worried that if I go, she will get lost outside….But I have to go, so I risk it….Later, I am eating something, and I see a big black spider along with another creature in the food container….I decide I cannot eat from there any more….

I am at a house at the beach, looking out at the ocean….Big waves come up, crash against the windows of the house….nothing is broken, but the waves are strong, and the house is very close to the shore….I feel we should all be careful….At one point Fern (not her age now, but a baby) and another woman, my wife maybe?, go into the water and they are pushed up against the side of the house….I am worried for them, although they do not seem harmed right now….

Everyone is worried about how the last writing, book, or piece of text will show my wife in a bad way….Everyone is looking around to find it….I, however, am not worried….I know the last writing is not bad, and there is no need for concern….
As part of a longer thing, I get to three stages of sexual positions with my wife….I’m laying on my back on our bed, and she comes and lays down on top of me….the erotic sensation is super intense….

I see a long line of people, waiting for something….some of the women are in evening gowns, blue in color, long and attractive….I am standing apart from them, and I feel glad not to be in that line….the people seem anxious, or concerned to make sure they stay in the line….

Someone is cooking in a kitchen….a couple of pots and other things are on the stove….a young woman is stirring the pots with a big wooden spoon….She is anxious about it all….I try to reassure her….At some other point I am running on a trail, down a hill, around a corner….I have to slow down for other people….

Inside a train station….Lots of people are around….I am trying to find out which people do not belong there….Some intrigue is involved, people hiding….groups are trying to sneak around and do bad things?....But the cops are there, and no one is arrested….It makes me wonder, is all this in my mind?....Are there no bad guys here, just my suspicions?....Earlier, I am wearing a white short-sleeve henley shirt, and I realize I am sweating a lot….I am concerned this will ruin the shirt….

Some cats are in a dispute….one bites the ear of another, tugs at it….I watch, wondering if they will get in a bigger fight….At another point I am in a car, driving, and I start backing down a city street, going in reverse….Others in the car are nervous about it, and someone outside guiding me is also nervous, but I’m confident….no other cars come, and I pull around and get ready to start driving forward again, and all is good….Later, something about looking for a witch?....
A guy is on trial for something; nothing terrible, but it is a problem….His parents are there, concerned about him….But they are also confident he will be cleared of the charges….

A bag with some orange colored salmon and some medicine is left out, after going to the market….I am concerned it will go bad, so I put the salmon in the refrigerator to keep it cool….It turns out the medicine is not needed by the kids….That is who the medicine was for….

A bunch of clean dishes are stacked up in a drying rack in a kitchen….Someone takes a long wine glass out of the stack….I think the person should be very careful so the glass does not break….Then some people are gathered, someone is in trouble or having problems, and the other people do not really care….They go on with their activities….A woman just walks on by….I am surprised by their lack of concern….
91. I post the article on children and [health concerns with] soccer where my nephew can see it. He reads it and decides to stop playing soccer. Other dreams about the nephews.

I am with a bunch of actors out on a street….We are all dressed in white clothes….I am feeling good with them, relaxed….Then I realize I am supposed to play the ghost in “Hamlet”….I have not prepared at all, and the first performance is tonight….I am worried I do not have enough time to learn my lines….I wonder how I let the preparation go so long….

I am walking along a big creek or river, water flowing down….For some reason I go into the water and walk through it for a while….Even though I get wet, it is good because I check out how safe it is?....Then a woman I am with gets in too….She goes out further in the water, and I am worried she might slip on the wet rocks….But she is fine….

Something about my taking care of a dog, with black fur, medium sized….The dog is laying down, and people are concerned about its health….But then the dog gets up, and it is fine….there might be problems with its legs, that is why people were worried?....

Other things are going on, when I open the door to outside and Phantom our cat runs outside….Before I can stop him….A gray flash, from left to right out the door….I am surprised and worried….It happened so fast, there was nothing I could do to stop him….Now I wonder what do I do?....It will be hard to find him and get him back inside....

I am walking along outside, hearing someone tell me about OSF….Something will take four weeks, rather than one….I follow the speaker and two other people following closely and listening….I am confused a bit by the situation….Later, I am watching a kid do something outside….he has a snack, like a muffin, sitting next to him on a gray rock….I am concerned the muffin will fall over so he cannot eat it any more….The boy does not notice the perilous situation with his muffin….

I go into a room with someone else, a woman perhaps, and to our surprise we see someone else there, a guy….He has something to tell us or inform us about….I wonder how complicated it is, and then I see lots of pieces of white paper….He wants to tell us about a problematic situation, but we are there to do something else….But we will listen to him anyway and take his concerns seriously….Earlier, I see three silver metal strainers, like for a kitchen, hanging in a little set….

Some people and I are making a change of some kind, but other people do not want it….A very intense dispute….There is a stack of papers they want to take from me….A woman has them for a moment, but I get them back….I wonder where I should hide them….In my study?....my closet, somewhere in the bedroom?....Somewhere they will not find them….At another point, I look outside and see a big creek or river, with fast moving water….

A guy named McDowell is putting on a performance….My performance is after his….I will look better because his is so weird?....His show involves a square pool of water splashing around….A young woman is involved….She is watching the show….I am concerned she will be confused, not know what’s going on….

I am with a group….We are trapped?....I want to keep walking outside, rather than stay in one place….I go by the back stage area where we are being kept….I look at the two-story gray building façade to my right….Earlier I have to back a strange bus out of a square-shaped parking garage….No one thinks I can do it, the bus is so tightly squeezed inside, but I am going ahead anyway….At some point there are lots of black bugs crawling around….I am worried about them, their destructive potential….

Some people send us lots of very short messages and letters, trying to buy the ranch from us….We do not want to sell it, but the letters are so numerous and aggressive, I am worried about how to deal with it all….

A woman is taking care of a kid in a house….But she is worried, it is complex and hard….Not going as well as she had hoped….At another point I am trying to help someone stay in Portland….There are many reasons why….Not just negative things, such as it is not as bad as elsewhere, but also positive things, too, this is a good place….

Lots going on….opening and closing things….I am very intrigued, engaged in the action….One big piece or object has eleven white pegs in the door, they have to be aligned just right to open and close….At one point I think I am awake, and I have forgotten to write the dream down….Later, my wife gets concerned about something, but I reassure her….Everything will work out….

Inside an almost empty house, some people are using packages of paper, now that all the boxes are gone….But the paper pads are terrible quality, very flimsy, they fall apart immediately….many problems ensue….I am concerned about how this could happen….Lots of guys are writing things on the pads that will then get lost….I need to help fix this….Later, something about a school, outside on an open hilly area….

I am going on a run, and before setting off I decide to go to the bathroom first….it is a public restroom, not very clean but no one inside, so I go into a stall with a barely adequate door and sit down on the toilet….But just then another guy comes into the restroom, he is noisy and talkative, which makes me nervous….I get up and leave the restroom, disappointed….Earlier, several scenes or activities that involve problems, things not going well, difficulties….

Something about activities that involve two people, combining their energies in unlikely ways....Other people expected it would just be one person at a time, but surprisingly the two people together, even if they are lesser types?, do very well....Later, I see a puff comforter from a bed at home has a dark spot on it....oh no, I'm worried our cat Phantom has peed on it....

There is a heavy bucket or container outside that a couple of guys (one of them an OSF actor) are trying to move….I am willing to help them, but I am concerned the metal wire handle will hurt my hands when I lift….But when I go to get some gloves from a nearby car, the guys are almost done with the job….I delayed too much….

I am having a debate or discussion about Jordan Peterson….I look at what he is doing….it looks like a model….I wonder, will it all burn?....Bob Newhart is there, he also tries to understand what Peterson is doing….two white guys….Bob has four of these models?....Does he think they will work out?....No, he is nervous that they will not work, like I am feeling, too….

I am at my home waiting for a visitor. But I am anxious because I am not eager for this person to arrive and want to keep the visitor away. I am very preoccupied, concerned, and worried because I have become pregnant. But what is the reason that I have given birth to a stick figure object instead of giving birth to a baby? The stick is white in color. Then I fall from the top floor of a building and am over water.

I am at dinner, and a friend of mine is supposed to join me. But I can’t find her, and I fret nervously. There are some other women in the restaurant. I recognize them, because I work with them at the office. So we have something to eat, and then we take a walk together.

This guy [who I used to work with] is standing outside my office. He is getting ready to say “goodbye” but really does not want to go. There is another guy just getting out of a shower. In this dream, I am pregnant. I don’t see how this could have happened because I have been on Depo shots for one year and one half, taking the shots faithfully. so those strangers were giving a psyche review of me and toldnothers publicly how i sucked, i was pissed and defemded myself, even woke from that. then i toured somewhere with my entire family but once again, thry heard the analysis and i was expecting negative criticism. very tense. but at leaet mom was there. seldom did i wake from deeams.

she was on a hospital bed and could move her head and even speak. but in a coma. I could communicate with her. making Sure she was OK and comfortable on the bed. I cried while apologizing and woke up from that. intense and vivid.

good plot that built up to me and others entering this studio somewhere in Harvard, full of bricks. then once inside, occupants took off theirbclothes and tried to engage in some kind of wild parties, I fled. good visuals, intense plot.

indoor like an underground apartment or cabin. bue angry with mom or vice versa or both. me gor and dad and ma were clearly present. bue too. mom even wanted to summon Ada as support. the argument was about mom's disagreement with bue on her arrangement of a wedding or something. very intense and vivid. woke up from that even. bue was the most upset one.

At college on the first day. I tried to get a seat but Skye stole it and pretended she didn't and no one cared. I left the classroom and saw Ryan walking around. Like me he was worried about failing again and never getting a job. I heard him talking to a school counsellor.

Lindsey invites herself and Ryan to my parents' place with some girl, and I'm worried they'll be annoyed but it's sort of ok. We make food, and Auntie Fiona and Uncle Jim are there. It turned out I wasn't needed and at some point I got ready for another trip but I decided against it since it was so pointless the first time.

I was waking up in my parents' home instead of my own, and I was alone. I left the bedroom, concerned the neighbors could see me through the window. I ate some good from the fridge and then tried to turn on the bathroom light but it wouldn't work. Then I had a shower and as I tried to make it warmer, it turned into more of a dryer and I dried quickly.

I somehow ended up in a threesome with Megan and another girl. I think we were all roommates? We were in the bathroom and they were going at it, but I hung back and felt kind of nervous. I'm not sure what happened then, but later I went back and the sink was covered in feces, so I halfheartedly cleaned it up and then noticed my parents had called at 10:30 PM for some reason. Apparently I can read clocks in my dreams.

After my other dream, I was taking out some grocery bags. From my dads car. My dad asked me to take the groceries to the house. I thought it was a bad idea since I wanted to open the door first. Kaiser was there tied up. When he saw me with the food he began to come towards me. She was in the middle of the street and I was worried you could get hit by a car. I dropped the grocery bags. He began to eat the food. I try to take it from him. He growled savagely. I told that it was a bad idea.

I was back in national city. So how I was driving I was Riding a bus. The bus was empty. I was worried I would take the wrong bus. I was worried it would drop me off at the wrong location. The bus was like a school bus. I remember chasing after the bus at night.

Each class was making a special film for their favorite teacher. They picked my least favorite one. I had Mayim Balik’s SAT test booklet and I was correcting it (I think it was only a practice one). Most of his answers were patently wrong and I remember thinking, “Oh my god! All I remember is I was standing and conferencing with some folks on the cement patch. But I was more concerned with this shallow, circular gutter running around us. And there were two critters - a mangled, bloody, half-corpse of a big, fat rat, and a tiny in-tact body of a little mouse, a Pygmy mouse.

i was at lunch with jocelyne. it was the tables like at south. it might have even been south. and she was worried. she told me to look at her eyes. they were green on the outtside and blue in middle. but the green was moving and taking over the blue. she said it was a ghost. and when i heard that i thought of her eyes being possessed. someone controlling what she sees

I looked at jewelry in a store with Pablo. I pointed to a ring because it was pretty. Later at the high school, Pablo gave me the ring and said it was a promise, not an engagement. I got nervous and worried.

I'm participating in a challenge, much like Big Brother. Together with people I don't know, I have to live in a house where there is not much to do. A bunch of teenagers did something involving fire. The setting is some rocky, desert-like environment. They are being hunted by a mob (of concerned parents maybe). They find shelter in a camper. I was some kind of bystander. I remember a lot more was going on, but I don't remember what exactly.

Bat cave under house. Shawn lived there. Tommy lived there lost weight. Swimming baby who dove for food. Brought baby back to dad in mental hospital. He died. Had incurable disease. Got back to vacation house and smoked shitty blunt with random ppl we met. Broke apart wen i held and he said to be careful dont do that. Woman came out of bldg we were next to. Dream 3. [9] This dream was about research, about this study. I dreamt that I had to the same procedure all over again, because I was restless (moving a lot). 3 M I dreamt that I was observing several unidentifiable, I suppose they were businessmen, and they were all talking about, they were getting kind of hot under the collar concerning certain misconceptions about various segments of the business world. #2848 (07/25/95) I am nervous and sitting on a toilet, having belly cramps. Rochelle is around asking me questions about why I act the way I do. I explain, something about getting nervous and needing to go to the bathroom. I see my mother and say something like, "It's not like you ever taught us how to be emotionally intimate." Then I am spreading thick gobs of butter on already buttered toast.

#1177 (12/30/88) Two men love me, an old flame and a new one. I am awash with loving attention. They vie for my attention. I go outside with one of them who is now a woman friend. We go to sit on an embankment. Someone says, "This is where lovers sit." I feel uneasy. So I sit on other spots nearby, hoping no one is watching and getting the wrong idea. Then a barrier slides open and I get a beautiful view of the open sea.

Last night, I had a nightmare. I dreamed that I was at a basketball game with my guy friends. All of a sudden, my friend John, who is a diabetic, gets up and suddenly faints. I got up and tried to help them but nobody else did! I felt so helpless. Then, I woke up not knowing if he was okay or not. I was worried/anxious when I woke up.

Last night I dreamed that I was planning on burning my friends house. I didn't actually know this friend but I knew he was my friend in my dream. I couldn't burn it right away because people kept on interrupting me. When I finally got a chance, with my mom's help, I woke up. So, I don't know if I succeeded in burning it. I was anxious the whole time and it was during the day.

This was the first nightmare I've had in a long time. I dreamt that my roommate died in our room. It was really scary because I walked in after practice and the room was dark. I saw her lying half on her bed, half off. Then I woke up. I was shaking and nervous, but when I looked at her bed, she was sleeping peacefully.

I had a dream that I didn't wake up to my alarm this morning. I was like I couldn't figure out what day or time it was. The whole dream was somewhat in slow motion. It was like everything was taking a little longer to do. I was so anxious and nervous that I would miss my test. Oh, it was the most terrible feeling. There was no completion to the end of the dream. I don't know whether I made it to the test or not.

Dreamt about math class and O'Connor (the class I'm taking this semester). Math 11, my professor was lecturing and handing out quizzes we took (or were about to take). I was nervous and worried because my grade wasn't doing too well. I felt like I was unprepared

I was sailing on a river (it was brown with trees coming out of the water, it seemed like it was flooding) with my parents. We were in a huge boat and I was extremely nervous because we were going really fast. The boat tipped - this motion seemed very slow, my heart was racing because I was scared and nervous. I was also very worried about our stuff getting wet. I jumped from the boat to the water as the boat was tipping over. My dad was talking calmly telling my mom and I we were going to tip.

I remember there were people, but I'm not sure who they were. People's faces were dark because they had this circle of light surrounding them. I think it was their aura. People in my dream were going around stealing people's aura, so everyone's concern was how to keep it. The people were giving tips, but I don't remember what they were. There wasn't any talking with mouths in my dream. All communication was done telepathically.

My boy left early to go skiing, and I was worried he would fall asleep at the wheel; I had kept him up so late. I had a horrible dream that I was waiting and waiting for him to get back and he never did.

In this dream I was in a class and we were taking notes on this 60’s documentary film. It was about Kennedy, Vietnam, the clothes and culture of the decade and so on. I remember also that everyone was eating fruit all of a sudden very randomly. Also the people in the class included my mom and old new friends of mine. I felt a lot of pressure to balance my relationship with everyone and I was really worried about making sure everyone was getting along.

Last night my dream took place in my math class. I came in late to class and sat in the third row. I felt very uneasy and isolated. I asked a girl in my class why the teacher hated me and she said because I sat in the 3rd row. Then I was looking close up into the teacher's eye and she had three grains of sand in her eye.

My friend who doesn't go to school with us anymore was visiting and she was helping me make a webpage and told me why stuff wasn't working. This guy also came to where we were sitting, I think her brother. I was very worried and stressed out and they were trying to make me feel better.

I dreamt I was out in some town with my friends and I was eating something and I went to the bathroom and noticed that two of my teeth had thinned, and when I touched them they began to chip and fall out! I was so upset and worried... my friends told me to go to this dentist that was especially for out of town people.

My calculus professor was looking at all my work and was trying to figure out why I was getting good grades. He ended up finding out that it was my second time taking calculus, that I had taken it in high school. I felt worried in my dream. I didn't know why he was so determined to find out how I got my good grades. It was like he was hoping to find out something else, whatever that is.

I dreamt that my boyfriend and I were walking on a beach at sunset, holding hands and gazing at the waves. It was a very peaceful dream full of intense conversation. We were discussing things which we have talked about in real life, and the importance of fate in life and our feelings about each other.

I had a date with the boy to whom I am pinned. We were with two other couples which were unfamiliar to me. We were swimming in a very large pool which was open at one end. At this end the water was coming in. The water was very muddy like river water. The next thing I knew we were on our way back to the dormitory and I was two hours late. I was very worried because I knew I would be campused for the rest of the year.

My father was Napoleon, why I don't know. My brother cut his foot on a sword that he had been using, but my father showed no concern or sympathy for him. All he did was to tell me to put an apple on my brother's foot. He said this would cure it. I didn't think so, but I did it anyway. Then people, no one in particular, told me my brother was going to die. I didn't see how he could from such a small cut, they said he would.

I was sitting in the front seat of a car with a man I cannot identify. We were in a very close embrace, but instead of kissing me, he was trying to make me stutter. His method involved my repeating certain words after him. This was supposed to make me very tense. Then he asked me some questions and told me that upon answering them I would stutter. I concentrated real hard on my answers and replied very slowly. As a result I did not stutter. He didn't seem too disappointed.

I dreamed an elderly man, an old friend of mine, came to visit me at a house in which an aunt lived at one time. We were standing in the kitchen and he seemed to want me to read a letter. He held it in his hand, outstretched to me, but I was more concerned in looking into the other rooms to see if anyone was there to see him. I was rather anxious that he should not be seen and that he should leave at once.

I dreamt that I was a spectator in the Cleveland stadium. There were many people there. We watched a baseball game. The pitcher was my brother (10). In the game the pitcher called balls and strikes because there were no umpires. The first pitch was a good one and my brother called it a strike. The next three pitches were wide of the plate and designated balls. That made the count three balls and one strike. The next pitch was bad but my brother called it a strike. This made me feel anxious.

I attended the Dr. I.Q. quiz show which recently appeared in Cleveland and which is on the radio on Wed. at 8 p.m. I remained tense as I waited hopefully to be a contestant. In the meantime, a queer thing happened which never takes place on the quiz show. The quiz master was replaced by his wife as quiz master after half of the program was over. I was finally called to answer a question. I can't remember what the question was or how I answered.

I am walking home with my gym bag in my hand (probably coming home from a basket ball game). On the other side of the street I see one of my best friends. Several guys approach him and begin starting a fight with him -- his glasses fall to the sidewalk and smash. When I see these guys attacking him, I drop my gym bag and run to his aid. I fight like one possessed, like a maddened animal, as great is my concern.

I was driving with my girl and her parents, and passed a boy who looked like someone whom I knew about 9 years ago, and never thought too much of him. I was sure that the boy was a brother of the concerned former acquaintance.

I had found a television set somewhere in my home. The chief concern of the dream was the television set. It was different from any set I have seen, in that it worked with a switch on the end of a cord, and the screen part was in a separate unit, detachable from the rest of the set. I remember being quite surprised at finding it. I played with the set for a few minutes and then walked away from it, whereupon I awoke.

My high school friend Philippa was in my dream and she asked why I never trusted her. She was standing right in front of me confused, telling me she always had and never understood why I hadn’t. She was fidgeting a lot with her hair. My best friend from high school Karen was in the background. I think I responded that I didn’t know why I didn’t trust her but I always wanted to. She seemed very sympathetic and concerned unlike her real life demeanor that can be very manipulative and insecure.

Felt really anxious and uneasy the whole time. It felt like I wasn't really sleeping. Just kept on thinking about having to figure out a place to live but my future roommates are abroad so we're running out of time. I was just very uncomfortable.

I was in a car alone, driving. It was very quiet. There was no are else on the road. I started to feel anxious when I could not figure out if it was my car that I was driving, or somebody else’s. I could not tell because I really could not distinguish anything on the inside.

It was about my ex-boyfriend. I was nervous around him because I thought I would see him with his girlfriend. I knew the whole time that I was dreaming. I wanted to see if my ex still had feelings for me and I found out that he did.

My boyfriend Doug was hanging out with me in my dorm room and we were watchinG TV and playing on the computer. He left to drive home and a few minutes later I went to sleep. I was awoken by my roommate and she seemed very anxious and worried – she told me that she just got a call that Doug was in a car accident and he died. I started to cry and my heart rate went up really fast and I became scared.

I do remember playing soccer. I think I tried out and made a Russian? Professional team. The most intense emotion I can remember having in a dream in quite some time was the feeling of excitement I had in hearing I’d be starting in the 1st game, which was about to begin, I think.

Everything’s white and blurry, with a shrill, high-pitch noise. My dream was about me being a singer and I was on stage singing a concert. There were lots of people there listening to me. I was very very nervous.

I dreamed I was in the church parking lot talking to some friends. I saw my brother texting. He had a really worried face. He walked over to my mom and said "My girlfriend Bella just died." Then I woke up.I had this dream last week when I was still 12.

When I was 12 I had this dream: I was in car with my dad and it was a sedan not like the car he had at the time in real life. Anyway I was going in the car and we drove off a dock and I got out and started swimming up and then right before I hit the surface of the water I woke up. It is a short dream but I remember alot about it I felt kinda nervous yet calm in the water.

I had a dream that I was a contractor in Europe who went around and recruited people for some purpose. The person I am seeing everything through is not me but someone else. I felt confident and nervous at the same time and even today I am not sure what was going on. I was about 16.

I dreamt once that my niece Kadie was starring in a sci-fi movie. The set of the movie had cameras and lights and looked like a big warehouse with a living room right in the middle of it (the stage). In the movie, in the intense scene between Kadie and the aliens, the aliens are supposed to take her gun from her and use it against her. I dreamt that someone actually loaded the gun and killed my niece. I woke up in full on sobs. The worst, most real dream I've ever had.

I dreamed that my right index finger was severed. I worked through it then went the next morning to the emergency room. I was worried that they couldn't reattach my finger because I hadn't kept it cold
I dreamed I was late to take a test at school.I don't remember any colors or smells just being very anxious.I knew I was late but felt I was unable to move . The I woke up

This was a recent dream.. it was my current boyfriend got into a horrible accident and nobody told me, then I found out that he had been engaged to his ex girlfriend, and hadn't told me, overall I don't remember all of the details, but It woke me up and was pretty intense overall

I'm living in the jungle with my brother, who has some medical condition where he has to have electrodes attached to his body or he might die. For a while we co-exist but then toward the end of the dream I'm worried he will die because the electrodes are coming off.
I dreamed of my dad after he died. I felt it was a message to me regarding a concern I had during my childhood. Betty

I was at my church, and there was a hurricane (we live in AZ - never happens). I was running around looking for a pair of shoes to match my dress. A childhood friend was hiding between some cabinets and the wall, but he got blown away by the hurricane. I was more worried about my shoes than the storm, and I never did find them. I just woke up.

I just remember being held hostage by some psycho in a house. I was tied to a chair when the psycho put some wires on me to electricute me. My husband then woke me up to see if I was ok because my whole body tensed up in my sleep.

Went to a hotel with an old college roommate --trying to find the right room.
