There was trash everywhere, and I was worried where to sleep--at somepoint my old college roommate turned into a colleague I work with and the rest of the dream is now a blur

I was in labor when the baby born I heard that it was a boy and after that I was out, when I woked up i was in my home, asking for my baby but my family just were saing that he was in the hospital and that he was ok, no colors it was in black and white, I was berry worried, after that I woke up.

I was getting pulled over by a police officer for driving to slow in a passing lane. It was night time and raining hard. I remember being nervous and shaking that I was going to get a ticket and be sent to jail

When I was a kid I had a dream where it appeared I had awaken in the middle of the night. I got out of the bed because I heard something coming from the kitchen. When I neared the kitchen I saw a dark silloute of a figure sitting in the kitchen. I was nervous but approached the figure anyway. When I got close enough to shadow, glowing red eyes appeared and it began to let loose a terrifying scream which seemed to vibrate everything and I got thrown back. Then I woke up.

The dream was rather short, but it involved an ex-boyfriend and I meeting up in a crowded cafe, and he brought another girl with him. The motion in the dream was slowed down, but I had this intense insight that we were not meant to be together and the other girl in the dream is the one for him. I was very aware of how I was feeling on the dream, and that it was in fact a dream.
I don't remember the dream, but I wake up feeling anxious and jumpy.I think the dream consisted of visual scares.
I was in a grocery store with my dad and aunt. I got upset with my aunt for some reason and I cussed her out. Then I got worried about her telling my dad and other family members what happened.

042 I am with a group of Special Forces soldiers in Vietnam. We are attacked by NVA soldiers at close quarters. One charges us. He wears a gas mask and has a chemical biological weapon. One SF solider assaults him hand to hand..

047 I am struggling with a policeman who has caught me stealing from a car. He shoots me point blank, a flesh wound. I run. He shoots me again and again in my chest. My blood spatters on a wall in front of me. I am dying.

080 Dream 1: In the dream I am at war. The terrain is rocky and dry. We are being mortared. The shells fall close. A nearby man who much resembles Ray of the CP [Command Platoon] is struck by the blast of a near direct hit and killed instantly, though his body seizes up, as if he were struck dumb. There is no blood or sign of injury. A second man is killed in likewise manner. No one moves. I run for cover.

082 I am with a large black woman who resembles the poet Melinda T. We are sitting in the office of Dr. Anders. She listens while I speak about war. Suddenly a low resonant howl escapes me. The black woman says, “I know what that is.” I begin weeping.

094 I am searching for NVA hidden in the stalls of public bathrooms. In a frenzy I kick doors open. The enemy wear green uniforms and have long black hair. They are silent and beaten and offer no defense. I am yelling as I shoot. I am screaming. I am shooting at close range. When the dead slump down, there is little blood. After the killing I shoot them again.

095 It is the present day. In a large, flat field I watch as prisoners are beaten senseless by members of the Central Intelligence Agency. The victims are dragged off and thrown into piles, condemned to be shot. The bloodied, half-conscious men plead for their lives. The cruel agents ignore them. Then it is my turn. I get not to be killed, but the process begins.

I dreamed that Camilia, Ed, and I were all jumping on mattresses in the main building. They asked me to join them, but I didn't want to. I went to the dining hall to make a cup of tea. Mrs. Frank was there and wanted me to babysit, but I really didn't want to. So I hurried to make my tea. Then I went to the back of the dining hall, and there was this Harry Potter game open and there was a scary monster in it. I wanted it to leave, but it wouldn't. It was terrible! Then I woke up.

24. Scott was sitting at lunch and was like, “Umm, there is a seat right here.” And I was like, “Ummm, no thanks.” And everybody was like, “Oh, burn” ( it was so stupid). I was looking in this huge shower, bigger than my room, and some kid came running in there butt naked screaming from this bully and then ran right back out (so weird).

29. (5) All of us (people I have no idea who they were and we) tried to make weed and stuff in a basement/forest and everyone got high except for me and then all of a sudden a rhino came out of the forest and chased us.

39. I was a mom in a wheelchair and my husband and I got in this fight and he threw me down the stairs, but I got up and he tried to set me on fire. But soon the whole yard caught on fire and my kids were trapped so I saved us all by putting the fire out with a fire extinguisher, then everything was ok again. Nick carried me off the bus and then kissed me.
42. I chased down Nate for a long time, then followed him into his house and we became friends. He brought lots of movies and came over, but we ended up babysitting a Jewish baby.

I dreamed that I lived in Manhattan. So one night I was showering and had to go get something. When I was going back to finish my shower, a man jumped out and tried to rape me. I freaked out and tried to scream, but I couldn't make any sound. It was awful. I tried to tell My mother what happened, but I had lost my voice. Thank god I woke up!

I don't remember all the details but here is what I do remember. Marley, my cat, decided to escape. He ran outside and I had to chase him across the street and catch him. We were back in Virginia at my mom's house. I caught him and brought him back in and then he escaped again. It really upset me the 2nd time because I wasn't able to find him. That's all I remember.
93. (recurring) I was at this one place and this guy tried to kill me, but I killed him? I cannot explain it.
105. I had to get sent to this juvenile type place because I did something bad, and Dr Phil was the guy that ran the place and I tried to escape. He kept on making stuff up about me.
136. Some crazy guy kidnapped me and a bunch of other people and locked us in a room along with 45 cats and we finally escaped after like 2 years.
72. first dream 4 a.m. - I end up hiding out from someone who screams a lot. I close the door and pretend not to hear.
78. I go to a place where they do medical tests on me. In one, they jam a needle into my shoulder to remove my blood. A friend drove me up there. She wants to go along because it's taking so long.

The dream: I am trying to get a statue of an ancient goddess, like a Greek goddess, marble, very tall and thin, across an ocean or body of water. She was strapped, standing upright on a makeshift raft. White strips of cloth or strap wrapped to keep her stable. Several women are holding her up. I remember washing ashore, on a beach. It was hard work carrying her.
112. I go to visit some people and must hurry and get ready. I one part, a monster comes, determined to destroy people. Scary.

I’m looking up at the lights of a hospital. It must be past midnight I think. Strangely, I don’t want to leave. Somewhere I hear an emphysema patient struggling for breath. Family members visit a loved one on her death- bed. The lights in the room flicker. I’m feeling better. I know there are doctors nearby. I can finally rest. I fall asleep on this hard table.

I’m in the middle of a sun-drenched desert. I have bare feet. There are a number of rocks strewn sporadically. I jump from rock to rock. After what seems like hours, I get to a point where there are no more stones….just a beautiful world beyond my wasteland. As the sun drops into the west, I can see everything- the lights of Eden, the end of pain, disease, and death. I’ll never touch this place I think. Fade out.

I remember running into my bedroom and finding my bed drenched in blood. The sheets, the covers, quilt were all blood red. Even the pillows. Everything was red. I screamed, “Call 888-8888!” I was frantic.

I’m playing this very primitive video game with my eighth grade friend, Jim Engelman. We’re at his apartment on Grand Island. He’s all grown up but it’s like we’re both trapped in a time warp. We’re talking about our chemistry projects. I want to catch up with him but it’s like he jumped ahead sixteen years without any intervening life content. I remember having to leave the apartment. He tells me he’ll see me in due time. That’s about it.

I see myself about twenty years old and I’m visiting a relative in Maine. The experience takes place at night. I’m trying to retrieve some papers that are somewhat sensitive and had been left outside the house. AS I am taking off with the papers, three men try to apprehend me. Somehow, I manage to escape. I wake up.

161. (1) I was climbing all around my fence in my back yard with my right hand. I came to the end and there were some papers on the ground. He picked them up and they were from school and he started telling me how I felt and I was screaming at him saying “Only I know how I feel!” and he said, “No, you don't” and I went inside.

I had an awful dream last night that Hillary Clinton had just been chosen as the candidate by the Democratic National Committee, but was then found dead shortly after. Still dreaming, I screamed and cried and cried.
I had a nightmare that Barack had secretly been continuing the drug use he started thirty years ago as an experimenting youth and overdosed on cocaine and died.
Barack was singing a song about cleaning up Chicago, and people were screaming at dilapidated buildings to make them fall down.

Hillary was my college professor for a deaf studies class. A deaf guest was visiting the class, so Hillary decided to have one of the Assisted Sign Language students interpret for the deaf person. I was outraged. I told her it was wrong to use a student, that interpreters need to be trained and skilled -- not only knowing in how to sign, but how to interpret. Barack and I were having a long conversation at the beginning of the dream, and then it transformed into a sort of Matthew Barney universe where he was wearing cowboy hats and his skin seemed to be getting whiter all the time. Hillary Clinton came to my apartment, smoked a bowl with me and a couple friends, then she gave me an iPhone. We walked around Seattle for a while. I woke up with a strange feeling of satisfaction that it would be okay if she wins.

My wife and I were chatting about some task we had to get done. Hillary appeared and put in her two cents, in a totally matter-of-fact way. I did not think it strange she was there.
I had the strangest dream last night about Tony. He wanted to date me and was getting to know my family and help around the house. He really wanted to get on my mother and my father's good sides.

I was in the donut shop working with my father. I couldn't make the cinnamon rolls quite right. Australian customers come in. They were strange and demanding. Looking at each other saying it will not be weird. I kept on having to leave, to go do something for someone, and I kept coming back.

I'm wandering around a fantastic suburb of beautiful landscaped gardens. It looks hyper-real like a David Lynch film. This place is full of tension, emotion and romance. There are hedged mazes, follies, ponds, lakes, complicated walled gardens, hanging gardens, raised walkways. It is truly beautiful. Strangely it seems to be located in a suburb in my_hometown that in real life is dull and boring.

I had a hodgepodge of odd dreams last night. First, I had a dream that I sometimes have, where I still have birds or other pets, and I’ve forgotten to feed them, and I find them dead, or almost dead, and I feel utterly crushed and guilty beyond words. In this case, it was Sir Galahad, the fan-tail pigeon.

I'm in some bizarre competition with a very small disabled man. He drives an electric wheelchair or little electric car. He is someone I know, but I can't place who. I might be on a bike. The competition seems to be, who can get into a supermarket car park from the top of a steep hill first. We race. The little man is always accompanied by a female helper (or pertness) who tells him off for racing. I generally get there first (the race is re-run over and over).

In this dream my house is on the same street as my_childhood_home. My neighbour is my real neighbour: a Londoner called Len. In the dream he has all sorts of trailers parked outside, and strange large bits of metal (perhaps they are cement mixers that fold up). I see him as I'm trying to park. He is parking another large lump of metal. We engage in small talk. I am a bit annoyed with his taking up all the parking space, but I try to remain polite. He doesn't seem to get it, and just chats away.

I'm in a dramatic city set into a hilly topography - a bit like Edinburgh. My_partner and I go walking through the city and get a bit lost in the labyrinth of streets and bridges. We may be on holiday, staying on a hotel. At night we go out drinking. I forget where we have been and find it hard to get home. My_friend Sal is there too. We climb to the top of a large hill where something strange happens. I have the image of stingrays in my mind in bright luminous colors.

This was a weird obsessive dream about 'process'. Four resources were endlessly being dished out. It turned into a thing about onions: four ways to prepare onions so that they could be as different as possible - chutney, deep fried, soup and something else. I woke up with a thick head and sore eyes as if I'd been drinking the night before but I hadn't.

Apparently (according to my_friend Ralph) I have won the lottery - a special kind of lottery which is revealed on a set of playing cards. George W Bush is game master for a weird cross between top trumps and piggy-in-the-middle. My_friends Ralph, Terry and Reece are playing too. I need to collect the whole pack of cards surreptitiously in order to claim my one million dollars, without George Bush interfering. The dreams drifts further and further away from feasibility.

Mom and dad have a weird animal/cat care place at a nearby shopping center….Before that, I’m hiding some stuff of Ronald’s in weird places….Bad guys are lurking around….but forgetting his backpack, so we’re late for school….at some point, spilling my salad because of gross water in the car console….

I?d be in these glass rooms and you could actually walk through each room but they would all be the same rooms all the time and no matter how many times I wanted to try and get out of there I couldn?t, all four sides were glass brick rings and no matter how far you ran in any direction it didn?t matter you were gonna be stuck in there anyway 'til you actually woke up and realized ok that was weird.
Next, Mom and I were in the kitchen trying to do this dance to the tune of “Here We Go Loopity-Loo.” It had some strange, unpronounceable words put to it, and apparently, we were supposed to sing it.

I’m picking at something in my left ear….Suddenly I realize there’s something in my ear, or coming out of it….I finally get it out, and it’s a big brown and black chunk of ear wax….with half an almond wrapped inside it?....that’s strange….

I’m with a woman in a big room or gym….We’re trying to fool around, like everyone else….several other couples are around the room, also having sexual activities….the woman's privates are red....but the situation doesn’t seem right to me, nor to her….she suggests we go upstairs….ok, I say….I tell people we’re going up….it seems weird to say something that so obviously refers to our going to have sex….

I had a dream about a guy and 2 laptops. He had a really cool new laptop and I wanted to exchange my old one for it. I remember it had this odd monitor that kinda lifted off the laptop. There was also a staircase in the dream. I know I was supposed to be training someone on how to use the laptop. I remember being in a room that had a desk and was kind of dark.

Now I am back at high school with Mrs. Benncort as a teacher, getting classes mixed up. I felt like it just kept on progressing. That's about all I can remember, strange dream.

I’m laying in bed and someone hands me a lit cigarette….I take a puff, try to blow the smoke outside….I don’t want anyone else to smell it….it seems odd I’m doing this; I don’t like the taste of the tobacco smoke, and I’m in an awkward place to begin with….

I?d be shopping somewhere and next thing I was in hospital looking at these strange things on the ceilings and then next thing I was in my home town as a child and then I went into the navy reliving the atomic bomb test in 1957, it was a mixture of all things, just going through my life experiences.

I see Thunder on a couch, and I hear strange squealings….oh oh, I realize Thunder is looking for a mouse that’s loose and hiding among the pillows on the couch….Should I do something about it, to help the mouse?....No, I have to keep going wherever I’m going, moving from left to right through the room past the couch….

This was in a strange house and I was trying to do something but nothing was working, I was dropping things, there were some children there and I was trying to get them ready to go somewhere but they weren?t listening, everything was going wrong, I?m quite distressed and agitated when I wake up.

Talking to everyone, movie theaters and going to the park to the zoo with Richard and family, driving up a big grassy hill

nojust about weird things and situations

was at work in a strange place

yes, get get my job done because of odd problems

my wife and someone else are in a train car….I try to get back there, but lots of people are in the way….I do not have the right ticket?....That is a problem….But I also have two weird candles, like they are wrapped in something….The candles are good, that does it, I am able to get where I want to go….

I am with some women who have been changed in some way….against their will….They have an enclosure of light gray gases around them, like inside a clear dome?....Someone did this to them….They deal with it, like it is ok, but I think it is weird….The domes around them are of different sizes, some closer in to their bodies, others bigger around them….

There are some people in the house….walking around….I see someone has put cut logs in various places around the house?....it is weird, but cool….Later, I am doing a bong hit, and I blow the smoke into the ground….Then, I am leading someone through a dark, narrow tunnel in the woods….My head accidentally bumps into what I realize must be a log ahead of us, although I cannot see it because it is so dark….hmmm, surprised, I realize I have to find a way to go over it….

Some people arrive and take over one of the rooms here….They all seem very comfortable here….They bring out lots of colored paper….Lots of colors, red, yellow, blue, orange….That is strange to me, it somehow seems presumptuous of them, to lay out so many things in a room that is not theirs….But I am ok with it eventually….

A woman is in trouble, and I offer the authorities to go back into that world and try to save her….I know how the weird food works?....I see some white plastic containers with leftover food, it has something to do with that….I am familiar with it, I can go back and do it in the original form, and that way I can reach and help the woman….Earlier, I see someone washing and setting to dry a rough clay cup, tall and flesh colored….

I come into sight of a tall, imposing woman. I know that she is Athena, the Greek goddess, or she might even be Artemis. We are in a theatre and are taking part in a play of some sort. There is a large audience listening to us.

I am waking up but realize that I am still dreaming. I am in a strange house and there is a woman in the room standing right over my bed watching me. She is wearing old fashioned clothing. But she is very friendly to me, sort of protecting me.

I am caring for toddlers at a day care center. I am snuggling one of the older boys, around 9 or 10, and am stroking his hair. At the same time a man is holding the lower part of my right leg, and is fondling my toes. He seems to approve of my nurturing the young boy.

I am at home, but I decide to go outside. I see a girl sitting on a bench. I come over to her, and we start talking. I tell her, "This is a strange day. I was wounded and I shot a man myself." I tell her that my gun had been shopped in two, as if by an axe, but I was able to use it anyway. I don't think she believes that things are so violent in her home town, but they really are.

I am talking with a man in a strange town. I know he is a Communist. We start talking about an independent Ukraine, and he speaks with great enthusiasm, much to my surprise. A strange man is standing on something like a UFO which emits blue light from the bottom. A little bit of white light is beaming from behind his back. I don't know if the two of us are on the outside of the UFO or inside a room, but it is very dark all around us.

I somehow get into a house unknown to me. There is a man in blue there with a sword in his hand. He runs after me and cries out oaths. Evidently, he is going to kill me. I am with Boris, my boy friend who I sleep with. But in the dream there is a strained relationship between the two of us. We are in nature, under the sky and the stars. I am in Moscow and one by one, I meet people with whom I work in Kiev. There are six of them. I walk quickly, and can't calm down and get rid of the thought, "Why did I meet them in Moscow? I was in a small, narrow room. It seemed to be a bathroom. It was lit with an unusual green light that was reflected by the walls. I stood to the left. I think he was going to be baptized, but in some strange way, as if they all had rehearsed it before performing it. People were in white garments for the ritual, but some wore gray cloth over the garments. I felt very strange.

I dream that I am back in time when my grandmother was a teenager. I observe the village where she lived much differently than I have ever seen it before. I am in a strange, old house, I become caught in a trap of some kind and can not move. Suddenly some rats appear. They come to me and sniff around my body. Then they start to eat my flesh. I am in terrible pain and can do nothing about it.

I am with several women, who are strangers to me. But they are very attractive, and soon we all start to have sex. Right in the middle of our sexual party, I wonder if my wife will ever hear of this. Under strange circumstances, my girlfriend fell from a tree and perished. Arriving on the scene, I found a lot of matches and mismatches, as if this were a hoax. All the people, males and females, in the dream were friends of mine in waking life. But the details did not make sense. There was a falsification going on. I became highly emotional.

I am sitting in the waiting room of a small railroad station with a low ceiling. The walls are dark blue. The building is made out of wood. It is evening, probably in the summer. I notice shades of light, so the setting is not somber. Yet I have a feeling of depression, and I sense it with the men and women too. All are strangers in this station. I sense that the train is about to arrive, but I really do not care.

I am with two people in a strange room. I know the second person. He is a friend of my son. But the other man is someone who I do not know. The friend of my son is writing something. In this dream, I am at a party or a gathering of some sort. There are many people there, both men and women, but they are all strangers. I do not know any of them. I realize that I am standing there naked. I have no clothes on at all, while all the other people are very nicely dressed.

I go to see my boyfriend, and I am in a hurry. I come inside of the flat where he is living. I go through the door, and then I meet him. As he sees me, he turns aside as if I am a stranger, just as if we have never met each other before.

I am in my primary school. There were aliens in spaceships flying around outside, trying to get in. I was running around the school making sure that all the windows were closed and locked. As I came around the bend in the stars I ran into aliens coming up the stairs. [In retrospect I think I may have experienced an alien abduction at this point.]

I was in a strange house with a current running beside it. I was with a strange woman and we started to make love. It was a very positive experience. A small bridge was being built by the river running by the house. Then one could pass right across the river into the house. I felt very confident that something good would happen.

I was walking in a dark and strange city with one of my sister with whom I do not get along with very well. Suddenly, a group of men appeared and started to follow us. When they reached us, they started to hit me and beat me, telling me that they would kill me.

In this dream, I am very young again and see myself in the house where I was raised. But there are no family members in the house, only strangers. (I play soccer every Sunday afternoon; it is my passion.) (I had a dream in which) I was playing soccer with several strangers, all of them men. It is like I am back in school, in my old school where I was a student when I was a child. There is a strange man asking questions about the subject matter. I think it is geography. I am sitting in front of a large door to my house. The door has a key. "How unusual," I declare, "because I do not use keys in doors." I think that if I ever feel threatened and strange, I may try to discover why I carelessly left the key in order to open the door and pass to the other side.

I am in my house, by the kitchen hall. A male stranger arrives and we begin to hold a conversation. I ask where he is from, and why he wants to kill me. H does not answer. He gives me poison. My grandmother who passed away in December was back. It was strange like she just showed up again one day. Every one was asking her where she had been and she never said. She just kept saying that she decided to come back.

Detail vanishes rapidly, perhaps because it is too irrational and confusing. Often I am at a surreal analog of the job I retired from, as a windtunnel engineer.

Planning to go to Switzerland with my wife and a couple of guys I do not know. I am driving a car I do not know somewhere in Florida when this idea pops up. I want to go right away and find an apartment for the four of us. My wife reminds me I do not like to share a bathroom. VERY WEIRD!

My elderly mother is in a room with a pretty bedspread, but no windows. She is angry with me, a grown older woman and with my father, elderly also and is estranged from us both. Protecting Keiandra and the dogs from a stranger outside. Our parents are not home, the dogs and my sister are watching TV. They're cold, I turn on the heat. We feel like there is someone outside, we turn the lights out and snuggle and try not to worry about it.

I handed Duke several specimens of the weird genus Listronsties for study. He seemed conscience stricken because of an unfinished piece of work that should have been completed long before. Under the circumstances, I feel it is best to suggest that Duke make no more that a brief and preliminary examination of the specimens at this time, as there should be others along later. A farmer (or probably a city man who has moved on to a small farm) complains that what ground isn't chewed up by the mice is damaged by (here some strange thing is mentioned, i.e., some strange sounding word). 149. The rest of the dreams were all about shooting people and violence. Maybe because I'm sleeping in a strange hotel in Ontario.

8. second dream - I go into a coffee place and ask for a cup of grape juice. The lady puts it on the stove and says it will be a half hour wait. I sit down. 202. Srila Ramesvara had gotten all weird, so Laksmi Priya and I had to run away. We got caught running away, but made it. We were snowed in at Shelby's cabin. Her mom wanted me to try some certain breakfast food. Shelby was raging about it. Then her old granpa or uncle was in a weird chicken suit. I said hello to him but he didn't say anything. Then he felt guilty and said hi and sorry.

I'm in a strange city with a skateboard and an umbrella which I plan to leave in a park as some kind of memorial. I wasn't done talking. But I met the real Santa and he took care of me and made gorgeous snowflake patterns all over the floor in glitter and ice. Sitting around in Kitchen by the island with my old friends. The topic of MLP came up, and CA started talking about how Discord and Mr. (name here) were OCs. At the beach in Oct, weird but my family did this a lot. Relatives from Chi visiting. Went to a store. J was shopping there, and she was talking about me to Aunt Di. We had a little feud in the middle of the store.

Dream 4. [50] In the dream, there was some kind of competition or a game going on, and the young ones were better than the old ones (playing or competing against each other) as young people are. The husband of a couple I know (who oddly has the same rare name as my husband) and I are lying in bed in some sort of intertwined posture talking, it was not a dream that was sexually charged, I remember thinking that this is definitely wrong and I should not be doing that with her husband, then we are in a diner and his wife happens to be the waitress, she serves us coffee and looking at her pad she explains something very profound to us, although what,  I can’t remember.

It was weird, I had a dream, but in my dream I had another dream. It was as if I was awake and seeing everything from above. I was in my living room and a strange lady was cutting my hair. I was just sitting there no talking moving. Then it transitioned to me buying my mom flying tickets to Mexico but one of them was for me. I found that out when I took her to the airport. I was taking this weird test. My teacher made the test out of a Clay Castle. It had three levels and was painted strangely. It had all these towers. One of the towers had stairs. I vaguely remember walking down my hall in Swig and it was very dark, and there were people everywhere, I just walked into my room though and thought it was weird. I stayed up and talked to one of my friends really late.

I was running down a city block, like in New York, but there were more trees. It was strange because there were no cars or anything, no other people around me either. I was having a hard time breathing but I didn't want to stop running.

In this dream my family bought a new house which actually turned out to be a mansion. My brother and his daughter were there and they were making chicken sandwiches for everyone. I had a very strange dream that ants were crawling all over my body while I was in bed asleep. I was at a strange house in a strange (unfamiliar) town. I was teaching a dance class in a room but it was the Graham bathroom. I was leaving the bathroom, walked out, and ended up in my mom's office. I was sitting in a classroom that looked like one from my elementary school. One of my friends, also named Heather, was sitting next to me and we were talking about my job. I dreamt that a group of teachers were having meetings at a school, and some students - 5 or 6 - snuck into the building and started to build a forest with huge slides that led down to an imaginary place where the teachers couldn't go. Again I had a rather odd dream of my frog. I kept seeing my frog in a larger and larger aquarium. My frog also seemed to get more frantic as each aquarium size increased. I recall feeling very sympathetic of my poor frog.

Bumped into first boyfriend. Then I'm showing the house where I live to people. This time I knew I was dreaming because the house was clearly not the same. Then my friends and I area alone and want to take pictures of ourselves in new swimsuits. We were unusually happy about this.

I dreamt I was present in the room that was discussing where to drop the atomic bomb. I saw them load the bomb on a very different type plane that carried the bomb on a cord outside the plane. Our neighbor from across the street was bringing boxes of junk to store in our attic. I was standing on a chair landing in the dorm when one of the girls went by and called to a boy (22) to come on up. I knew him, but when I saw him, I was surprised to see him. At the same time indicating because of his skill and early detection of the growth, complete cure was possible.

I was in a hall with lockers on the side, low ceiling, a bluish, dark, cast to the surroundings. A dark-haired stranger whom I was with had just shot somebody. i was at a weird school with an ice rink inside. One of the classes you have to learn to play hockey. I am 10
